trans-unit.source: How you use the gettext module in your code depends on whether you are internationalizing a single module or your entire application. The next two sections will discuss each case.

trans-unit.source: However, a more generic mechanism is needed for user-defined objects which are not known to the logging module. For example, consider logging.handlers.MemoryHandler, which takes a target argument which is another handler to delegate to. Since the system already knows about this class, then in the configuration, the given target just needs to be the object id of the relevant target handler, and the system will resolve to the handler from the id. If, however, a user defines a my.package.MyHandler which has an alternate handler, the configuration system would not know that the alternate referred to a handler. To cater for this, a generic resolution system allows the user to specify:
trans-unit.target: 但是，对于 logging 模块未知的用户定义对象，需要一种更通用的机制。例如，考虑 logging.handlers.MemoryHandler ，它接受一个 target 参数，这是另一个要委托给的处理程序。由于系统已经知道该类，因此在配置中，给定的 target 只需是相关目标处理程序的对象ID，系统将根据该ID解析为处理程序。然而，如果用户定义 my.package.MyHandler 其具有 alternate 处理程序，配置系统将不知道的是， alternate 提到处理程序。为此，通用解析系统允许用户指定：

trans-unit.source: IDL attributes map to instance attributes. For compatibility with the OMG IDL language mapping for Python, an attribute foo can also be accessed through accessor methods _get_foo() and _set_foo(). readonly attributes must not be changed; this is not enforced at runtime.
trans-unit.target: IDL属性映射到实例属性。为了与Python的OMG IDL语言映射兼容，还可以通过访问器方法 _get_foo() 和 _set_foo() 来访问属性 foo 。 readonly 属性不得更改；运行时不强制执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: IDLE
trans-unit.target: IDLE

trans-unit.source: IDLE Help
trans-unit.target: IDLE帮助

trans-unit.source: IDLE assumes that files with a known .py* extension contain Python code and that other files do not. Run Python code with the Run menu.
trans-unit.target: IDLE 假设已知的 .py*扩展名的文件包含 Python 代码,而其他文件不包含。用Run菜单运行Python代码。

trans-unit.source: IDLE contains an extension facility. Preferences for extensions can be changed with the Extensions tab of the preferences dialog. See the beginning of config-extensions.def in the idlelib directory for further information. The only current default extension is zzdummy, an example also used for testing.
trans-unit.target: IDLE包含一个扩展工具。可以通过偏好对话框的Extensions选项卡来更改扩展的偏好。更多信息请参见idlelib目录下的config-extensions.def开头。目前唯一的默认扩展是zzdummy,这个例子也是用于测试的。

trans-unit.source: IDLE has the following features:
trans-unit.target: IDLE具有以下特点:

trans-unit.source: IDLE has two main window types, the Shell window and the Editor window. It is possible to have multiple editor windows simultaneously. On Windows and Linux, each has its own top menu. Each menu documented below indicates which window type it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: IDLE有两种主要的窗口类型,Shell窗口和编辑器窗口。可以同时拥有多个编辑器窗口。在Windows和Linux上,每个窗口都有自己的顶部菜单。下面记载的每个菜单都表明了它与哪个窗口类型相关联。

trans-unit.source: IDLE is Python’s Integrated Development and Learning Environment.
trans-unit.target: IDLE是Python的集成开发和学习环境。

trans-unit.source: IDLE is intentionally different from standard Python in order to facilitate development of tkinter programs. Enter import tkinter as tk; root = tk.Tk() in standard Python and nothing appears. Enter the same in IDLE and a tk window appears. In standard Python, one must also enter root.update() to see the window. IDLE does the equivalent in the background, about 20 times a second, which is about every 50 milliseconds. Next enter b = tk.Button(root, text='button'); b.pack(). Again, nothing visibly changes in standard Python until one enters root.update().
trans-unit.target: IDLE有意不同于标准Python，以促进tkinter程序的开发。输入 import tkinter as tk; root = tk.Tk() 在标准Python中为root = tk.Tk（），什么也没有出现。在IDLE中输入相同的内容，然后会出现一个tk窗口。在标准Python中，还必须输入 root.update() 才能看到该窗口。 IDLE在后台执行等效操作，大约每秒20次，大约每50毫秒一次。接下来输入 b = tk.Button(root, text='button'); b.pack() 。再次说明，在标准Python中，直到有人输入 root.update() 之前，没有任何明显的变化。

trans-unit.source: IDLE may open editor windows when it starts, depending on settings and how you start IDLE. Thereafter, use the File menu. There can be only one open editor window for a given file.
trans-unit.target: IDLE在启动时可能会打开编辑器窗口,这取决于设置和启动IDLE的方式。此后,请使用 "文件 "菜单。一个文件只能有一个打开的编辑器窗口。

trans-unit.source: IDLE on macOS
trans-unit.target: macOS上的IDLE

trans-unit.source: IDLE uses a socket to communicate between the IDLE GUI process and the user code execution process. A connection must be established whenever the Shell starts or restarts. (The latter is indicated by a divider line that says ‘RESTART’). If the user process fails to connect to the GUI process, it displays a Tk error box with a ‘cannot connect’ message that directs the user here. It then exits.
trans-unit.target: IDLE使用套接字在IDLE GUI进程和用户代码执行进程之间进行通信。每当Shell启动或重新启动时，都必须建立连接。 （后者由标有'RESTART'的分隔线指示）。如果用户进程无法连接到GUI进程，它将显示 Tk 错误框，并带有“无法连接”消息，将用户定向到此处。然后退出。

trans-unit.source: IDLE’s standard stream replacements are not inherited by subprocesses created in the execution process, whether directly by user code or by modules such as multiprocessing. If such subprocess use input from sys.stdin or print or write to sys.stdout or sys.stderr, IDLE should be started in a command line window. The secondary subprocess will then be attached to that window for input and output.
trans-unit.target: 执行过程中创建的子流程不会继承IDLE的标准流，无论是直接由用户代码还是由诸如多处理之类的模块继承。如果此类子进程使用sys.stdin的 input 或 print 或 write sys.stdout或sys.stderr，则应在命令行窗口中启动IDLE。然后，次级子流程将附加到该窗口以进行输入和输出。

trans-unit.source: IIS can be configured to pass the correct PATH_INFO, but this causes another bug where PATH_TRANSLATED is wrong. Luckily this variable is rarely used and is not guaranteed by WSGI. On IIS<7, though, the setting can only be made on a vhost level, affecting all other script mappings, many of which break when exposed to the PATH_TRANSLATED bug. For this reason IIS<7 is almost never deployed with the fix (Even IIS7 rarely uses it because there is still no UI for it.).

IIS can be configured to pass the correct PATH_INFO, but this causes another bug where PATH_TRANSLATED is wrong. Luckily this variable is rarely used and is not guaranteed by WSGI. On IIS<7, though, the setting can only be made on a vhost level, affecting all other script mappings, many of which break when exposed to the PATH_TRANSLATED bug. For this reason IIS<7 is almost never deployed with the fix. (Even IIS7 rarely uses it because there is still no UI for it.)
trans-unit.target: 可以将IIS配置为传递正确的 PATH_INFO ，但这会导致另一个错误，其中 PATH_TRANSLATED 是错误的。幸运的是，此变量很少使用，WSGI不能保证。但是，在IIS <7上，只能在虚拟主机级别上进行设置，从而影响所有其他脚本映射，其中的许多映射在暴露于 PATH_TRANSLATED 错误时都会中断。因此，该修复程序几乎从未部署IIS <7。（即使IIS7也很少使用它，因为它仍然没有UI。）

trans-unit.source: Identify yourself to an ESMTP server using EHLO. The hostname argument defaults to the fully qualified domain name of the local host. Examine the response for ESMTP option and store them for use by has_extn(). Also sets several informational attributes: the message returned by the server is stored as the ehlo_resp attribute, does_esmtp is set to true or false depending on whether the server supports ESMTP, and esmtp_features will be a dictionary containing the names of the SMTP service extensions this server supports, and their parameters (if any).
trans-unit.target: 使用 EHLO 将自己标识为ESMTP服务器。 hostname参数默认为本地主机的标准域名。检查ESMTP选项的响应，并将其存储以供 has_extn() 使用。还设置了一些信息属性：服务器返回的消息存储为 ehlo_resp 属性， does_esmtp 根据服务器是否支持ESMTP设置为true或false，并且 esmtp_features 将是包含该服务器SMTP服务扩展名的字典。支持及其参数（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Identify yourself to the SMTP server using HELO. The hostname argument defaults to the fully qualified domain name of the local host. The message returned by the server is stored as the helo_resp attribute of the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HELO 将自己标识为SMTP服务器。hostname参数默认为本地主机的标准域名。服务器返回的消息存储为对象的 helo_resp 属性。

trans-unit.source: Idle defaults to black on white text, but colors text with special meanings. For the shell, these are shell output, shell error, user output, and user error. For Python code, at the shell prompt or in an editor, these are keywords, builtin class and function names, names following class and def, strings, and comments. For any text window, these are the cursor (when present), found text (when possible), and selected text.
trans-unit.target: 闲置默认在白色文本上为黑色，但为文本添加特殊含义。对于外壳，这些是外壳输出，外壳错误，用户输出和用户错误。对于Python代码，在shell提示符下或在编辑器中，这些是关键字，内置类和函数名称， class 和 def 之后的名称，字符串和注释。对于任何文本窗口，它们都是光标（如果存在），找到的文本（如果可能）和选定的文本。

trans-unit.target: 如果将“ from”用作etype的值，则 element_create() 将克隆现有元素。args应该包含一个主题名称（从中将克隆元素），以及一个可选的要从中进行克隆的元素。如果未指定要复制的元素，则将使用空元素。千瓦被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: If NodeTransformer introduces new nodes (that weren’t part of original tree) without giving them location information (such as lineno), fix_missing_locations() should be called with the new sub-tree to recalculate the location information:

If stop() is called before run_forever() is called, the loop will poll the I/O selector once with a timeout of zero, run all callbacks scheduled in response to I/O events (and those that were already scheduled), and then exit.
trans-unit.target: 如果 stop() 之前被调用 run_forever() 被调用时，循环将轮询I / O选择一次具有零超时，运行计划的响应都回调到I / O事件（和那些已经预定），和然后退出。

trans-unit.source: If stop() is called while run_forever() is running, the loop will run the current batch of callbacks and then exit. Note that new callbacks scheduled by callbacks will not run in this case; instead, they will run the next time run_forever() or run_until_complete() is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 stop() 而被称为 run_forever() 运行时，循环运行回调的当前批次，然后退出。请注意，在这种情况下，由回调安排的新回调将不会运行。相反，它们将在下次 run_forever() 或 run_until_complete() 时运行。

trans-unit.source: If -n is not given, a suitable number of loops is calculated by trying increasing numbers from the sequence 1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, … until the total time is at least 0.2 seconds.
If -n is not given, a suitable number of loops is calculated by trying successive powers of 10 until the total time is at least 0.2 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出 -n ，则通过尝试10的连续幂直到总时间至少为0.2秒来计算合适的循环数。

trans-unit.source: If default_factory is not None, it is called without arguments to provide a default value for the given key, this value is inserted in the dictionary for the key, and returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 default_factory 不为 None ，则在不带参数的情况下调用该函数，以提供给定键的默认值，此值将插入键的字典中并返回。

trans-unit.source: If dataclass() is used just as a simple decorator with no parameters, it acts as if it has the default values documented in this signature. That is, these three uses of dataclass() are equivalent:

trans-unit.source: If datetime instance d is naive, this is the same as d.timetuple() except that tm_isdst is forced to 0 regardless of what d.dst() returns. DST is never in effect for a UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 如果 datetime 实例d是天真的，则与 d.timetuple() 相同，除了 tm_isdst 强制为0无关于 d.dst() 返回什么。DST永远不会在UTC时间生效。

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.dst(self), and raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None or a timedelta object with magnitude less than one day.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.dst(self) ，如果后者不返回 None 或大小小于一天的 timedelta 对象，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.tzname(self), raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None or a string object,
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.tzname(self) ，如果后者不返回 None 或字符串对象，则会引发异常，

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.utcoffset(self), and raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None or a timedelta object with magnitude less than one day.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.utcoffset(self) ，如果后者不返回 None 或幅度小于一天的 timedelta 对象，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If utcoffset() does not return None, a string is appended, giving the UTC offset:
trans-unit.target: 如果 utcoffset() 没有返回 None ，则将附加一个字符串，以提供UTC偏移量：

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.dst(None), and raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None, or a timedelta object with magnitude less than one day.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.dst(None) ，如果后者不返回 None 或时间小于一天的 timedelta 对象，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.tzname(None), or raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None or a string object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.tzname(None) ，如果后者不返回 None 或字符串对象，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If tzinfo is None, returns None, else returns self.tzinfo.utcoffset(None), and raises an exception if the latter doesn’t return None or a timedelta object with magnitude less than one day.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzinfo 为 None ，则返回 None ，否则返回 self.tzinfo.utcoffset(None) ，如果后者不返回 None 或大小小于一天的 timedelta 对象，则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If utcoffset() does not return None, dst() should not return None either.
trans-unit.target: 如果 utcoffset() 不返回 None ，则 dst() 也不应返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If setcontext() has not been called before getcontext(), then getcontext() will automatically create a new context for use in the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setcontext() 之前没有被称为 getcontext() ，然后 getcontext() 会自动创建在当前线程中使用新的上下文。

trans-unit.source: If cte_type is 8bit, non-ASCII binary data is converted back into bytes. Headers with binary data are not refolded, regardless of the refold_header setting, since there is no way to know whether the binary data consists of single byte characters or multibyte characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cte_type 为 8bit ，则将非ASCII二进制数据转换回字节。不管 refold_header 设置如何，都不会重折叠带有二进制数据的标头，因为没有办法知道二进制数据是由单字节字符还是多字节字符组成。

trans-unit.source: If DEBUG_SAVEALL is set, then all unreachable objects will be added to this list rather than freed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 DEBUG_SAVEALL ，则所有无法访问的对象将被添加到该列表中，而不是被释放。

trans-unit.source: If domain_return_ok() returns true for the cookie domain, path_return_ok() is called for the cookie path. Otherwise, path_return_ok() and return_ok() are never called for that cookie domain. If path_return_ok() returns true, return_ok() is called with the Cookie object itself for a full check. Otherwise, return_ok() is never called for that cookie path.
trans-unit.target: 如果 domain_return_ok() 对于cookie域返回true， path_return_ok() cookie路径调用path_return_ok（）。否则，永远不会为该Cookie域调用 path_return_ok() 和 return_ok() 。如果 path_return_ok() 返回true，则使用 Cookie 对象本身调用 return_ok() 进行完整检查。否则，将永远不会为该cookie路径调用 return_ok() 。

trans-unit.source: If spec.loader.create_module does not return None, then any pre-existing attributes will not be reset. Also, no AttributeError will be raised if triggered while accessing spec or setting an attribute on the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果 spec.loader.create_module 不返回 None ，则不会重置任何先前存在的属性。另外，如果在访问规范或在模块上设置属性时触发，则不会引发 AttributeError 。

trans-unit.source: If find_spec() is defined, backwards-compatible functionality is provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 find_spec() ，则提供向后兼容的功能。

trans-unit.source: If find_spec() is defined then backwards-compatible functionality is provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 find_spec() ，则将提供向后兼容的功能。

trans-unit.source: If format is one of the native format specifiers from the struct module, indexing with an integer or a tuple of integers is also supported and returns a single element with the correct type. One-dimensional memoryviews can be indexed with an integer or a one-integer tuple. Multi-dimensional memoryviews can be indexed with tuples of exactly ndim integers where ndim is the number of dimensions. Zero-dimensional memoryviews can be indexed with the empty tuple.
trans-unit.target: 如果 format 是 struct 模块中的本机格式说明符之一，则还支持使用整数或整数元组建立索引，并返回具有正确类型的单个元素。一维内存视图可以用整数或一整数元组建立索引。多维内存视图可以使用精确ndim整数的元组建立索引，其中ndim是维数。零维内存视图可以用空元组建立索引。

trans-unit.source: If __getstate__() returns a false value, the __setstate__() method will not be called upon unpickling.
trans-unit.target: 如果 __getstate__() 返回一个假值，则在 __setstate__() 时不会调用__setstate __（）方法。

trans-unit.source: If putenv() is not provided, a modified copy of this mapping may be passed to the appropriate process-creation functions to cause child processes to use a modified environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 putenv() ,则可以将此映射的修改后的副本传递到适当的进程创建函数，以使子进程使用修改后的环境。

trans-unit.source: If persistent_id() returns None, obj is pickled as usual. Any other value causes Pickler to emit the returned value as a persistent ID for obj. The meaning of this persistent ID should be defined by Unpickler.persistent_load(). Note that the value returned by persistent_id() cannot itself have a persistent ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果 persistent_id() 返回 None ，则照常腌制obj。任何其他值都会导致 Pickler 发出返回的值作为obj的持久ID 。此永久性ID的含义应由 Unpickler.persistent_load() 定义。请注意，由 persistent_id() 返回的值本身不能具有持久性ID。

trans-unit.source: If whitespace_split is False, any character not declared to be a word character, whitespace, or a quote will be returned as a single-character token. If it is True, shlex will only split words in whitespaces;
trans-unit.target: 如果 whitespace_split 为 False ，则任何未声明为单词字符，空格或引号的字符都将作为单字符标记返回。如果为 True ， shlex 只会在空白处分割单词；

trans-unit.source: If getdefaulttimeout() is not None, sockets returned by the accept() method inherit that timeout. Otherwise, the behaviour depends on settings of the listening socket:
trans-unit.target: 如果 getdefaulttimeout() 不为 None ，则 accept() 方法返回的套接字将继承该超时。否则，其行为取决于侦听套接字的设置：

trans-unit.source: If returncode is non-zero, raise a CalledProcessError.
trans-unit.target: 如果 returncode 不为零，则引发 CalledProcessError 。

trans-unit.source: If dwFlags specifies STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW, this attribute can be any of the values that can be specified in the nCmdShow parameter for the ShowWindow function, except for SW_SHOWDEFAULT. Otherwise, this attribute is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dwFlags 指定 STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW ，则此属性可以是在ShowWindow函数的 nCmdShow 参数中可以指定的任何值， SW_SHOWDEFAULT 除外。否则，将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: If dwFlags specifies STARTF_USESTDHANDLES, this attribute is the standard error handle for the process. Otherwise, this attribute is ignored and the default for standard error is the console window’s buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dwFlags 指定 STARTF_USESTDHANDLES ，则此属性是该过程的标准错误句柄。否则，将忽略此属性，并且标准错误的默认值是控制台窗口的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If dwFlags specifies STARTF_USESTDHANDLES, this attribute is the standard input handle for the process. If STARTF_USESTDHANDLES is not specified, the default for standard input is the keyboard buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dwFlags 指定 STARTF_USESTDHANDLES ，则此属性是该过程的标准输入句柄。如果未指定 STARTF_USESTDHANDLES ，则标准输入的默认值为键盘缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If dwFlags specifies STARTF_USESTDHANDLES, this attribute is the standard output handle for the process. Otherwise, this attribute is ignored and the default for standard output is the console window’s buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 dwFlags 指定 STARTF_USESTDHANDLES ，则此属性是该进程的标准输出句柄。否则，将忽略此属性，标准输出的默认值是控制台窗口的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If openlog() has not been called prior to the call to syslog(), openlog() will be called with no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果 openlog() 并没有被称为呼叫之前到 syslog() 函数， openlog() 将不带参数调用。

trans-unit.source: If expand_tabs is false and replace_whitespace is true, each tab character will be replaced by a single space, which is not the same as tab expansion.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expand_tabs 为假且 replace_whitespace 是真实的，每个选项卡字符将通过一个单一的空间，这是被替换不一样制表符扩展。

trans-unit.source: If replace_whitespace is false, newlines may appear in the middle of a line and cause strange output. For this reason, text should be split into paragraphs (using str.splitlines() or similar) which are wrapped separately.
trans-unit.target: 如果 replace_whitespace 为false，则换行符可能会出现在一行的中间，并导致奇怪的输出。因此，应将文本拆分为段落（使用 str.splitlines() 或类似内容），并分别包装。

trans-unit.source: If setUp() fails, meaning that tearDown() is not called, then any cleanup functions added will still be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setUp() 失败，这意味着未调用 tearDown() ，则仍将调用添加的任何清理函数。

trans-unit.source: If setUp() succeeded, tearDown() will be run whether the test method succeeded or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setUp() 成功，则无论测试方法成功与否，都将运行 tearDown() 。

trans-unit.source: If setUpClass() fails, meaning that tearDownClass() is not called, then any cleanup functions added will still be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setUpClass() 失败，这意味着未调用 tearDownClass() ，则仍将调用添加的任何清理函数。

trans-unit.source: If side_effect is set then it will be called after the call has been recorded, so if side_effect raises an exception the call is still recorded.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 side_effect ，则将在记录了该调用之后将其调用，因此，如果 side_effect 引发了异常，则仍会记录该调用。

trans-unit.source: If patch.multiple() is used as a context manager, the value returned by the context manager is a dictionary where created mocks are keyed by name:
trans-unit.target: 如果将 patch.multiple() 用作上下文管理器，则上下文管理器返回的值是一个字典，其中创建的模拟由名称进行键控：

trans-unit.source: If origin_server is true, this string attribute is used to set the HTTP version of the response set to the client. It defaults to "1.0".
trans-unit.target: 如果 origin_server 为true，则此字符串属性用于将响应集的HTTP版本设置为客户端。默认为 "1.0" 。

trans-unit.source: If buffer_text is enabled, the number of bytes stored in the buffer. These bytes represent UTF-8 encoded text. This attribute has no meaningful interpretation when buffer_text is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 buffer_text ，则存储在缓冲区中的字节数。这些字节代表UTF-8编码的文本。当 buffer_text 为false 时，此属性没有有意义的解释。

trans-unit.source: If True, any defects encountered will be raised as errors. If False (the default), defects will be passed to the register_defect() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则遇到的任何缺陷都将引发错误。如果为 False （默认值），则缺陷将传递给 register_defect() 方法。

trans-unit.source: If True, lines starting with “From “ in the body are escaped by putting a > in front of them. This parameter is used when the message is being serialized by a generator. Default: False.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则在主体中以“ From”开头的行将在其前面加上 > 进行转义。生成器正在序列化消息时使用此参数。默认值： False 。

trans-unit.source: If __hash__() is not explicit defined, or if it is set to None, then dataclass()may add an implicit __hash__() method. Although not recommended, you can force dataclass() to create a __hash__() method with unsafe_hash=True. This might be the case if your class is logically immutable but can nonetheless be mutated. This is a specialized use case and should be considered carefully.
trans-unit.target: 如果未明确定义 __hash__() 或将其设置为 None ，则 __hash__() dataclass() 可以添加隐式__hash __（）方法。虽然不建议，您可以强制 dataclass() 来创建一个 __hash__() 与方法 unsafe_hash=True 。如果您的班级在逻辑上是不可变的，但仍然可以变更，则可能是这种情况。这是一个特殊的用例，应仔细考虑。

trans-unit.source: If __new__() or __init__() is defined the value of the enum member will be passed to those methods:
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 __new__() 或 __init__() ，则枚举成员的值将传递给这些方法：

trans-unit.source: If __hash__() is not explicit defined, or if it is set to None, then dataclass()may add an implicit __hash__() method. Although not recommended, you can force dataclass() to create a __hash__() method with unsafe_hash=True. This might be the case if your class is logically immutable but can nonetheless be mutated. This is a specialized use case and should be considered carefully.
If __new__() or __init__() is defined the value of the enum member will be passed to those methods:
If signal.SIGINT isn’t handled by Python (it was set to signal.SIG_DFL or signal.SIG_IGN), this function does nothing.
If str data is passed in, the result will also contain only str data. If bytes or bytearray data is passed in, the result will contain only bytes data.
trans-unit.target: 如果传入 str 数据，则结果还将仅包含 str 数据。如果传入 bytes 或字节 bytearray 数据，则结果将仅包含 bytes 数据。

trans-unit.source: If str or bytes is passed in, it is returned unchanged. Otherwise __fspath__() is called and its value is returned as long as it is a str or bytes object. In all other cases, TypeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果传入 str 或 bytes ，则将其返回原样。否则，将 __fspath__() 并返回它的值，只要它是 str 或 bytes 对象即可。在所有其他情况下，都会 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If -, -c, or r is used, all arguments are placed in sys.argv[1:...] and sys.argv[0] is set to '', '-c', or '-r'. No editor window is opened, even if that is the default set in the Options dialog.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 - ，- -c 或 r ，则所有参数都放在 sys.argv[1:...] 并且 sys.argv[0] 设置为 '' ， '-c' 或 '-r' 。即使是“选项”对话框中的默认设置，也不会打开任何编辑器窗口。

trans-unit.source: If -h or --help is supplied at the command line, the ArgumentParser help will be printed:
trans-unit.target: 如果在命令行提供 -h 或 --help ，则将打印ArgumentParser帮助：

trans-unit.source: If A <: Complex and B <: Real without sharing any other knowledge, then the appropriate shared operation is the one involving the built in complex, and both __radd__() s land there, so a+b == b+a.
trans-unit.target: 如果 A <: Complex 和 B <: Real 不共享任何其他知识，则适当的共享操作是涉及内置 complex 的操作，并且 __radd__() 都位于该位置，因此 a+b == b+a 。

trans-unit.source: If A <: Complex and B <: Real without sharing any other knowledge, then the appropriate shared operation is the one involving the built in complex, and both __radd__() s land there, so a+b == b+a.
If A defines an __add__() which accepts b, all is well.
trans-unit.target: 如果 A 定义了一个接受 b 的 __add__() ，那么一切都很好。

trans-unit.source: If A defines an __add__() which accepts b, all is well.

If A falls back to the boilerplate code, and it were to return a value from __add__(), we’d miss the possibility that B defines a more intelligent __radd__(), so the boilerplate should return NotImplemented from __add__(). (Or A may not implement __add__() at all.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 A 回落到样板代码，并且它是从返回一个值 __add__() ，我们会想念的可能性 B 定义了一个更智能 __radd__() ，所以样板应该返回 NotImplemented 从 __add__() 。（或者 A 可能根本不实现 __add__() 。）

trans-unit.source: If A falls back to the boilerplate code, and it were to return a value from __add__(), we’d miss the possibility that B defines a more intelligent __radd__(), so the boilerplate should return NotImplemented from __add__(). (Or A may not implement __add__() at all.)
If B <: A, Python tries B.__radd__ before A.__add__. This is ok, because it was implemented with knowledge of A, so it can handle those instances before delegating to Complex.
trans-unit.target: 如果 B <: A ，Python B.__radd__ 在 A.__add__ 之前尝试B .__ radd__。可以，因为它是使用 A 的知识实现的，因此它可以在委派给 Complex 之前处理这些实例。

trans-unit.source: If False, follow RFC 5322, supporting non-ASCII characters in headers by encoding them as “encoded words”. If True, follow RFC 6532 and use utf-8 encoding for headers. Messages formatted in this way may be passed to SMTP servers that support the SMTPUTF8 extension (RFC 6531).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 False ，则遵循RFC 5322，通过将标头编码为“编码字”来支持标头中的非ASCII字符。如果为 True ，则遵循RFC 6532并为标题使用 utf-8 编码。可以将以这种方式格式化的邮件传递到支持 SMTPUTF8 扩展名（RFC 6531）的SMTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: If SMTPUTF8 is included in mail_options, and the server supports it, from_addr and to_addrs may contain non-ASCII characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SMTPUTF8 包含在mail_options中，并且服务器支持它，则from_addr和to_addrs可能包含非ASCII字符。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is a generator iterator or coroutine object it is left as is. Otherwise, implements TOS = iter(TOS).
trans-unit.target: 如果 TOS 是生成器迭代器或协程对象，则将其保留不变。否则，实现 TOS = iter(TOS) 。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is a generator iterator or coroutine object it is left as is. Otherwise, implements TOS = iter(TOS).

If True, tokens will only be split in whitespaces. This is useful, for example, for parsing command lines with shlex, getting tokens in a similar way to shell arguments. When used in combination with punctuation_chars, tokens will be split on whitespace in addition to those characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 True ，则令牌将仅在空格中分割。例如，这对于使用 shlex 解析命令行，以类似于shell参数的方式获取令牌很有用。与 punctuation_chars 结合使用时，除这些字符外，令牌还将在空白处拆分。

trans-unit.source: If WIFEXITED(status) is true, return the integer parameter to the exit(2) system call. Otherwise, the return value is meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WIFEXITED(status) 为true，则将integer参数返回到exit（2）系统调用。否则，返回值将无意义。

trans-unit.source: If arcname (or filename, if arcname is not given) contains a null byte, the name of the file in the archive will be truncated at the null byte.
trans-unit.target: 如果 arcname （或 filename ，如果未提供 arcname ）包含一个空字节，则归档文件中的文件名将在该空字节处被截断。

trans-unit.source: If e is an instance of BufferTooShort then e.args[0] will give the message as a byte string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 e 是 BufferTooShort 的实例，则 e.args[0] 将以字节字符串形式给出消息。

trans-unit.source: If eq and frozen are both true, by default dataclass() will generate a __hash__() method for you. If eq is true and frozen is false, __hash__() will be set to None, marking it unhashable (which it is, since it is mutable). If eq is false, __hash__() will be left untouched meaning the __hash__() method of the superclass will be used (if the superclass is object, this means it will fall back to id-based hashing).
trans-unit.target: 如果 eq 和 frozen 都为true，默认 dataclass() 将产生一个 __hash__() 为你的方法。如果 eq 是真实的， frozen 是假的， __hash__() 将被设置为 None ，将其标记unhashable（它是，因为它是可变的）。如果 eq 为false，则 __hash__() 将保持不变，这意味着将使用超类的 __hash__() 方法（如果超类为 object ，这意味着它将退回到基于id的哈希）。

trans-unit.source: If eq and frozen are both true, by default dataclass() will generate a __hash__() method for you. If eq is true and frozen is false, __hash__() will be set to None, marking it unhashable (which it is, since it is mutable). If eq is false, __hash__() will be left untouched meaning the __hash__() method of the superclass will be used (if the superclass is object, this means it will fall back to id-based hashing).
If filename.py is specified its contents are tokenized to stdout. Otherwise, tokenization is performed on stdin.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 filename.py ，其内容将标记为stdout。否则，将在标准输入上执行标记化。

trans-unit.source: If from __future__ import annotations is used in Python 3.7 or later, annotations are not evaluated at function definition time. Instead, they are stored as strings in __annotations__, This makes it unnecessary to use quotes around the annotation. (see PEP 563).
If gather() is cancelled, all submitted awaitables (that have not completed yet) are also cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 如果collect gather() 被取消，所有已提交的等待（尚未完成）也将被取消。

trans-unit.source: If infile is specified its contents are parsed to AST and dumped to stdout. Otherwise, the content is read from stdin.
If load_tests exists then discovery does not recurse into the package, load_tests is responsible for loading all tests in the package.
trans-unit.target: 如果 load_tests 存在，那么发现操作不递归到包装， load_tests 负责加载包中的所有测试。

trans-unit.source: If module is not supplied, and Enum cannot determine what it is, the new Enum members will not be unpicklable; to keep errors closer to the source, pickling will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 module ，并且Enum无法确定模块是什么，那么新的Enum成员将不会被取消；为了使错误更接近源，将禁用酸洗。

trans-unit.source: If newline='' is not specified, newlines embedded inside quoted fields will not be interpreted correctly, and on platforms that use \r\n linendings on write an extra \r will be added. It should always be safe to specify newline='', since the csv module does its own (universal) newline handling.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 newline='' ，嵌入引号中的换行符将无法正确解释，并且在使用 \r\n linendings的平台上将添加额外的 \r 。指定 newline='' 应该永远是安全的，因为csv模块会执行自己的（通用）换行符处理。

trans-unit.source: If newline='' is not specified, newlines embedded inside quoted fields will not be interpreted correctly, and on platforms that use \r\n linendings on write an extra \r will be added. It should always be safe to specify newline='', since the csv module does its own (universal) newline handling.
If os.chflags in os.supports_follow_symlinks is True, copystat() can modify the flags of a symbolic link. (os.chflags is not available on all platforms.)
trans-unit.target: 如果 os.chflags in os.supports_follow_symlinks 为 True ，则 copystat() 可以修改符号链接的标志。（ os.chflags 并非在所有平台上都可用。）

trans-unit.source: If os.chmod in os.supports_follow_symlinks is True, copystat() can modify the permission bits of a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 如果 os.chmod in os.supports_follow_symlinks 为 True ，则 copystat() 可以修改符号链接的权限位。

trans-unit.source: If os.utime in os.supports_follow_symlinks is True, copystat() can modify the last access and modification times of a symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 如果 os.utime in os.supports_follow_symlinks 为 True ，则 copystat() 可以修改符号链接的最后访问时间和修改时间。

trans-unit.source: If proxy is a proxy whose referent is obj then the expression
trans-unit.target: 如果 proxy 是其引用为 obj 的代理，则表达式

trans-unit.source: If related is not included in preferencelist, consider the root part (or subpart of the root part) of any related encountered as a candidate if the (sub-)part matches a preference.
trans-unit.target: 如果“ related 性”未包含在首选项列表中，则如果（子）部分与首选项匹配，则将遇到的任何相关的根部（或根部的子部分）视为候选。

trans-unit.source: If respect_handler_level is True, a handler’s level is respected (compared with the level for the message) when deciding whether to pass messages to that handler; otherwise, the behaviour is as in previous Python versions - to always pass each message to each handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果 respect_handler_level 为 True ，则在决定是否将消息传递给该处理程序时，将遵守处理程序的级别（与消息的级别相比）。否则，行为与以前的Python版本相同-始终将每个消息传递给每个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If self.tzinfo is tz, self.astimezone(tz) is equal to self: no adjustment of date or time data is performed. Else the result is local time in the timezone tz, representing the same UTC time as self: after astz = dt.astimezone(tz), astz - astz.utcoffset() will have the same date and time data as dt - dt.utcoffset().
trans-unit.target: 如果 self.tzinfo 是tz， self.astimezone(tz) 等于self：不执行日期或时间数据的调整。否则的结果是当地时间的时区TZ，表示相同UTC时间的自我：后 astz = dt.astimezone(tz) ， astz - astz.utcoffset() 将具有相同的日期和时间数据 dt - dt.utcoffset() 。

trans-unit.source: If setUpModule() fails, meaning that tearDownModule() is not called, then any cleanup functions added will still be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setUpModule() 失败，这意味着未调用 tearDownModule() ，则仍将调用添加的任何清理函数。

trans-unit.source: If side_effect is a function then whatever that function returns is what calls to the mock return. The side_effect function is called with the same arguments as the mock. This allows you to vary the return value of the call dynamically, based on the input:
trans-unit.target: 如果 side_effect 是一个函数，那么该函数返回的值就是对模拟返回值的调用。使用与模拟相同的参数调用 side_effect 函数。这使您可以根据输入动态地更改调用的返回值：

trans-unit.source: If signal.SIGINT isn’t handled by Python (it was set to signal.SIG_DFL or signal.SIG_IGN), this function does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果 signal.SIGINT 不是由Python处理的（将其设置为 signal.SIG_DFL 或 signal.SIG_IGN ），则此函数不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If something() is cancelled by other means (i.e. from within itself) that would also cancel shield().
trans-unit.target: 如果通过其他方式（即从自身内部 something() 取消了something（），那也将取消 shield() 。

trans-unit.source: If sys.stdin is used more than once, the second and further use will return no lines, except perhaps for interactive use, or if it has been explicitly reset (e.g. using sys.stdin.seek(0)).
trans-unit.target: 如果 sys.stdin 被多次使用，则第二次及以后的使用将不返回任何行，除非是交互式使用，或者已被明确重置（例如，使用 sys.stdin.seek(0) ）。

trans-unit.source: If sys is reset by user code, such as with importlib.reload(sys), IDLE’s changes are lost and input from the keyboard and output to the screen will not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用用户代码（例如 importlib.reload(sys) )将 sys 重置，则IDLE的更改将丢失，并且键盘输入和屏幕输出将无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: If tempdir is None (the default) at any call to any of the above functions except gettempprefix() it is initialized following the algorithm described in gettempdir().
trans-unit.target: 如果 tempdir 在上述任何一个函数的任何调用 gettempprefix() 除外）上都为 None （默认值），则按照 gettempdir() 中描述的算法进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: If timeout > 0, this specifies the maximum wait time, in seconds. If timeout <= 0, the call won’t block, and will report the currently ready file objects. If timeout is None, the call will block until a monitored file object becomes ready.
trans-unit.target: 如果 timeout > 0 ，则以秒为单位指定最大等待时间。如果 timeout <= 0 ，则调用将不会阻塞，并且将报告当前准备就绪的文件对象。如果超时为 None ，则调用将阻塞，直到被监视的文件对象准备就绪为止。

trans-unit.source: If type_comments=True is given, the parser is modified to check and return type comments as specified by PEP 484 and PEP 526. This is equivalent to adding ast.PyCF_TYPE_COMMENTS to the flags passed to compile(). This will report syntax errors for misplaced type comments. Without this flag, type comments will be ignored, and the type_comment field on selected AST nodes will always be None. In addition, the locations of # type: ignore comments will be returned as the type_ignores attribute of Module (otherwise it is always an empty list).

If type_comments=True is given, the parser is modified to check and return type comments as specified by PEP 484 and PEP 526. This is equivalent to adding ast.PyCF_TYPE_COMMENTS to the flags passed to compile(). This will report syntax errors for misplaced type comments. Without this flag, type comments will be ignored, and the type_comment field on selected AST nodes will always be None. In addition, the locations of # type: ignore comments will be returned as the type_ignores attribute of Module (otherwise it is always an empty list).
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 type_comments=True ，则将解析器修改为检查并返回PEP 484和PEP 526指定的类型注释。这等效于将 ast.PyCF_TYPE_COMMENTS 添加到传递给 compile() 的标志中。这将报告错误的类型注释的语法错误。没有此标志，类型注释将被忽略，并且所选AST节点上的 type_comment 字段将始终为 None 。此外， # type: ignore 注释的位置将作为 Module 的 type_ignores 属性返回（否则，它始终是一个空列表）。

trans-unit.source: If tzname() returns None, %Z is replaced by an empty string. Otherwise %Z is replaced by the returned value, which must be a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tzname() 返回 None ，则 %Z 替换为空字符串。否则， %Z 将被返回值替换，该值必须是字符串。

trans-unit.source: If x = m / n is a negative rational number define hash(x) as -hash(-x). If the resulting hash is -1, replace it with -2.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x = m / n 为负有理数， -hash(-x) hash(x) 定义为-hash（-x）。如果结果哈希为 -1 ，则将其替换为 -2 。

trans-unit.source: If x = m / n is a nonnegative rational number and n is divisible by P (but m is not) then n has no inverse modulo P and the rule above doesn’t apply; in this case define hash(x) to be the constant value sys.hash_info.inf.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x = m / n 是一个非负有理数，并且 n 可被 P 整除（但 m 无法被n整除），则 n 不具有反模 P ,并且上述规则不适用；在这种情况下，将 hash(x) 定义为常量 sys.hash_info.inf 。

trans-unit.source: If x = m / n is a nonnegative rational number and n is not divisible by P, define hash(x) as m * invmod(n, P) % P, where invmod(n, P) gives the inverse of n modulo P.
trans-unit.target: 如果 x = m / n 是非负有理数且 n 不被 P 整除， m * invmod(n, P) % P hash(x) 定义为m * invmod（n，P）％P，其中 invmod(n, P) 给出 n 模 P 的倒数。

trans-unit.source: If PIPE is passed to stdin argument, the Process.stdin attribute will point to a StreamWriter instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果将PIPE传递给stdin参数，则 Process.stdin 属性将指向 StreamWriter 实例。

trans-unit.source: If PIPE is passed to stdout or stderr arguments, the Process.stdout and Process.stderr attributes will point to StreamReader instances.
trans-unit.target: 如果将PIPE传递给stdout或stderr参数，则 Process.stdout 和 Process.stderr 属性将指向 StreamReader 实例。

trans-unit.source: If a and b are of different lengths, or if an error occurs, a timing attack could theoretically reveal information about the types and lengths of a and b—but not their values.
trans-unit.target: 如果a和b的长度不同，或者发生错误，则从理论上讲，定时攻击可以揭示有关a和b的类型和长度的信息，但不能揭示其值。

trans-unit.source: If a is an int, it is used directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果a是一个int，则直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: If a is omitted or None, the current system time is used. If randomness sources are provided by the operating system, they are used instead of the system time (see the os.urandom() function for details on availability).
trans-unit.target: 如果一个被省略或 None ，当前系统时间被使用。如果操作系统提供了随机性源，那么将使用它们而不是系统时间（有关可用性的详细信息，请参见 os.urandom() 函数）。

trans-unit.source: If addr_type is TIPC_ADDR_ID, then v1 is the node, v2 is the reference, and v3 should be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果addr_type是 TIPC_ADDR_ID ，则v1是节点，v2是引用，并且v3应该设置为0。

trans-unit.source: If addr_type is TIPC_ADDR_NAME, then v1 is the server type, v2 is the port identifier, and v3 should be 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果addr_type是 TIPC_ADDR_NAME ，则v1是服务器类型，v2是端口标识符，并且v3应该为0。

trans-unit.source: If addr_type is TIPC_ADDR_NAMESEQ, then v1 is the server type, v2 is the lower port number, and v3 is the upper port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果addr_type是 TIPC_ADDR_NAMESEQ ，则v1是服务器类型，v2是下端口号，v3是上端口号。

trans-unit.source: If aliased is true, the function will use aliases for various platforms that report system names which differ from their common names, for example SunOS will be reported as Solaris. The system_alias() function is used to implement this.
trans-unit.target: 如果aliased为true，则该函数将为各种平台使用别名，这些平台报告的系统名称与其通用名称不同，例如，SunOS将报告为Solaris。该 system_alias() 函数来实现这一点。

trans-unit.source: If all_frames is True, all frames of the traceback are checked. If all_frames is False, only the most recent frame is checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果all_frames为 True ，则检查回溯的所有帧。如果all_frames为 False ，则仅检查最近的帧。

trans-unit.source: If allowZip64 is True (the default) zipfile will create ZIP files that use the ZIP64 extensions when the zipfile is larger than 4 GiB. If it is falsezipfile will raise an exception when the ZIP file would require ZIP64 extensions.
trans-unit.target: 如果allowZip64为 True （默认值），则zipfile会创建一个ZIP文件，当zipfile大于4 GiB时，将使用ZIP64扩展名。如果为 false 当ZIP文件需要ZIP64扩展名时， zipfile 将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If allow_nan is false (default: True), then it will be a ValueError to serialize out of range float values (nan, inf, -inf) in strict compliance of the JSON specification. If allow_nan is true, their JavaScript equivalents (NaN, Infinity, -Infinity) will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果allow_nan为false（默认值： True ），则严格遵守JSON规范，将超出范围的 float 值（ nan ， inf ， -inf ）序列化将是 ValueError 。如果allow_nan为true，则将使用它们的JavaScript等效项（ NaN ， Infinity 和 -Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: If allow_nan is true (the default), then NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity will be encoded as such. This behavior is not JSON specification compliant, but is consistent with most JavaScript based encoders and decoders. Otherwise, it will be a ValueError to encode such floats.
trans-unit.target: 如果allow_nan为true（默认设置），则 NaN ， Infinity 和 -Infinity 将被编码为此类。此行为不符合JSON规范，但与大多数基于JavaScript的编码器和解码器一致。否则，对此类浮点数进行编码将是 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: If altinstall is set, then pipX will not be installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果altinstall设置，然后 pipX 将不会被安装。

trans-unit.source: If any_order is false then the awaits must be sequential. There can be extra calls before or after the specified awaits.
trans-unit.target: 如果any_order为false，则等待必须是连续的。在指定等待之前或之后可能会有额外的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If any_order is false then the calls must be sequential. There can be extra calls before or after the specified calls.
trans-unit.target: 如果any_order为false，则调用必须是连续的。在指定呼叫之前或之后可能会有额外的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If any_order is true then the awaits can be in any order, but they must all appear in await_args_list.
trans-unit.target: 如果any_order为true，则等待可以以任何顺序进行，但是它们必须全部出现在 await_args_list 中。

trans-unit.source: If any_order is true then the calls can be in any order, but they must all appear in mock_calls.
trans-unit.target: 如果any_order为true，则调用可以按任何顺序进行，但是它们必须全部出现在 mock_calls 中。

trans-unit.source: If arcname is specified, it is used as the name within the archive. If arcname is not specified, the name will be the same as filename, but with any drive letter and leading path separators removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了arcname，它将用作存档中的名称。如果未指定arcname，则该名称将与filename相同，但会删除任何驱动器号和前导路径分隔符。

trans-unit.source: If atTime is not None, it must be a datetime.time instance which specifies the time of day when rollover occurs, for the cases where rollover is set to happen “at midnight” or “on a particular weekday”. Note that in these cases, the atTime value is effectively used to compute the initial rollover, and subsequent rollovers would be calculated via the normal interval calculation.
trans-unit.target: 如果atTime不为 None ，则它必须是一个 datetime.time 实例，该实例指定发生翻转的一天中的时间，对于将翻转设置为“在午夜”或“在特定工作日”发生的情况。请注意，在这些情况下，atTime值可有效地用于计算初始翻转，随后的翻转将通过正常间隔计算来计算。

trans-unit.source: If authkey is given and not None, it should be a byte string and will be used as the secret key for an HMAC-based authentication challenge. No authentication is done if authkey is None. AuthenticationError is raised if authentication fails. See Authentication keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定authkey而不是None，则它应该是一个字节字符串，并将用作基于HMAC的身份验证质询的秘密密钥。如果authkey为None，则不进行身份验证。如果身份验证失败，则会引发 AuthenticationError 。请参阅身份验证密钥。

trans-unit.source: If aw is a coroutine it is automatically scheduled as a Task.
trans-unit.target: 如果aw是一个协程，它将自动安排为任务。

trans-unit.source: If backupCount is nonzero, at most backupCount files will be kept, and if more would be created when rollover occurs, the oldest one is deleted. The deletion logic uses the interval to determine which files to delete, so changing the interval may leave old files lying around.
trans-unit.target: 如果backupCount不为零，则最多将保留backupCount文件，并且如果发生翻转时将创建更多文件，则最早的文件将被删除。删除逻辑使用间隔来确定要删除的文件，因此更改间隔可能会使旧文件留下来。

trans-unit.source: If blocking is false executes the scheduled events due to expire soonest (if any) and then return the deadline of the next scheduled call in the scheduler (if any).
trans-unit.target: 如果阻塞为false，则执行计划事件（由于到期）（最快）（如果有的话），然后返回计划程序中下一个计划调用的截止日期（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If body is specified, the specified data is sent after the headers are finished. It may be a str, a bytes-like object, an open file object, or an iterable of bytes. If body is a string, it is encoded as ISO-8859-1, the default for HTTP. If it is a bytes-like object, the bytes are sent as is. If it is a file object, the contents of the file is sent; this file object should support at least the read() method. If the file object is an instance of io.TextIOBase, the data returned by the read() method will be encoded as ISO-8859-1, otherwise the data returned by read() is sent as is. If body is an iterable, the elements of the iterable are sent as is until the iterable is exhausted.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了body，则在标头完成后发送指定的数据。它可能是一个 str ，一个类似字节的对象，一个打开的文件对象或一个可迭代的 bytes 。如果body是字符串，则编码为ISO-8859-1，这是HTTP的默认值。如果它是类似字节的对象，则按原样发送字节。如果是文件对象，则发送文件的内容；否则，发送文件的内容。该文件对象至少应支持 read() 方法。如果文件对象是 io.TextIOBase 的实例，则 read() 方法返回的数据将被编码为ISO-8859-1，否则， read() 返回的数据将被编码。按原样发送。如果body是可迭代的，则可迭代的元素将按原样发送，直到可迭代用尽。

trans-unit.source: If body is specified, the specified data is sent after the headers are finished. It may be a str, a bytes-like object, an open file object, or an iterable of bytes. If body is a string, it is encoded as ISO-8859-1, the default for HTTP. If it is a bytes-like object, the bytes are sent as is. If it is a file object, the contents of the file is sent; this file object should support at least the read() method. If the file object is an instance of io.TextIOBase, the data returned by the read() method will be encoded as ISO-8859-1, otherwise the data returned by read() is sent as is. If body is an iterable, the elements of the iterable are sent as is until the iterable is exhausted.
If buffer_callback is None (the default), buffer views are serialized into file as part of the pickle stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果buffer_callback为None（默认值），则将缓冲区视图作为pickle流的一部分序列化到文件中。

trans-unit.source: If buffer_callback is not None, then it can be called any number of times with a buffer view. If the callback returns a false value (such as None), the given buffer is out-of-band; otherwise the buffer is serialized in-band, i.e. inside the pickle stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果buffer_callback不为None，则可以在缓冲区视图中多次调用它。如果回调返回一个假值（例如None），则给定的缓冲区带外；否则，缓冲区将在带内（即在泡菜流中）进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: If buffers is None (the default), then all data necessary for deserialization must be contained in the pickle stream. This means that the buffer_callback argument was None when a Pickler was instantiated (or when dump() or dumps() was called).
trans-unit.target: 如果buffers为None（默认值），则反序列化所需的所有数据都必须包含在pickle流中。这意味着buffer_callback论点是无时 Pickler 被实例化（或当 dump() 或 dumps() 被调用）。

trans-unit.source: If buffers is not None, it should be an iterable of buffer-enabled objects that is consumed each time the pickle stream references an out-of-band buffer view. Such buffers have been given in order to the buffer_callback of a Pickler object.
trans-unit.target: 如果buffers不为None，则每次腌制流引用带外缓冲区视图时，消耗的对象应该是可迭代的启用缓冲区的对象。为了给Pickler对象的buffer_callback提供了这样的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If c is an instance of C, c.x will invoke the getter, c.x = value will invoke the setter and del c.x the deleter.
trans-unit.target: 如果c是C的实例，则 c.x 将调用getter， c.x = value 将调用setter，而 del c.x 是删除器。

trans-unit.source: If callback is given and is not None, it will be called after each trial with two arguments: callback(number, time_taken).
trans-unit.target: 如果给定callback而不是 None ，则每次尝试后将使用两个参数 callback(number, time_taken) ：callback（number，time_taken）。

trans-unit.source: If callback is specified then it should be a callable which accepts a single argument. When the result becomes ready callback is applied to it, that is unless the call failed, in which case the error_callback is applied instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了callback，那么它应该是一个可以接受单个参数的callable。当结果准备就绪时，将对其应用回调，除非调用失败，否则将应用error_callback。

trans-unit.source: If cancel_futures is True, this method will cancel all pending futures that the executor has not started running. Any futures that are completed or running won’t be cancelled, regardless of the value of cancel_futures.

If capture is False, the redirection of warnings to the logging system will stop, and warnings will be redirected to their original destinations (i.e. those in effect before captureWarnings(True) was called).
trans-unit.target: 如果capture为 False ，则将停止将警告重定向到日志记录系统，并将警告重定向到其原始目的地（即，在 captureWarnings(True) 之前生效的警告）。

trans-unit.source: If capture is True, warnings issued by the warnings module will be redirected to the logging system. Specifically, a warning will be formatted using warnings.formatwarning() and the resulting string logged to a logger named 'py.warnings' with a severity of WARNING.
trans-unit.target: 如果capture为 True ，则 warnings 模块发出的警告将重定向到日志记录系统。具体来说，将使用 warnings.formatwarning() 格式化警告，并将结果字符串记录到名为 'py.warnings' 的记录器中，严重性为 WARNING 。

trans-unit.source: If capture_output is true, stdout and stderr will be captured. When used, the internal Popen object is automatically created with stdout=PIPE and stderr=PIPE. The stdout and stderr arguments may not be supplied at the same time as capture_output. If you wish to capture and combine both streams into one, use stdout=PIPE and stderr=STDOUT instead of capture_output.
trans-unit.target: 如果capture_output为true，则将捕获stdout和stderr。使用时，将使用 stdout=PIPE 和 stderr=PIPE 自动创建内部 Popen 对象。的标准输出和stderr的参数可能不能在相同的时间被供给capture_output。如果希望捕获并将两个流合并为一个，请使用 stdout=PIPE 和 stderr=STDOUT 而不是capture_output。

trans-unit.source: If chain is not True, __cause__ and __context__ will not be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 如果chain不是 True ，则不会格式化 __cause__ 和 __context__ 。

trans-unit.source: If charset is provided (which is valid only for str), encode the string to bytes using the specified character set. The default is utf-8. If the specified charset is a known alias for a standard MIME charset name, use the standard charset instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了charset（仅对 str 有效），则使用指定的字符集将字符串编码为字节。默认值为 utf-8 。如果指定的字符集是标准MIME字符集名称的已知别名，请改用标准字符集。

trans-unit.source: If check is true, and the process exits with a non-zero exit code, a CalledProcessError exception will be raised. Attributes of that exception hold the arguments, the exit code, and stdout and stderr if they were captured.
trans-unit.target: 如果check为true，并且进程以非零退出代码退出，则将引发 CalledProcessError 异常。该异常的属性包含参数，退出代码以及stdout和stderr（如果已捕获）。

trans-unit.source: If check_circular is false (default: True), then the circular reference check for container types will be skipped and a circular reference will result in an OverflowError (or worse).
trans-unit.target: 如果check_circular为false（默认值： True ），则将跳过对容器类型的循环引用检查，并且循环引用将导致 OverflowError （或更糟）。

trans-unit.source: If check_circular is true (the default), then lists, dicts, and custom encoded objects will be checked for circular references during encoding to prevent an infinite recursion (which would cause an OverflowError). Otherwise, no such check takes place.
trans-unit.target: 如果check_circular为true（默认设置），则将在编码过程中检查列表，字典和自定义编码对象的循环引用，以防止无限递归（这将导致 OverflowError ）。否则，将不会进行此类检查。

trans-unit.source: If cid is specified, add a Content-ID header with cid as its value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了cid，请添加一个以cid作为其值的Content-ID标头。

trans-unit.source: If clear is true then the dictionary will be cleared before the new values are set.
trans-unit.target: 如果clear为true，则在设置新值之前将清除字典。

trans-unit.source: If close_fds is true, all file descriptors except 0, 1 and 2 will be closed before the child process is executed. Otherwise when close_fds is false, file descriptors obey their inheritable flag as described in Inheritance of File Descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 如果close_fds是真实的，但所有文件描述符 0 ， 1 和 2 执行子进程之前，将被关闭。否则，当close_fds是假的，如在文件描述符服从他们的可继承标志文件描述符的传承。

trans-unit.source: If closefd is False and a file descriptor rather than a filename was given, the underlying file descriptor will be kept open when the file is closed. If a filename is given closefd must be True (the default) otherwise an error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果closefd为 False 并且给出了文件描述符而不是文件名，则在关闭文件时，基础文件描述符将保持打开状态。如果给定文件名，closefd必须为 True （默认值），否则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If column is specified, returns the bounding box of that cell. If the item is not visible (i.e., if it is a descendant of a closed item or is scrolled offscreen), returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了column，则返回该单元格的边界框。如果该项目不可见（即，它是已关闭项目的后代或在屏幕外滚动），则返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, it must be a ssl.SSLContext instance describing the various SSL options. See HTTPSConnection for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了context，则它必须是描述各种SSL选项的 ssl.SSLContext 实例。有关更多详细信息，请参见 HTTPSConnection 。

trans-unit.source: If convert_charrefs is True (the default), all character references (except the ones in script/style elements) are automatically converted to the corresponding Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果convert_charrefs为 True （默认值），则所有字符引用（ script / style 元素中的字符引用除外）都将自动转换为相应的Unicode字符。

trans-unit.source: If copy_function is given, it must be a callable that takes two arguments src and dst, and will be used to copy src to dest if os.rename() cannot be used. If the source is a directory, copytree() is called, passing it the copy_function(). The default copy_function is copy2(). Using copy() as the copy_function allows the move to succeed when it is not possible to also copy the metadata, at the expense of not copying any of the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了copy_function，则它必须是一个带有两个参数src和dst的可调用对象，如果无法使用 os.rename() ，它将用于将src复制到dest。如果源是目录，则调用 copytree() ，并向其传递 copy_function() 。默认的copy_function是 copy2() 。使用 copy() 作为copy_function时，如果无法同时复制元数据，则移动成功，但代价是不复制任何元数据。

trans-unit.source: If copy_function is given, it must be a callable that takes two arguments src and dst, and will be used to copy src to dst if os.rename() cannot be used. If the source is a directory, copytree() is called, passing it the copy_function(). The default copy_function is copy2(). Using copy() as the copy_function allows the move to succeed when it is not possible to also copy the metadata, at the expense of not copying any of the metadata.

If copy_function is given, it must be a callable that will be used to copy each file. It will be called with the source path and the destination path as arguments. By default, copy2() is used, but any function that supports the same signature (like copy()) can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了copy_function，则它必须是可调用的，用于复制每个文件。将使用源路径和目标路径作为参数来调用它。默认情况下，使用 copy2() ，但是可以使用任何支持相同签名的函数（例如 copy() ）。

trans-unit.source: If create is True and the dirname path exists, it will be treated as an existing maildir without attempting to verify its directory layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果create为 True 且目录名路径存在，则将其视为现有maildir，而无需尝试验证其目录布局。

trans-unit.source: If cte is set, encode the payload using the specified content transfer encoding, and set the Content-Transfer-Encoding header to that value. Possible values for cte are quoted-printable, base64, 7bit, 8bit, and binary. If the input cannot be encoded in the specified encoding (for example, specifying a cte of 7bit for an input that contains non-ASCII values), raise a ValueError.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了cte，则使用指定的内容传输编码对有效负载进行编码，然后将Content-Transfer-Encoding标头设置为该值。可能值CTE被 quoted-printable ， base64 ， 7bit ， 8bit 和 binary 。如果输入不能在指定的编码被编码（例如，指定的CTE的 7bit 为包含非ASCII值的输入），养 ValueError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If cumulative is True, cumulate size and count of memory blocks of all frames of the traceback of a trace, not only the most recent frame. The cumulative mode can only be used with key_type equals to 'filename' and 'lineno'.
trans-unit.target: 如果cumulative为 True ，则累计跟踪的回溯所有帧（不仅是最近的帧）的大小和存储块数。累积模式只能与key_type等于 'filename' 和 'lineno' 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If current_offset is not None, it refers to an instruction offset in the disassembled code. Setting this means dis() will display a “current instruction” marker against the specified opcode.
trans-unit.target: 如果current_offset不为 None ，则表示反汇编代码中的指令偏移量。设置此方式意味着 dis() 将针对指定的操作码显示一个“当前指令”标记。

trans-unit.source: If cwd is not None, the function changes the working directory to cwd before executing the child. cwd can be a string, bytes or path-like object. In particular, the function looks for executable (or for the first item in args) relative to cwd if the executable path is a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 如果cwd不为 None ，则该函数在执行子级之前将工作目录更改为cwd。cwd可以是字符串，字节或类似路径的对象。特别是，如果可执行路径是相对路径，则该函数将查找相对于cwd的可执行文件（或args中的第一项）。

trans-unit.source: If cwd is not None, the function changes the working directory to cwd before executing the child. cwd can be a string, bytes or path-like object. In particular, the function looks for executable (or for the first item in args) relative to cwd if the executable path is a relative path.

If d is aware, d is normalized to UTC time, by subtracting d.utcoffset(), and a time.struct_time for the normalized time is returned. tm_isdst is forced to 0. Note that an OverflowError may be raised if d.year was MINYEAR or MAXYEAR and UTC adjustment spills over a year boundary.
trans-unit.target: 如果d知道，则通过减去 d.utcoffset() 将d标准化为UTC时间，并返回标准化时间的 time.struct_time 。 tm_isdst 强制为0。请注意，如果d .year是 MINYEAR 或 MAXYEAR ,并且UTC调整溢出到年份边界，则可能引发 OverflowError 。

trans-unit.source: If data is empty, StatisticsError will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据为空，将引发 StatisticsError 。

trans-unit.source: If data is the concatenation of multiple compressed streams, decompress all of the streams.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据是多个压缩流的串联，请解压缩所有流。

trans-unit.source: If data is the concatenation of multiple distinct compressed streams, decompress all of these streams, and return the concatenation of the results.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据是多个不同压缩流的串联，请解压缩所有这些流，然后返回结果的串联。

trans-unit.source: If ddir is given, it is prepended to the path to each file being compiled for use in compilation time tracebacks, and is also compiled in to the byte-code file, where it will be used in tracebacks and other messages in cases where the source file does not exist at the time the byte-code file is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了ddir，它会放在要编译的每个文件的路径中，以供在编译时回溯中使用，并且还会编译为字节码文件，在源代码的情况下，它将在回溯和其他消息中使用执行字节码文件时文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: If ddir is given, it is prepended to the path to the file being compiled for use in compilation time tracebacks, and is also compiled in to the byte-code file, where it will be used in tracebacks and other messages in cases where the source file does not exist at the time the byte-code file is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了ddir，它会被放在要编译的文件的路径中，以供在编译时回溯中使用，并且还会被编译为字节码文件，在源代码的情况下，它将在回溯和其他消息中使用执行字节码文件时文件不存在。

trans-unit.source: If debug is True, the event loop will be run in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果debug为 True ，则事件循环将在调试模式下运行。

trans-unit.source: If default_pip is set, then pip will be installed in addition to the two regular scripts.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了default_pip，则除了两个常规脚本外，还将安装 pip 。

trans-unit.source: If delay is true, then file opening is deferred until the first call to emit().
trans-unit.target: 如果delay为true，则将文件打开延迟到第一次调用 emit() 时进行。

trans-unit.source: If delta is supplied instead of places then the difference between first and second must be less or equal to (or greater than) delta.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了delta而不是place，则第一和第二个之间的差必须小于或等于（或大于）delta。

trans-unit.source: If dereference is False, add symbolic and hard links to the archive. If it is True, add the content of the target files to the archive. This has no effect on systems that do not support symbolic links.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消引用为 False ，则将符号链接和硬链接添加到存档。如果为 True ，则将目标文件的内容添加到存档中。这对不支持符号链接的系统没有影响。

trans-unit.source: If dir is not None, the file will be created in that directory; otherwise, a default directory is used. The default directory is chosen from a platform-dependent list, but the user of the application can control the directory location by setting the TMPDIR, TEMP or TMP environment variables. There is thus no guarantee that the generated filename will have any nice properties, such as not requiring quoting when passed to external commands via os.popen().
trans-unit.target: 如果dir不为 None ，则文件将在该目录中创建；否则，将使用默认目录。从与平台相关的列表中选择默认目录，但是应用程序的用户可以通过设置TMPDIR，TEMP或TMP环境变量来控制目录位置。因此，不能保证生成的文件名将具有任何不错的属性，例如，通过 os.popen() 传递给外部命令时，不需要引用。

trans-unit.source: If dirname is a string, a PEP 302 finder is created that searches that directory. If dirname is None, a PEP 302 finder is created that searches the current sys.path, plus any modules that are frozen or built-in.
trans-unit.target: 如果dirname是字符串，则创建一个PEP 302查找器来搜索该目录。如果dirname为 None ，则将创建一个PEP 302查找器，该查找器搜索当前 sys.path 以及任何冻结或内置的模块。

trans-unit.source: If disposition is set, use it as the value of the Content-Disposition header. If not specified, and filename is specified, add the header with the value attachment. If disposition is not specified and filename is also not specified, do not add the header. The only valid values for disposition are attachment and inline.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了处置，则将其用作Content-Disposition标头的值。如果未指定，并且指定了文件名，则将标题添加为值 attachment 。如果未指定处置并且也未指定文件名，则不要添加标题。唯一有效的处置值是 attachment 和 inline 。

trans-unit.source: If dnd_accept is not present or returns None, search moves to parent widget
If dry_run is true, no archive is created, but the operations that would be executed are logged to logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果dry_run为true，则不会创建任何存档，但是将要执行的操作记录到logger。

trans-unit.source: If dualstack_ipv6 is true and the platform supports it the socket will be able to accept both IPv4 and IPv6 connections, else it will raise ValueError. Most POSIX platforms and Windows are supposed to support this functionality. When this functionality is enabled the address returned by socket.getpeername() when an IPv4 connection occurs will be an IPv6 address represented as an IPv4-mapped IPv6 address. If dualstack_ipv6 is false it will explicitly disable this functionality on platforms that enable it by default (e.g. Linux). This parameter can be used in conjunction with has_dualstack_ipv6():
trans-unit.target: 如果dualstack_ipv6为true并且平台支持它，则套接字将能够接受IPv4和IPv6连接，否则它将引发 ValueError 。大多数POSIX平台和Windows应该支持此功能。启用此功能后， socket.getpeername() 在进行IPv4连接时返回的地址将是一个IPv6地址，表示为映射了IPv4的IPv6地址。如果dualstack_ipv6为false，它将在默认启用该功能的平台（例如Linux）上显式禁用此功能。该参数可以与 has_dualstack_ipv6() 结合使用：

trans-unit.source: If duplex is True (the default) then the pipe is bidirectional. If duplex is False then the pipe is unidirectional: conn1 can only be used for receiving messages and conn2 can only be used for sending messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果duplex为 True （默认设置），则管道为双向。如果duplex为 False ,则管道是单向的： conn1 仅可用于接收消息， conn2 仅可用于发送消息。

trans-unit.source: If effective_ids is True, access() will perform its access checks using the effective uid/gid instead of the real uid/gid. effective_ids may not be supported on your platform; you can check whether or not it is available using os.supports_effective_ids. If it is unavailable, using it will raise a NotImplementedError.
trans-unit.target: 如果effective_ids为 True ，则 access() 将使用有效的uid / gid而非实际的uid / gid执行访问检查。您的平台可能不支持有效的ID；您可以使用 os.supports_effective_ids 检查它是否可用。如果不可用，使用它将引发 NotImplementedError 。

trans-unit.source: If encode_chunked is True, the result of each iteration of message_body will be chunk-encoded as specified in RFC 7230, Section 3.3.1. How the data is encoded is dependent on the type of message_body. If message_body implements the buffer interface the encoding will result in a single chunk. If message_body is a collections.abc.Iterable, each iteration of message_body will result in a chunk. If message_body is a file object, each call to .read() will result in a chunk. The method automatically signals the end of the chunk-encoded data immediately after message_body.
trans-unit.target: 如果encode_chunked为 True ，则将按照RFC 7230第3.3.1节中的指定对message_body的每次迭代结果进行块编码。数据的编码方式取决于message_body的类型。如果message_body实现了缓冲区接口，则编码将导致单个块。如果message_body是 collections.abc.Iterable ，则message_body的每次迭代都会产生一个块。如果message_body是文件对象，则每个对 .read() 的调用将导致大块。该方法会在message_body之后立即自动发信号通知块编码数据的结尾。

trans-unit.source: If encode_chunked is True, the result of each iteration of message_body will be chunk-encoded as specified in RFC 7230, Section 3.3.1. How the data is encoded is dependent on the type of message_body. If message_body implements the buffer interface the encoding will result in a single chunk. If message_body is a collections.abc.Iterable, each iteration of message_body will result in a chunk. If message_body is a file object, each call to .read() will result in a chunk. The method automatically signals the end of the chunk-encoded data immediately after message_body.

If encoding or errors are specified, or text (also known as universal_newlines) is true, the file objects stdin, stdout and stderr will be opened in text mode using the encoding and errors specified in the call or the defaults for io.TextIOWrapper.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了编码或错误，或者文本（也称为Universal_Newlines）为true，则将使用调用中指定的编码和错误或 io.TextIOWrapper 的默认值，以文本模式打开文件对象stdin，stdout和stderr。

trans-unit.source: If encoding or errors are specified, or text is true, file objects for stdin, stdout and stderr are opened in text mode using the specified encoding and errors or the io.TextIOWrapper default. The universal_newlines argument is equivalent to text and is provided for backwards compatibility. By default, file objects are opened in binary mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了编码或错误，或者文本为true，则使用指定的编码和错误或 io.TextIOWrapper 默认值，以文本模式打开stdin，stdout和stderr的文件对象。该universal_newlines参数等同于文本，并提供向后兼容性。默认情况下，文件对象以二进制模式打开。

trans-unit.source: If encoding or errors are specified, or text is true, the file objects stdin, stdout and stderr are opened in text mode with the specified encoding and errors, as described above in Frequently Used Arguments. The universal_newlines argument is equivalent to text and is provided for backwards compatibility. By default, file objects are opened in binary mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了编码或错误，或者文本为true，则文件对象stdin，stdout和stderr将以指定的编码和错误以文本模式打开，如上文“ 常用参数”中所述。该universal_newlines参数等同于文本，并提供向后兼容性。默认情况下，文件对象以二进制模式打开。

trans-unit.source: If ensure_ascii is true (the default), the output is guaranteed to have all incoming non-ASCII characters escaped. If ensure_ascii is false, these characters will be output as-is.
trans-unit.target: 如果sure_ascii为true（默认值），则保证输出中所有传入的非ASCII字符都已转义。如果sure_ascii为false，则这些字符将按原样输出。

trans-unit.source: If env is not None, it must be a mapping that defines the environment variables for the new process; these are used instead of the default behavior of inheriting the current process’ environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果env不为 None ，那么它必须是为新进程定义环境变量的映射。这些被用来代替继承当前进程环境的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: If env is not None, it must be a mapping that defines the environment variables for the new process; these are used instead of the default behavior of inheriting the current process’ environment. It is passed directly to Popen.
trans-unit.target: 如果env不为 None ，那么它必须是为新进程定义环境变量的映射。这些被用来代替继承当前进程环境的默认行为。它直接传递给 Popen 。

trans-unit.source: If error_callback is specified then it should be a callable which accepts a single argument. If the target function fails, then the error_callback is called with the exception instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了error_callback，那么它应该是可调用的，可以接受单个参数。如果目标函数失败，则将使用异常实例调用error_callback。

trans-unit.source: If errorlevel is 0, all errors are ignored when using TarFile.extract(). Nevertheless, they appear as error messages in the debug output, when debugging is enabled. If 1, all fatal errors are raised as OSError exceptions. If 2, all non-fatal errors are raised as TarError exceptions as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果errorlevel为 0 ，则在使用 TarFile.extract() 时将忽略所有错误。但是，启用调试后，它们将作为错误消息出现在调试输出中。如果为 1 ，则所有致命错误均作为 OSError 异常引发。如果为 2 ，则所有非致命错误也会引发为 TarError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If errors is specified, it’s used to determine how encoding errors are handled.

If exc_info does not evaluate as false, it causes exception information to be added to the logging message. If an exception tuple (in the format returned by sys.exc_info()) or an exception instance is provided, it is used; otherwise, sys.exc_info() is called to get the exception information.
trans-unit.target: 如果exc_info的求值结果不为false，则它将异常信息添加到日志消息中。如果提供了一个异常元组（以 sys.exc_info() 返回的格式）或一个异常实例，则使用它；否则，将使用它。否则，将调用 sys.exc_info() 以获取异常信息。

trans-unit.source: If exc_type is SystemExit, the exception is silently ignored. Otherwise, the exception is printed out on sys.stderr.
trans-unit.target: 如果exc_type为 SystemExit ，则该异常将被静默忽略。否则，将在 sys.stderr 上打印出异常。

trans-unit.source: If exist_ok is False (the default), an FileExistsError is raised if the target directory already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果exist_ok为 False （默认值），则在目标目录已存在的情况下引发 FileExistsError 。

trans-unit.source: If exist_ok is false (the default), FileExistsError is raised if the target directory already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果exist_ok为false（默认值），则在目标目录已存在的情况下引发 FileExistsError 。

trans-unit.source: If exist_ok is true, FileExistsError exceptions will be ignored (same behavior as the POSIX mkdir -p command), but only if the last path component is not an existing non-directory file.
trans-unit.target: 如果exist_ok为true， FileExistsError 忽略FileExistsError异常（与POSIX mkdir -p 命令相同的行为），但前提是最后一个路径组件不是现有的非目录文件。

trans-unit.source: If expand is set to False, the path will not be expanded using the variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果expand设置为 False ，则不会使用变量来扩展路径。

trans-unit.source: If expand is set to false, the paths will not be expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果将expand设置为false，则不会扩展路径。

trans-unit.source: If extra_groups is not None, the setgroups() system call will be made in the child process prior to the execution of the subprocess. Strings provided in extra_groups will be looked up via grp.getgrnam() and the values in gr_gid will be used. Integer values will be passed verbatim. (POSIX only)

If factory is None the default task factory will be set. Otherwise, factory must be a callable with the signature matching (loop, coro), where loop is a reference to the active event loop, and coro is a coroutine object. The callable must return a asyncio.Future-compatible object.
trans-unit.target: 如果factory为 None ，将设置默认任务工厂。否则，factory必须是具有签名匹配项 (loop, coro) 的可调用对象，其中loop是对活动事件循环的引用，而coro是协程对象。可调用对象必须返回 asyncio.Future 兼容对象。

trans-unit.source: If file is a string, open the file by that name, otherwise treat it as a file-like object. mode can be:
trans-unit.target: 如果file是字符串，请使用该名称打开文件，否则将其视为类似文件的对象。模式可以是：

trans-unit.source: If file is not specified, read from sys.stdin.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定文件，请从 sys.stdin 中读取。

trans-unit.source: If file_encoding is not given, it defaults to data_encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果file_encoding没有给出，则默认为data_encoding。

trans-unit.source: If file_or_dir is a directory and not a symbolic link, then recursively descend the directory tree named by file_or_dir, checking all .py files along the way. If file_or_dir is an ordinary Python source file, it is checked for whitespace related problems. The diagnostic messages are written to standard output using the print() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果file_or_dir是目录而不是符号链接，则递归地下降由file_or_dir命名的目录树，并检查整个过程中的所有 .py 文件。如果file_or_dir是普通的Python源文件，则将检查是否存在与空格相关的问题。使用 print() 函数将诊断消息写入标准输出。

trans-unit.source: If filelike has a close() method, the returned object will also have a close() method, and it will invoke the filelike object’s close() method when called.
trans-unit.target: 如果filelike具有 close() 方法，则返回的对象也将具有 close() 方法，并且在调用时将调用该Filelike对象的 close() 方法。

trans-unit.source: If filename is a str or bytes object, open the named file directly. Otherwise, filename should be a file object, which will be used to read or write the compressed data.
trans-unit.target: 如果filename是一个 str 或 bytes 对象，则直接打开命名文件。否则，filename应该是一个文件对象，它将用于读取或写入压缩数据。

trans-unit.source: If filename is a str or bytes object, open the named file directly. Otherwise, filename should be a file object, which will be used to read or write the compressed data.
If filename is a file object (rather than an actual file name), a mode of "w" does not truncate the file, and is instead equivalent to "a".
trans-unit.target: 如果filename是文件对象（而不是实际的文件名），则模式 "w" 不会截断该文件，而是等效于 "a" 。

trans-unit.source: If filename is a file object (rather than an actual file name), a mode of 'w' does not truncate the file, and is instead equivalent to 'a'.
trans-unit.target: 如果filename是文件对象（而不是实际的文件名），则模式 'w' 不会截断该文件，而是等效于 'a' 。

trans-unit.source: If filename is specified, open the file in this mode. Defaults to 'a'.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了filename，则以此模式打开文件。默认为 'a' 。

trans-unit.source: If filename is specified, use it as the value of the filename parameter of the Content-Disposition header.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了filename，则将其用作Content-Disposition标头的 filename 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: If filenames is a string, a bytes object or a path-like object, it is treated as a single filename. If a file named in filenames cannot be opened, that file will be ignored. This is designed so that you can specify an iterable of potential configuration file locations (for example, the current directory, the user’s home directory, and some system-wide directory), and all existing configuration files in the iterable will be read.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件名是字符串， bytes 对象或类似路径的对象，则将其视为单个文件名。如果无法打开以文件名命名的文件，则该文件将被忽略。这样设计的目的是，您可以指定可能的配置文件位置的可迭代项（例如，当前目录，用户的主目录和某些系统范围的目录），并将读取可迭代项中的所有现有配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If filenames is a string, a bytes object or a path-like object, it is treated as a single filename. If a file named in filenames cannot be opened, that file will be ignored. This is designed so that you can specify an iterable of potential configuration file locations (for example, the current directory, the user’s home directory, and some system-wide directory), and all existing configuration files in the iterable will be read.

If fileno is specified, the values for family, type, and proto are auto-detected from the specified file descriptor. Auto-detection can be overruled by calling the function with explicit family, type, or proto arguments. This only affects how Python represents e.g. the return value of socket.getpeername() but not the actual OS resource. Unlike socket.fromfd(), fileno will return the same socket and not a duplicate. This may help close a detached socket using socket.close().
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了fileno，则会从指定的文件描述符中自动检测family，type和proto的值。通过使用显式family，type或proto参数调用该函数，可以否决自动检测。这仅影响Python如何表示例如 socket.getpeername() 的返回值，而不影响实际的OS资源。与 socket.fromfd() 不同，fileno将返回相同的套接字，而不是重复的套接字。这可能有助于使用 socket.close() 关闭分离的套接字。

trans-unit.source: If fileobj is given, it is used for reading or writing data. If it can be determined, mode is overridden by fileobj’s mode. fileobj will be used from position 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了fileobj，则它用于读取或写入数据。如果可以确定，则模式被fileobj的模式覆盖。fileobj将从位置0开始使用。

trans-unit.source: If fileobj is specified, it is used as an alternative to a file object opened in binary mode for name. It is supposed to be at position 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了fileobj，它将用作以二进制方式为name打开的文件对象的替代。它应该位于位置0。

trans-unit.source: If fileobj is specified, it is used as an alternative to a file object opened in binary mode for name. It is supposed to be at position 0.
If files is None the internal data structure is completely rebuilt to its initial default value. This is a stable operation and will produce the same results when called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 如果files为 None ,则内部数据结构将完全重建为其初始默认值。这是一个稳定的操作，多次调用将产生相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: If first_line is not None, it indicates the line number that should be reported for the first source line in the disassembled code. Otherwise, the source line information (if any) is taken directly from the disassembled code object.
trans-unit.target: 如果first_line不为 None ，则表示应该在反汇编代码中为第一条源行报告的行号。否则，直接从反汇编的代码对象中获取源代码行信息（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If fix_imports is true and protocol is less than 3, pickle will try to map the new Python 3 names to the old module names used in Python 2, so that the pickle data stream is readable with Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 如果fix_imports为true并且协议小于3，则pickle将尝试将新的Python 3名称映射到Python 2中使用的旧模块名称，以便pickle数据流可被Python 2读取。

trans-unit.source: If flag has another value, then the status of the newsgroup should be considered unknown.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag具有另一个值，则应将新闻组的状态视为未知。

trans-unit.source: If flag is False, after a few milliseconds, an escape sequence will not be interpreted, and will be left in the input stream as is.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 False ，则在几毫秒后，将不解释转义序列，而是将其保留在输入流中。

trans-unit.source: If flag is False, curses no longer considers using the hardware insert/delete character feature of the terminal; if flag is True, use of character insertion and deletion is enabled. When curses is first initialized, use of character insert/delete is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 False ，则curses不再考虑使用终端的硬件插入/删除字符功能；如果flag为 True ，则启用字符插入和删除。首次初始化curses时，默认情况下启用字符插入/删除功能。

trans-unit.source: If flag is False, cursor will always be at “cursor position” after an update.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 False ，则更新后光标将始终位于“光标位置”。

trans-unit.source: If flag is False, the effect is the same as calling noqiflush(). If flag is True, or no argument is provided, the queues will be flushed when these control characters are read.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 False ，则效果与调用 noqiflush() 相同。如果flag为 True ，或者不提供任何参数，则在读取这些控制字符时将刷新队列。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, getch() will be non-blocking.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则 getch() 将是非阻塞的。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, curses will try and use hardware line editing facilities. Otherwise, line insertion/deletion are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则 curses 将尝试并使用硬件行编辑功能。否则，将禁止插入/删除行。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, allow 8-bit characters to be input. If flag is False, allow only 7-bit chars.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则允许输入8位字符。如果flag为 False ，则仅允许使用7位字符。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, any change in the window image automatically causes the window to be refreshed; you no longer have to call refresh() yourself. However, it may degrade performance considerably, due to repeated calls to wrefresh. This option is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则窗口图像中的任何更改都会自动刷新窗口；否则，窗口将自动刷新。您不再需要自己调用 refresh() 。但是，由于重复调用wrefresh，它可能会大大降低性能。默认情况下禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, cursor is left where it is on update, instead of being at “cursor position.” This reduces cursor movement where possible. If possible the cursor will be made invisible.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则将光标留在要更新的位置，而不是位于“光标位置”。这样可以减少光标的移动。如果可能，光标将变为不可见。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, escape sequences generated by some keys (keypad, function keys) will be interpreted by curses. If flag is False, escape sequences will be left as is in the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则某些键（键盘，功能键）生成的转义序列将由 curses 解释。如果flag为 False ，转义序列将保留在输入流中。
