trans-unit.source: If flag is True, escape sequences will not be timed out.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则转义序列不会超时。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, the next call to refresh() will clear the window completely.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，则对下一次的 refresh() 调用将完全清除窗口。

trans-unit.source: If flag is True, then syncup() is called automatically whenever there is a change in the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果flag为 True ，那么只要窗口发生更改，就会自动调用 syncup() 。

trans-unit.source: If flag is true, turn debugging on. Otherwise, turn debugging off. When debugging is on, commands to be executed are printed, and the shell is given set -x command to be more verbose.
trans-unit.target: 如果标志为true，则打开调试。否则，请关闭调试。调试打开时，将打印要执行的命令，并为shell提供 set -x 命令，使其更加详细。

trans-unit.source: If fmt is None, use the following default fmt:
trans-unit.target: 如果fmt为 None ，则使用以下默认fmt：

trans-unit.source: If follow_symlinks is False, return True only if this entry is a directory (without following symlinks); return False if the entry is any other kind of file or if it doesn’t exist anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果follow_symlinks为 False ，则仅当此条目是目录时才返回 True （不包含以下符号链接）；否则，返回true。如果该条目是任何其他类型的文件或不再存在，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: If follow_symlinks is False, return True only if this entry is a file (without following symlinks); return False if the entry is a directory or other non-file entry, or if it doesn’t exist anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果follow_symlinks为 False ，则仅当此条目是文件时才返回 True （不包含以下符号链接）；否则，返回True。如果该条目是目录或其他非文件条目，或者不再存在，则返回 False 。

trans-unit.source: If follow_symlinks is false and src is a symbolic link, a new symbolic link will be created instead of copying the file src points to.
trans-unit.target: 如果follow_symlinks为false并且src是符号链接，则将创建一个新的符号链接，而不是将src指向的文件复制到该链接。

trans-unit.source: If follow_symlinks is false, and src and dst both refer to symbolic links, copystat() will operate on the symbolic links themselves rather than the files the symbolic links refer to—reading the information from the src symbolic link, and writing the information to the dst symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 如果follow_symlinks为false，并且src和dst都引用了符号链接，则 copystat() 将对符号链接本身而不是符号链接所引用的文件进行操作-从src符号链接中读取信息，并将信息写入到dst符号链接。

trans-unit.source: If follow_symlinks is false, and src is a symbolic link, dst will be created as a symbolic link. If follow_symlinks is true and src is a symbolic link, dst will be a copy of the file src refers to.
trans-unit.target: 如果follow_symlinks为false，并且src是符号链接，则将dst创建为符号链接。如果follow_symlinks为true，并且src是符号链接，则dst将是src引用的文件的副本。

trans-unit.source: If force is true, modules are re-compiled even if the timestamps are up to date.
trans-unit.target: 如果force为true，则即使时间戳是最新的，也将重新编译模块。

trans-unit.source: If format is specified, use this style for the format string. One of '%', '{' or '$' for printf-style, str.format() or string.Template respectively. Defaults to '%'.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式指定，使用这种风格的格式字符串。分别为printf-style， str.format() 或 string.Template 的 '%' ， '{' 或 '$' 之一。默认为 '%' 。

trans-unit.source: If format requires a single argument, values may be a single non-tuple object. 5 Otherwise, values must be a tuple with exactly the number of items specified by the format string, or a single mapping object (for example, a dictionary).
trans-unit.target: 如果format需要单个参数，则值可以是单个非元组对象。5否则，值必须是具有由格式字符串指定的项目数的元组，或者是单个映射对象（例如，词典）。

trans-unit.source: If format requires a single argument, values may be a single non-tuple object. 5 Otherwise, values must be a tuple with exactly the number of items specified by the format bytes object, or a single mapping object (for example, a dictionary).
trans-unit.target: 如果format需要单个参数，则值可以是单个非元组对象。5否则，值必须是一个元组，该元组必须具有由格式字节对象或单个映射对象（例如，字典）指定的项目数。

trans-unit.source: If from_addr is None or to_addrs is None, send_message fills those arguments with addresses extracted from the headers of msg as specified in RFC 5322: from_addr is set to the Sender field if it is present, and otherwise to the From field. to_addrs combines the values (if any) of the To, Cc, and Bcc fields from msg. If exactly one set of Resent-* headers appear in the message, the regular headers are ignored and the Resent-* headers are used instead. If the message contains more than one set of Resent-* headers, a ValueError is raised, since there is no way to unambiguously detect the most recent set of Resent- headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果from_addr为 None 或to_addrs为 None ，则 send_message 使用从RFC 5322中指定的msg头提取的地址填充这些参数：from_addr设置为Sender字段（如果存在），否则设置为From字段。to_addrs合并msg中To，Cc和Bcc字段的值（如果有）。如果邮件中恰好出现一组Resent- *标头，则常规标头将被忽略，并且改为使用Resent- *标头。如果消息包含多个Resent- *标头集，则会引发 ValueError ，因为无法明确检测最新的Resent-标头集。

trans-unit.source: If func is supplied, it should be a function of two arguments. Elements of the input iterable may be any type that can be accepted as arguments to func. (For example, with the default operation of addition, elements may be any addable type including Decimal or Fraction.)
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了func，则它应该是两个参数的函数。输入iterable的元素可以是func可以接受的任何类型。（例如，使用加法的默认操作，元素可以是包括 Decimal 或 Fraction 在内的任何可加类型。）

trans-unit.source: If gen_func is a generator function, it will be modified in-place.
trans-unit.target: 如果gen_func是一个生成器函数，它将被就地修改。

trans-unit.source: If gen_func is not a generator function, it will be wrapped. If it returns an instance of collections.abc.Generator, the instance will be wrapped in an awaitable proxy object. All other types of objects will be returned as is.
trans-unit.target: 如果gen_func不是生成器函数，它将被包装。如果它返回 collections.abc.Generator 的实例，则该实例将被包装在一个等待的代理对象中。所有其他类型的对象将照原样返回。

trans-unit.source: If generator is a generator with no currently associated frame, then an empty dictionary is returned. TypeError is raised if generator is not a Python generator object.
trans-unit.target: 如果generator是没有当前关联帧的generator，则返回一个空字典。如果generator不是Python生成器对象，则会引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If generator is a generator with no currently associated frame, then an empty dictionary is returned. TypeError is raised if generator is not a Python generator object.

If group is not None, the setregid() system call will be made in the child process prior to the execution of the subprocess. If the provided value is a string, it will be looked up via grp.getgrnam() and the value in gr_gid will be used. If the value is an integer, it will be passed verbatim. (POSIX only)

If handler is None, the default exception handler will be set. Otherwise, handler must be a callable with the signature matching (loop, context), where loop is a reference to the active event loop, and context is a dict object containing the details of the exception (see call_exception_handler() documentation for details about context).
trans-unit.target: 如果handler为 None ，则将设置默认的异常处理程序。否则，处理程序必须是可调用的，且签名匹配 (loop, context) ，其中 loop 是对活动事件循环的引用， context 是包含异常详细信息的 dict 对象 call_exception_handler() 有关上下文的详细信息，请参见call_exception_handler（）文档））。

trans-unit.source: If hardlink_dupes is true and two .pyc files with different optimization level have the same content, use hard links to consolidate duplicate files.

If headers contains neither Content-Length nor Transfer-Encoding, but there is a request body, one of those header fields will be added automatically. If body is None, the Content-Length header is set to 0 for methods that expect a body (PUT, POST, and PATCH). If body is a string or a bytes-like object that is not also a file, the Content-Length header is set to its length. Any other type of body (files and iterables in general) will be chunk-encoded, and the Transfer-Encoding header will automatically be set instead of Content-Length.
trans-unit.target: 如果标头既不包含Content-Length也不包含Transfer-Encoding，但是有一个请求正文，则这些标头字段之一将被自动添加。如果body为 None ，则对于需要正文的方法（ PUT ， POST 和 PATCH ），Content-Length标头设置为 0 。如果body是不是文件的字符串或类似字节的对象，则Content-Length标头将设置为其长度。其他任何类型的主体（通常是文件和可迭代对象）都将进行块编码，并且将自动设置Transfer-Encoding标头，而不是Content-Length。

trans-unit.source: If headers contains neither Content-Length nor Transfer-Encoding, but there is a request body, one of those header fields will be added automatically. If body is None, the Content-Length header is set to 0 for methods that expect a body (PUT, POST, and PATCH). If body is a string or a bytes-like object that is not also a file, the Content-Length header is set to its length. Any other type of body (files and iterables in general) will be chunk-encoded, and the Transfer-Encoding header will automatically be set instead of Content-Length.
If headers is specified and is a list of strings of the form headername: headervalue or a list of header objects (distinguished from strings by having a name attribute), add the headers to msg.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了headers，并且是 headername: headervalue 形式的字符串列表或 header 对象的列表（通过具有 name 属性与字符串区别），则将headers添加到msg。

trans-unit.source: If hkey is not closed using this method (or via hkey.Close()), it is closed when the hkey object is destroyed by Python.
trans-unit.target: 如果HKEY尚未使用该方法关闭（或经由 hkey.Close() ），当它被关闭HKEY目的通过Python的破坏。

trans-unit.source: If host is a sequence of strings, the TCP server is bound to all network interfaces specified by the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果host是字符串序列，则TCP服务器绑定到该序列指定的所有网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If host is a string, the TCP server is bound to a single network interface specified by host.
trans-unit.target: 如果host是字符串，则将TCP服务器绑定到host指定的单个网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If host is an empty string or None, all interfaces are assumed and a list of multiple sockets will be returned (most likely one for IPv4 and another one for IPv6).
trans-unit.target: 如果host为空字符串或 None ，则假定所有接口都将返回多个套接字的列表（最有可能的一个用于IPv4，另一个用于IPv6）。

trans-unit.source: If i or j is negative, the index is relative to the end of sequence s: len(s) + i or len(s) + j is substituted. But note that -0 is still 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果i或j为负，则索引相对于序列s的结尾： len(s) + i 或 len(s) + j 被替换。但请注意， -0 仍为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If ignore is given, it must be a callable that will receive as its arguments the directory being visited by copytree(), and a list of its contents, as returned by os.listdir(). Since copytree() is called recursively, the ignore callable will be called once for each directory that is copied. The callable must return a sequence of directory and file names relative to the current directory (i.e. a subset of the items in its second argument); these names will then be ignored in the copy process. ignore_patterns() can be used to create such a callable that ignores names based on glob-style patterns.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出ignore，则它必须是可调用的，它将接受 copytree() 访问的目录作为其参数，并接收 os.listdir() 返回的目录的列表。由于 copytree() 是递归调用的，因此ignore可调用对象将为每个复制的目录调用一次。可调用对象必须返回相对于当前目录的目录和文件名序列（即，第二个参数中各项的子集）；这些名称将在复制过程中被忽略。 ignore_patterns() 可用于创建这样的可调用项，该可调用项将忽略基于全局样式的名称。

trans-unit.source: If ignore_zeros is False, treat an empty block as the end of the archive. If it is True, skip empty (and invalid) blocks and try to get as many members as possible. This is only useful for reading concatenated or damaged archives.
trans-unit.target: 如果ignore_zeros为 False ，则将一个空块视为存档的结尾。如果为 True ，则跳过空的（和无效的）块，并尝试获取尽可能多的成员。这仅对读取串联或损坏的档案有用。

trans-unit.source: If inclusive is False (exclude), ignore memory blocks allocated in a file with a name matching filename_pattern at line number lineno.
trans-unit.target: 如果inclusive为 False （排除），请忽略在行号 lineno 处名称与 filename_pattern 匹配的文件中分配的内存块。

trans-unit.source: If inclusive is False (exclude), match memory blocks not allocated in the address space domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果inclusive为 False （排除），则匹配未在地址空间 domain 分配的存储块。

trans-unit.source: If inclusive is True (include), match memory blocks allocated in the address space domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果inclusive为 True （包括），则匹配在地址空间 domain 分配的内存块。

trans-unit.source: If inclusive is True (include), only match memory blocks allocated in a file with a name matching filename_pattern at line number lineno.
trans-unit.target: 如果inclusive为 True （包含），则仅匹配名称与 filename_pattern 在行号 lineno 上匹配的文件中分配的内存块。

trans-unit.source: If indent is a non-negative integer or string, then JSON array elements and object members will be pretty-printed with that indent level. An indent level of 0, negative, or "" will only insert newlines. None (the default) selects the most compact representation. Using a positive integer indent indents that many spaces per level. If indent is a string (such as "\t"), that string is used to indent each level.
trans-unit.target: 如果indent是非负整数或字符串，则JSON数组元素和对象成员将使用该缩进级别进行漂亮打印。缩进级别0，负数或 "" 只会插入换行符。 None （默认）选择最紧凑的表示形式。使用正整数缩进会使每个级别缩进多个空格。如果缩进是一个字符串（例如 "\t" ），则该字符串用于缩进每个级别。

trans-unit.source: If indent is a non-negative integer or string, then the tree will be pretty-printed with that indent level. An indent level of 0, negative, or "" will only insert newlines. None (the default) selects the single line representation. Using a positive integer indent indents that many spaces per level. If indent is a string (such as "\t"), that string is used to indent each level.
If infile is not specified, read from sys.stdin.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定infile，则从 sys.stdin 中读取。

trans-unit.source: If initializer is not None then each worker process will call initializer(*initargs) when it starts.
trans-unit.target: 如果初始值设定项不为 None ,则每个工作进程在启动时都会调用 initializer(*initargs) 。

trans-unit.source: If input is given, it is passed to the load() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了输入，则将其传递给 load() 方法。

trans-unit.source: If isjunk was omitted or None, find_longest_match() returns (i, j, k) such that a[i:i+k] is equal to b[j:j+k], where alo <= i <= i+k <= ahi and blo <= j <= j+k <= bhi. For all (i', j', k') meeting those conditions, the additional conditions k >= k', i <= i', and if i == i', j <= j' are also met. In other words, of all maximal matching blocks, return one that starts earliest in a, and of all those maximal matching blocks that start earliest in a, return the one that starts earliest in b.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略isjunk或 None ，则 find_longest_match() 返回 (i, j, k) 使得 a[i:i+k] 等于 b[j:j+k] ，其中 alo <= i <= i+k <= ahi 和 blo <= j <= j+k <= bhi 。对于满足这些条件的所有 (i', j', k') ，附加条件 k >= k' ， i <= i' ，如果 i == i' ， j <= j' 也要满足。换句话说，在所有最大匹配的块中，返回最早在中开始的一个，在所有那些最大匹配的块中最早返回在a的返回，返回最早从b开始的那个。

trans-unit.source: If isjunk was provided, first the longest matching block is determined as above, but with the additional restriction that no junk element appears in the block. Then that block is extended as far as possible by matching (only) junk elements on both sides. So the resulting block never matches on junk except as identical junk happens to be adjacent to an interesting match.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了isjunk，则首先按照上述方法确定最长的匹配块，但附加的限制是该块中不会出现垃圾元素。然后，通过在两侧匹配（仅）垃圾元素来尽可能扩展该块。因此，结果块永远不会在垃圾上匹配，除非相同的垃圾恰好与某个有趣的匹配相邻。

trans-unit.source: If item is not specified, returns root children.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定item，则返回root子代。

trans-unit.source: If item is specified, returns 1 or 0 depending on whether the specified item has the given tagname. Otherwise, returns a list of all items that have the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了item，则根据指定的项目是否具有给定的标记名返回1或0 。否则，返回具有指定标签的所有项目的列表。

trans-unit.source: If item is specified, sets the focus item to item. Otherwise, returns the current focus item, or ‘’ if there is none.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定item，则将焦点项目设置为item。否则，返回当前的焦点项目，如果没有，则返回。

trans-unit.source: If k is not specified or is None, then k defaults to n and the function returns n!.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定k或为None，则k默认为n，该函数返回 n! 。

trans-unit.source: If keepends is false line-endings will be stripped from the lines returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果keepends为false，则会从返回的行中删除行尾。

trans-unit.source: If key is a handle returned by ConnectRegistry(), then the path specified in file_name is relative to the remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果key是 ConnectRegistry() 返回的句柄，则file_name中指定的路径是相对于远程计算机的。

trans-unit.source: If key is in the dictionary, remove it and return its value, else return default. If default is not given and key is not in the dictionary, a KeyError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果key在字典中，请删除它并返回其值，否则返回default。如果默认没有给出关键不在词典， KeyError 异常升高。

trans-unit.source: If key is in the dictionary, return its value. If not, insert key with a value of default and return default. default defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: 如果key在字典中，则返回其值。如果不是，请插入具有默认值的key并返回default。默认默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: If key is one of the predefined keys, sub_key may be None. In that case, the handle returned is the same key handle passed in to the function.
trans-unit.target: 如果key是预定义的键之一，则sub_key可以为 None 。在这种情况下，返回的句柄与传递给函数的键句柄相同。

trans-unit.source: If key represents a key on a remote computer, the path described by file_name is relative to the remote computer. The caller of this method must possess the SeBackupPrivilege security privilege. Note that privileges are different than permissions – see the Conflicts Between User Rights and Permissions documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如果key表示远程计算机上的密钥，则file_name描述的路径是相对于远程计算机的。此方法的调用者必须拥有 SeBackupPrivilege 安全特权。请注意，权限与权限不同–请参阅“ 用户权限与权限之间的冲突”文档以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If keyfile and certfile are provided, they are used to create an ssl.SSLContext.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了密钥文件和certfile，则它们将用于创建 ssl.SSLContext 。

trans-unit.source: If kw is not given, returns a dict of the column option values. If option is specified then the value for that option is returned. Otherwise, sets the options to the corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定kw，则返回列选项值的字典。如果选项指定然后该值选项返回。否则，将选项设置为相应的值。

trans-unit.source: If kw is not given, returns a dict of the heading option values. If option is specified then the value for that option is returned. Otherwise, sets the options to the corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定kw，则返回标题选项值的字典。如果选项指定然后该值选项返回。否则，将选项设置为相应的值。

trans-unit.source: If kw is not given, returns a dict of the option settings for tagname. If option is specified, returns the value for that option for the specified tagname. Otherwise, sets the options to the corresponding values for the given tagname.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出kw，则返回tagname选项设置的字典。如果选项被指定，返回的值选项用于指定的标记名。否则，将选项设置为给定标记名的相应值。

trans-unit.source: If kw is not given, returns a dictionary of the tab option values. If option is specified, returns the value of that option. Otherwise, sets the options to the corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出kw，则返回制表符选项值的字典。如果指定了option，则返回该option的值。否则，将选项设置为相应的值。

trans-unit.source: If legacy is true, byte-code files are written to their legacy locations and names, which may overwrite byte-code files created by another version of Python. The default is to write files to their PEP 3147 locations and names, which allows byte-code files from multiple versions of Python to coexist.
trans-unit.target: 如果legacy为true，则将字节码文件写入其原有位置和名称，这可能会覆盖由另一个版本的Python创建的字节码文件。默认设置是将文件写入其PEP 3147的位置和名称，这允许来自多个Python版本的字节代码文件共存。

trans-unit.source: If legacy is true, byte-code files are written to their legacy locations and names, which may overwrite byte-code files created by another version of Python. The default is to write files to their PEP 3147 locations and names, which allows byte-code files from multiple versions of Python to coexist.
trans-unit.target: 如果legacy为true，则将字节码文件写入其原有位置和名称，这可能会覆盖由另一个版本的Python创建的字节码文件。默认设置是将文件写入其PEP 3147的位置和名称，这允许来自多个Python版本的字节代码文件共存。

trans-unit.source: If limit is supplied, only this many frames are taken from frame_gen. If lookup_lines is False, the returned FrameSummary objects will not have read their lines in yet, making the cost of creating the StackSummary cheaper (which may be valuable if it may not actually get formatted). If capture_locals is True the local variables in each FrameSummary are captured as object representations.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了限制，则仅从frame_gen获取这么多帧。如果lookup_lines为 False ，则返回的 FrameSummary 对象将尚未读入其行，从而使创建 StackSummary 的成本降低（如果可能未真正格式化，则可能会很有价值）。如果capture_locals为 True ,则将每个 FrameSummary 中的局部变量捕获为对象表示形式。

trans-unit.source: If line_buffering is True, flush() is implied when a call to write contains a newline character or a carriage return.
trans-unit.target: 如果line_buffering为 True ，则在写调用包含换行符或回车符时隐含 flush() 。

trans-unit.source: If line_info is true, line number information will be included for all terminal tokens as a third element of the list representing the token. Note that the line number provided specifies the line on which the token ends. This information is omitted if the flag is false or omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果line_info为true，则所有终端令牌都将包含行号信息，作为代表令牌的列表的第三个元素。请注意，提供的行号指定了令牌结束的行。如果标志为false或省略，则忽略此信息。

trans-unit.source: If line_info is true, line number information will be included for all terminal tokens as a third element of the list representing the token. This information is omitted if the flag is false or omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果line_info为true，则所有终端令牌都将包含行号信息，作为代表令牌的列表的第三个元素。如果标志为false或省略，则忽略此信息。

trans-unit.source: If linesep is not None, use it as the separator character between all the lines of the flattened message. If linesep is None (the default), use the value specified in the policy.
trans-unit.target: 如果linesep不为 None ，则使用它作为扁平化消息的所有行之间的分隔符。如果linesep为 None （默认值），请使用policy中指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If locale is given and not None, setlocale() modifies the locale setting for the category. The available categories are listed in the data description below. locale may be a string, or an iterable of two strings (language code and encoding). If it’s an iterable, it’s converted to a locale name using the locale aliasing engine. An empty string specifies the user’s default settings. If the modification of the locale fails, the exception Error is raised. If successful, the new locale setting is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了语言环境而不是 None ，则 setlocale() 修改category的语言环境设置。可用类别在下面的数据描述中列出。语言环境可以是一个字符串，也可以是两个字符串的迭代（语言代码和编码）。如果是可迭代的，则使用语言环境别名引擎将其转换为语言环境名称。空字符串指定用户的默认设置。如果对语言环境的修改失败，则会引发 Error 。如果成功，则返回新的语言环境设置。

trans-unit.source: If locale is omitted or None, the current setting for category is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略locale或 None ，则返回category的当前设置。

trans-unit.source: If localedir is not given, then the default system locale directory is used. 2 If languages is not given, then the following environment variables are searched: LANGUAGE, LC_ALL, LC_MESSAGES, and LANG. The first one returning a non-empty value is used for the languages variable. The environment variables should contain a colon separated list of languages, which will be split on the colon to produce the expected list of language code strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供localedir，则使用默认的系统区域设置目录。2如果语言没有给出，那么下面的环境变量中搜索： LANGUAGE ， LC_ALL ， LC_MESSAGES ，和 LANG 。返回第一个非空值的第一个用于languages变量。环境变量应包含由冒号分隔的语言列表，这些列表将在冒号上拆分以产生预期的语言代码字符串列表。

trans-unit.source: If localedir is omitted or None, then the current binding for domain is returned. 1
trans-unit.target: 如果省略localedir或 None ，则返回当前的domain绑定。1个

trans-unit.source: If lock is True (the default) then a new lock object is created to synchronize access to the value. If lock is a Lock or RLock object then that will be used to synchronize access to the value. If lock is False then access to the returned object will not be automatically protected by a lock, so it will not necessarily be “process-safe”.
trans-unit.target: 如果lock为 True （默认设置），则将创建一个新的锁对象以同步对该值的访问。如果lock是 Lock 或 RLock 对象，则它将用于同步对该值的访问。如果lock为 False ,则对返回的对象的访问将不会受到锁的自动保护，因此它不一定是“过程安全的”。

trans-unit.source: If lock is True (the default) then a new recursive lock object is created to synchronize access to the value. If lock is a Lock or RLock object then that will be used to synchronize access to the value. If lock is False then access to the returned object will not be automatically protected by a lock, so it will not necessarily be “process-safe”.
trans-unit.target: 如果lock为 True （默认设置），则将创建一个新的递归锁对象以同步对该值的访问。如果lock是 Lock 或 RLock 对象，则它将用于同步对该值的访问。如果lock为 False ,则对返回的对象的访问将不会受到锁的自动保护，因此它不一定是“过程安全的”。

trans-unit.source: If lock is specified then it should be a Lock or RLock object from multiprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了lock，则它应该是 multiprocessing 中的 Lock 或 RLock 对象。

trans-unit.source: If lock is supplied then it should be a proxy for a threading.Lock or threading.RLock object.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了锁，则它应该是 threading.Lock 或 threading.RLock 对象的代理。

trans-unit.source: If loop is None, get_running_loop() is used for getting current loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果loop为 None ，则使用 get_running_loop() 获取当前循环。

trans-unit.source: If loop is None, the get_event_loop() function is used to get the current loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果loop为 None ，则使用 get_event_loop() 函数获取当前循环。

trans-unit.source: If loop is Noneget_running_loop() is used to get the current loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果loop为 None ,则使用 get_running_loop() 获取当前循环。

trans-unit.source: If max_length is nonnegative, returns at most max_length bytes of decompressed data. If this limit is reached and further output can be produced, the needs_input attribute will be set to False. In this case, the next call to decompress() may provide data as b'' to obtain more of the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果max_length为非负数，则最多返回解压缩后的数据的max_length个字节。如果达到此限制并可以产生进一步的输出，则 needs_input 属性将设置为 False 。在这种情况下，下一次对 decompress() 的调用可以将数据提供为 b'' ,以获得更多的输出。

trans-unit.source: If max_length is nonnegative, returns at most max_length bytes of decompressed data. If this limit is reached and further output can be produced, the needs_input attribute will be set to False. In this case, the next call to decompress() may provide data as b'' to obtain more of the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果max_length为非负数，则最多返回解压缩后的数据的max_length个字节。如果达到此限制并可以产生进一步的输出，则 needs_input 属性将设置为 False 。在这种情况下，下一次对 decompress() 的调用可以将数据提供为 b'' ,以获得更多的输出。

trans-unit.source: If maxheaderlen is not None, refold any header lines that are longer than maxheaderlen, or if 0, do not rewrap any headers. If manheaderlen is None (the default), wrap headers and other message lines according to the policy settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果maxheaderlen不为 None ，请重新折叠长于maxheaderlen的所有标题行，如果为 0 ，则不要重新包装任何标题。如果manheaderlen为 None （默认值），请根据策略设置包装标题和其他消息行。

trans-unit.source: If maxlen is not specified or is None, deques may grow to an arbitrary length. Otherwise, the deque is bounded to the specified maximum length. Once a bounded length deque is full, when new items are added, a corresponding number of items are discarded from the opposite end. Bounded length deques provide functionality similar to the tail filter in Unix. They are also useful for tracking transactions and other pools of data where only the most recent activity is of interest.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定maxlen或为 None ，则双端队列可能会增长到任意长度。否则，双端队列限制为指定的最大长度。一旦限定长度的双端队列已满，则在添加新项目时，将从另一端丢弃相应数量的项目。有界长度双端队列提供的功能类似于Unix中的 tail 过滤器。它们对于跟踪事务和仅关注最近活动的其他数据池也很有用。

trans-unit.source: If maxlength is specified and the message is longer than maxlength then OSError is raised and the connection will no longer be readable.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了maxlength且该消息比maxlength长，则将引发 OSError 并且连接将不再可读。

trans-unit.source: If maxsize is less than or equal to zero, the queue size is infinite. If it is an integer greater than 0, then await put() blocks when the queue reaches maxsize until an item is removed by get().
trans-unit.target: 如果maxsize小于或等于零，则队列大小为无限。如果它是大于 0 的整数，则当队列达到最大大小时，将 await put() 阻塞，直到由 get() 删除某项为止。

trans-unit.source: If maxsize is set to None, the LRU feature is disabled and the cache can grow without bound.
If maxsize is set to None, the LRU feature is disabled and the cache can grow without bound. The LRU feature performs best when maxsize is a power-of-two.
trans-unit.target: 如果将maxsize设置为 None ，那么将禁用LRU功能，并且缓存可以不受限制地增长。当maxsize为2的幂时，LRU功能表现最佳。

trans-unit.source: If message is omitted, the new instance is created in a default, empty state. If message is an email.message.Message instance, its contents are copied; furthermore, any format-specific information is converted insofar as possible if message is a Message instance. If message is a string, a byte string, or a file, it should contain an RFC 2822-compliant message, which is read and parsed. Files should be open in binary mode, but text mode files are accepted for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略message，则将在默认的空状态下创建新实例。如果message是 email.message.Message 实例，则复制其内容；此外，如果message是 Message 实例，则将尽可能转换任何特定于格式的信息。如果message是字符串，字节字符串或文件，则它应包含RFC 2822兼容的消息，该消息将被读取和解析。应该以二进制模式打开文件，但是为了向后兼容，可以接受文本模式文件。

trans-unit.source: If method is None then the default context is returned. Otherwise method should be 'fork', 'spawn', 'forkserver'. ValueError is raised if the specified start method is not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果method为 None ,则返回默认上下文。否则，方法应为 'fork' ， 'spawn' ， 'forkserver' 。如果指定的启动方法不可用，则会引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: If missing_ok is false (the default), FileNotFoundError is raised if the path does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果missing_ok为false（默认值），则在路径不存在时引发 FileNotFoundError 。

trans-unit.source: If missing_ok is true, FileNotFoundError exceptions will be ignored (same behavior as the POSIX rm -f command).
trans-unit.target: 如果missing_ok为true，则将忽略 FileNotFoundError 异常（与POSIX rm -f 命令相同的行为）。

trans-unit.source: If mode is P_NOWAIT, this function returns the process id of the new process; if mode is P_WAIT, returns the process’s exit code if it exits normally, or -signal, where signal is the signal that killed the process. On Windows, the process id will actually be the process handle, so can be used with the waitpid() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果mode为 P_NOWAIT ，则此函数返回新进程的进程ID；否则，返回0。如果mode为 P_WAIT ，则返回正常退出的进程的退出代码，或者 -signal ，其中signal是杀死该进程的信号。在Windows上，进程ID实际上将是进程句柄，因此可以与 waitpid() 函数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If mode is 'r', the input file may be the concatenation of multiple compressed streams.
trans-unit.target: 如果mode为 'r' ，则输入文件可能是多个压缩流的串联。

trans-unit.source: If mode is 'w' or 'a', compresslevel can be an integer between 1 and 9 specifying the level of compression: 1 produces the least compression, and 9 (default) produces the most compression.
trans-unit.target: 如果mode为 'w' 或 'a' ，则compresslevel可以是 1 到 9 之间的整数，指定压缩级别： 1 产生最小的压缩，而 9 （默认）产生最大的压缩。

trans-unit.source: If module is False, no attempt to find the module will be made. This is obscure, of use mostly in testing doctest itself: if module is False, or is None but cannot be found automatically, then all objects are considered to belong to the (non-existent) module, so all contained objects will (recursively) be searched for doctests.
trans-unit.target: 如果module为 False ，则不会尝试查找该模块。这是晦涩的，主要用于测试doctest本身：如果module为 False ，或者为 None ,但无法自动找到，则所有对象都被视为属于（不存在）模块，因此所有包含的对象将（递归）搜索doctest。

trans-unit.source: If module is defined, the __module__ attribute of the named tuple is set to that value.
trans-unit.target: 如果模块被定义，所述 __module__ 命名元组的属性被设置为该值。

trans-unit.source: If module_relative is False, then filename specifies an OS-specific path. The path may be absolute or relative; relative paths are resolved with respect to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果module_relative为 False ，则filename指定操作系统特定的路径。该路径可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对路径。相对路径相对于当前工作目录进行解析。

trans-unit.source: If module_relative is False, then each filename in paths specifies an OS-specific path. The path may be absolute or relative; relative paths are resolved with respect to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果module_relative为 False ，那么路径中的每个文件名都将指定特定于操作系统的路径。路径可以是绝对路径，也可以是相对路径；相对路径相对于当前工作目录进行解析。

trans-unit.source: If module_relative is True (the default), then filename specifies an OS-independent module-relative path. By default, this path is relative to the calling module’s directory; but if the package argument is specified, then it is relative to that package. To ensure OS-independence, filename should use / characters to separate path segments, and may not be an absolute path (i.e., it may not begin with /).
trans-unit.target: 如果module_relative为 True （默认值），则filename指定一个与OS无关的模块相对路径。默认情况下，该路径是相对于调用模块目录的路径；但是如果指定了package参数，则它相对于该包。为了确保操作系统独立性，文件名应使用 / 字符分隔路径段，并且可能不是绝对路径（即，它不能以 / 开头）。

trans-unit.source: If module_relative is True (the default), then each filename in paths specifies an OS-independent module-relative path. By default, this path is relative to the calling module’s directory; but if the package argument is specified, then it is relative to that package. To ensure OS-independence, each filename should use / characters to separate path segments, and may not be an absolute path (i.e., it may not begin with /).
trans-unit.target: 如果module_relative为 True （默认设置），则路径中的每个文件名都指定一个与OS无关的模块相对路径。默认情况下，该路径是相对于调用模块目录的路径。但如果指定了package参数，则它相对于该包。为了确保操作系统独立性，每个文件名都应使用 / 字符分隔路径段，并且可能不是绝对路径（即，它不能以 / 开头）。

trans-unit.source: If monetary is true, the conversion uses monetary thousands separator and grouping strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果money为true，则转换将使用千美元分隔符和分组字符串。

trans-unit.source: If mutate_flag is true (the default), then the buffer is (in effect) passed to the underlying ioctl() system call, the latter’s return code is passed back to the calling Python, and the buffer’s new contents reflect the action of the ioctl(). This is a slight simplification, because if the supplied buffer is less than 1024 bytes long it is first copied into a static buffer 1024 bytes long which is then passed to ioctl() and copied back into the supplied buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果mutate_flag为true（默认设置），则缓冲区（实际上）将传递给基础 ioctl() 系统调用，后者的返回代码将传递回调用Python，并且缓冲区的新内容反映 ioctl() 。这是一个略微的简化，因为如果提供的缓冲区小于1024字节长，则首先将其复制到1024字节长的静态缓冲区中，然后将其传递到 ioctl() 并复制回提供的缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: If name is a string and is not known, ValueError is raised. If a specific value for name is not supported by the host system, even if it is included in confstr_names, an OSError is raised with errno.EINVAL for the error number.
trans-unit.target: 如果name是字符串并且未知，则引发 ValueError 。如果主机系统不支持name的特定值，即使它包含在 confstr_names 中， errno.EINVAL 将错误号errno.EINVAL引发 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: If name is a string and is not known, ValueError is raised. If a specific value for name is not supported by the host system, even if it is included in pathconf_names, an OSError is raised with errno.EINVAL for the error number.
trans-unit.target: 如果name是字符串并且未知，则引发 ValueError 。如果特定值的名字不被主机系统支持，即使它被包含在 pathconf_names ，一个 OSError 提高与 errno.EINVAL 错误编号。

trans-unit.source: If name is not None, it is set as the name of the task using Task.set_name().
trans-unit.target: 如果name不为 None ，则使用 Task.set_name() 将其设置为任务的名称。

trans-unit.source: If name is not found, return None.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到名称，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If name is not provided in the constructor, the name returned by tzname(dt) is generated from the value of the offset as follows. If offset is timedelta(0), the name is “UTC”, otherwise it is a string in the format UTC±HH:MM, where ± is the sign of offset, HH and MM are two digits of offset.hours and offset.minutes respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称在构造函数中没有设置，该名称由返回 tzname(dt) 是从的值中产生的 offset 如下。如果offset为 timedelta(0) ，则名称为“ UTC”，否则为 UTC±HH:MM 格式的字符串，其中±是 offset 的符号，HH和MM是 offset.hours 和 offset.minutes 两位数。分钟。

trans-unit.source: If new is omitted, then the target is replaced with an AsyncMock if the patched object is an async function or a MagicMock otherwise. If patch() is used as a decorator and new is omitted, the created mock is passed in as an extra argument to the decorated function. If patch() is used as a context manager the created mock is returned by the context manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略new，则如果修补对象是异步函数，则将目标替换为 AsyncMock ,否则将其替换为 MagicMock 。如果将 patch() 用作装饰器，而忽略new，则将创建的模拟作为额外的参数传递给装饰的函数。如果将 patch() 用作上下文管理器，则上下文管理器返回创建的模拟。

trans-unit.source: If newindex is specified, sets the combobox value to the element position newindex. Otherwise, returns the index of the current value or -1 if the current value is not in the values list.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了newindex，则将组合框值设置为元素位置newindex。否则，返回当前值的索引；如果当前值不在值列表中，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: If ns is specified, it must be a 2-tuple of the form (atime_ns, mtime_ns) where each member is an int expressing nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了ns，则它必须是 (atime_ns, mtime_ns) 形式的2元组，其中每个成员都是一个表示纳秒的int。

trans-unit.source: If numeric_owner is True, the uid and gid numbers from the tarfile are used to set the owner/group for the extracted files. Otherwise, the named values from the tarfile are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果numeric_owner为 True ，则使用tarfile中的uid和gid数字设置提取文件的所有者/组。否则，将使用tarfile中的命名值。

trans-unit.source: If obj is neither of the above a TypeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果obj都不是以上两种，则 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If offset is given then data is read from that position in buffer. If size is given then that many bytes will be read from buffer. Very large buffers (approximately 32 MiB+, though it depends on the OS) may raise a ValueError exception
trans-unit.target: 如果给出偏移量，则从缓冲区中的该位置读取数据。如果给定大小，则将从缓冲区读取许多字节。很大的缓冲区（大约32 MiB +，尽管取决于操作系统）可能会引发 ValueError 异常

trans-unit.source: If onerror is provided, it must be a callable that accepts three parameters: function, path, and excinfo.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了onerror，则它必须是可调用的，可以接受三个参数：function，path和excinfo。

trans-unit.source: If outcome is None, the subtest succeeded. Otherwise, it failed with an exception where outcome is a tuple of the form returned by sys.exc_info(): (type, value, traceback).
trans-unit.target: 如果结果为 None ，则子测试成功。否则，它会失败，并出现一个例外，其中结果是 sys.exc_info() 返回的元组形式： (type, value, traceback) 。

trans-unit.source: If pad is true, the input is padded with b'\0' so its length is a multiple of 4 bytes before encoding.
trans-unit.target: 如果pad为true，则输入将用 b'\0' 填充，因此其长度是编码前4字节的倍数。

trans-unit.source: If padded is True, the first line of a multi-line statement will be padded with spaces to match its original position.
trans-unit.target: 如果padded为 True ，则多行语句的第一行将用空格填充以匹配其原始位置。

trans-unit.source: If params is specified, iterate its items method and use the resulting (key, value) pairs to set additional parameters on the Content-Type header.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了params，则迭代其 items 方法并使用结果对 (key, value) 对在Content-Type标头上设置其他参数。

trans-unit.source: If parents is false (the default), a missing parent raises FileNotFoundError.
trans-unit.target: 如果parent为假（默认值），则缺少父对象将引发 FileNotFoundError 。

trans-unit.source: If parents is true, any missing parents of this path are created as needed; they are created with the default permissions without taking mode into account (mimicking the POSIX mkdir -p command).
trans-unit.target: 如果父级为真，则根据需要创建此路径中所有丢失的父级；它们是使用默认权限创建的，没有考虑模式（模仿POSIX mkdir -p 命令）。

trans-unit.source: If path is None, the temporary directory is created using tempfile.mkdtemp(). If quiet is False, the context manager raises an exception on error. Otherwise, if path is specified and cannot be created, only a warning is issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果path为 None ，则使用 tempfile.mkdtemp() 创建临时目录。如果quiet为 False ，则上下文管理器将在错误时引发异常。否则，如果指定了路径且无法创建路径，则仅发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If pathname is a file, the filename must end with .py, and just the (corresponding *.pyc) file is added at the top level (no path information). If pathname is a file that does not end with .py, a RuntimeError will be raised. If it is a directory, and the directory is not a package directory, then all the files *.pyc are added at the top level. If the directory is a package directory, then all *.pyc are added under the package name as a file path, and if any subdirectories are package directories, all of these are added recursively in sorted order.
trans-unit.target: 如果pathname是一个文件，则文件名必须以 .py 结尾，并且仅在顶层添加（对应的 *.pyc ）文件（无路径信息）。如果路径是不是结束一个文件 .py ，一个 RuntimeError 将提高。如果它是目录，并且该目录不是软件包目录，那么所有文件 *.pyc 都会添加到顶层。如果该目录是程序包目录，则将所有 *.pyc 作为文件路径添加到程序包名称下，如果任何子目录是程序包目录，则将所有这些都以排序顺序递归添加。

trans-unit.source: If pattern is absolute, the path must be absolute, and the whole path must match:
trans-unit.target: 如果pattern是绝对的，则路径必须是绝对的，并且整个路径必须匹配：

trans-unit.source: If pattern is relative, the path can be either relative or absolute, and matching is done from the right:
trans-unit.target: 如果pattern是相对的，则路径可以是相对的，也可以是绝对的，并且从右侧进行匹配：

trans-unit.source: If pid is greater than 0, waitpid() requests status information for that specific process. If pid is 0, the request is for the status of any child in the process group of the current process. If pid is -1, the request pertains to any child of the current process. If pid is less than -1, status is requested for any process in the process group -pid (the absolute value of pid).
trans-unit.target: 如果pid大于 0 ，则 waitpid() 请求该特定进程的状态信息。如果pid为 0 ，则请求为当前进程的进程组中任何子进程的状态。如果pid为 -1 ，则该请求与当前进程的任何子进程有关。如果pid小于 -1 ，则请求进程组 -pid （pid的绝对值）中任何进程的状态。

trans-unit.source: If policy is set to None, the default policy is restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果policy设置为 None ，则将还原默认策略。

trans-unit.source: If policy is specified (it must be an instance of a policy class) use the rules it specifies to update and serialize the representation of the message. If policy is not set, use the compat32 policy, which maintains backward compatibility with the Python 3.2 version of the email package. For more information see the policy documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了policy（它必须是 policy 类的实例），则使用它指定的规则来更新和序列化消息的表示形式。如果未设置策略，请使用 compat32 策略，该策略与电子邮件包的Python 3.2版本保持向后兼容性。有关更多信息，请参阅 policy 文档。

trans-unit.source: If policy is specified use the rules it specifies to update and serialize the representation of the message. If policy is not set, use the default policy, which follows the rules of the email RFCs except for line endings (instead of the RFC mandated \r\n, it uses the Python standard \n line endings). For more information see the policy documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了策略，则使用规则指定更新和序列化消息表示的规则。如果未设置policy，请使用 default 策略，该默认策略遵循电子邮件RFC的规则，但行尾除外（而不是RFC强制的 \r\n ，它使用Python标准 \n 行尾）。有关更多信息，请参阅 policy 文档。

trans-unit.source: If policy is specified use the rules it specifies to update the representation of the message. If policy is not set, use the compat32 policy, which maintains backward compatibility with the Python 3.2 version of the email package and provides Message as the default factory. All other policies provide EmailMessage as the default _factory. For more information on what else policy controls, see the policy documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了策略，则使用它指定的规则来更新消息的表示形式。如果未设置策略，请使用 compat32 策略，该策略与电子邮件包的Python 3.2版本保持向后兼容性，并提供 Message 作为默认工厂。所有其他策略都将 EmailMessage 作为默认的_factory提供。有关其他策略控制的更多信息，请参阅 policy 文档。

trans-unit.source: If policy is specified, (defaults to the compat32 policy) it will be passed to Message.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了策略（默认为 compat32 策略），它将被传递给 Message 。

trans-unit.source: If policy is specified, use that policy to control message generation. If policy is None (the default), use the policy associated with the Message or EmailMessage object passed to flatten to control the message generation. See email.policy for details on what policy controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果政策指定，使用政策，以控制消息的产生。如果策略是 None （缺省值），使用与该相关联的策略 Message 或 EmailMessage 对象传递到 flatten ，以控制消息生成。请参阅 email.policy 以了解有关哪些策略控制的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If preexec_fn is set to a callable object, this object will be called in the child process just before the child is executed. (POSIX only)
trans-unit.target: 如果将preexec_fn设置为可调用对象，则将在执行子级之前在子进程中调用此对象。（仅POSIX）

trans-unit.source: If prefix is not None, the file name will begin with that prefix; otherwise, a default prefix is used. The default is the return value of gettempprefix() or gettempprefixb(), as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果prefix不为 None ，则文件名将以该前缀开头；否则，将使用默认前缀。缺省情况下，适当时是 gettempprefix() 或 gettempprefixb() 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: If progress is specified, it must either be None or a callable object that will be executed at each iteration with three integer arguments, respectively the status of the last iteration, the remaining number of pages still to be copied and the total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了progress，则它必须为 None 或将在每次迭代时使用三个整数参数执行的可调用对象，三个整数参数分别是上次迭代的状态，仍要复制的剩余页数和总页数。

trans-unit.source: If quiet is False and it is not possible to create or change the CWD, an error is raised. Otherwise, only a warning is raised and the original CWD is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果quiet为 False ，并且无法创建或更改CWD，则会引发错误。否则，只会发出警告，并使用原始的CWD。

trans-unit.source: If quiet is False or 0 (the default), the filenames and other information are printed to standard out. Set to 1, only errors are printed. Set to 2, all output is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果quiet为 False 或 0 （默认值），则文件名和其他信息将按标准输出。设置为 1 ，仅打印错误。设置为 2 ，将抑制所有输出。

trans-unit.source: If quiet is False, the context manager raises an exception on error. Otherwise, it issues only a warning and keeps the current working directory the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果quiet为 False ，则上下文管理器将在错误时引发异常。否则，它仅发出警告，并保持当前工作目录不变。

trans-unit.source: If r is not specified or is None, then r defaults to the length of the iterable and all possible full-length permutations are generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定r或为 None ，则r默认为可迭代的长度，并生成所有可能的全长排列。

trans-unit.source: If rawdata is a string, parse it as an HTTP_COOKIE and add the values found there as Morsels. If it is a dictionary, it is equivalent to:
trans-unit.target: 如果rawdata是字符串，则将其解析为 HTTP_COOKIE 并将在其中找到的值添加为 Morsel 。如果是字典，则等同于：

trans-unit.source: If recursive is true, the pattern “**” will match any files and zero or more directories, subdirectories and symbolic links to directories. If the pattern is followed by an os.sep or os.altsep then files will not match.
trans-unit.target: 如果递归为true，则模式“ ** ”将匹配任何文件以及零个或多个目录，子目录和目录的符号链接。如果模式后面跟随 os.sep 或 os.altsep ,则文件将不匹配。

trans-unit.source: If rename is true, invalid fieldnames are automatically replaced with positional names. For example, ['abc', 'def', 'ghi', 'abc'] is converted to ['abc', '_1', 'ghi', '_3'], eliminating the keyword def and the duplicate fieldname abc.
trans-unit.target: 如果重命名为true，则无效的字段名称将自动替换为位置名称。例如， ['abc', 'def', 'ghi', 'abc'] 转换为 ['abc', '_1', 'ghi', '_3'] ，从而消除了关键字 def 和重复的字段名 abc 。

trans-unit.source: If repl is a function, it is called for every non-overlapping occurrence of pattern. The function takes a single match object argument, and returns the replacement string. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果repl是一个函数，则每次pattern的非重叠出现都会调用它。该函数采用单个match对象参数，并返回替换字符串。例如：

trans-unit.source: If replace is False (the default) the header is moved to the end of the list of headers. If replace is True, the header will be updated in place.
trans-unit.target: 如果replace为 False （默认设置），则标题将移动到标题列表的末尾。如果replace为 True ，则头文件将被适当更新。

trans-unit.source: If restore_signals is true (the default) all signals that Python has set to SIG_IGN are restored to SIG_DFL in the child process before the exec. Currently this includes the SIGPIPE, SIGXFZ and SIGXFSZ signals. (POSIX only)
trans-unit.target: 如果restore_signals为true（默认设置），则在执行之前，子进程中将Python设置为SIG_IGN的所有信号都还原为SIG_DFL。当前，这包括SIGPIPE，SIGXFZ和SIGXFSZ信号。（仅POSIX）

trans-unit.source: If result is provided, it is returned to the caller when the coroutine completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了结果，则协程完成后将其返回给调用方。

trans-unit.source: If return_exceptions is False (default), the first raised exception is immediately propagated to the task that awaits on gather(). Other awaitables in the aws sequence won’t be cancelled and will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 如果return_exceptions为 False （默认值），则第一个引发的异常将立即传播到在 gather() 上等待的任务。aws序列中的其他可等待项不会被取消，而是会继续运行。

trans-unit.source: If return_exceptions is True, exceptions are treated the same as successful results, and aggregated in the result list.
trans-unit.target: 如果return_exceptions为 True ，则将异常与成功结果相同，并汇总到结果列表中。

trans-unit.source: If return_exceptions is False, cancelling gather() after it has been marked done won’t cancel any submitted awaitables. For instance, gather can be marked done after propagating an exception to the caller, therefore, calling gather.cancel() after catching an exception (raised by one of the awaitables) from gather won’t cancel any other awaitables.
If rx is given, its search method is called on the complete path to each file considered for compilation, and if it returns a true value, the file is skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了rx，则会在要考虑编译的每个文件的完整路径上调用其搜索方法，如果返回的是true值，则会跳过该文件。

trans-unit.source: If rx is given, its search method is passed the full path name to the file being compiled, and if it returns a true value, the file is not compiled and True is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了rx，则将其搜索方法的完整路径名传递给正在编译的文件，如果返回true值，则不编译该文件，并返回 True 。

trans-unit.source: If s is an instance of str, then charset is a hint specifying the character set of the characters in the string.
trans-unit.target: 如果s是 str 的实例，则charset是一个提示，指定字符串中字符的字符集。

trans-unit.source: If scheme is not an existing scheme, get_paths() will raise a KeyError.
trans-unit.target: 如果方案是不是现有方案， get_paths() 将引发 KeyError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If scheme is not provided, will use the default scheme for the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 如果方案没有提供，将使用默认方案为当前平台。

trans-unit.source: If scheme is provided, it must be a value from the list returned by get_scheme_names(). Otherwise, the default scheme for the current platform is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了scheme，则它必须是 get_scheme_names() 返回的列表中的值。否则，将使用当前平台的默认方案。

trans-unit.source: If secs is not provided or None, the current time as returned by time() is used. ctime(secs) is equivalent to asctime(localtime(secs)). Locale information is not used by ctime().
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供secs或 None ，则使用 time() 返回的当前时间。 ctime(secs) 等效于 asctime(localtime(secs)) 。 ctime() 不使用语言环境信息。

trans-unit.source: If seed is given, creates a new instance of the underlying random number generator. This is useful for creating reproducible results, even in a multi-threading context.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出种子，则创建基础随机数生成器的新实例。即使在多线程环境中，这对于创建可重现的结果也很有用。

trans-unit.source: If self is alive then mark it as dead and return the result of calling func(*args, **kwargs). If self is dead then return None.
trans-unit.target: 如果self仍然存在，则将其标记为死亡，并返回调用 func(*args, **kwargs) 。如果self已死，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If self is alive then mark it as dead and return the tuple (obj, func, args, kwargs). If self is dead then return None.
trans-unit.target: 如果self仍然存在，则将其标记为死并返回元组 (obj, func, args, kwargs) 。如果self已死，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If self is alive then return the tuple (obj, func, args, kwargs). If self is dead then return None.
trans-unit.target: 如果self仍然存在，则返回元组 (obj, func, args, kwargs) 。如果self已死，则返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If sep is given, consecutive delimiters are not grouped together and are deemed to delimit empty strings (for example, '1,,2'.split(',') returns ['1', '', '2']). The sep argument may consist of multiple characters (for example, '1<>2<>3'.split('<>') returns ['1', '2', '3']). Splitting an empty string with a specified separator returns [''].
trans-unit.target: 如果给定sep，则连续的定界符不会分组在一起，而是被视为定界空字符串（例如， '1,,2'.split(',') 返回 ['1', '', '2'] ）。该月的参数可以由多个字符（例如， '1<>2<>3'.split('<>') 返回 ['1', '2', '3'] ）。使用指定的分隔符分割空字符串将返回 [''] 。

trans-unit.source: If sep is given, consecutive delimiters are not grouped together and are deemed to delimit empty subsequences (for example, b'1,,2'.split(b',') returns [b'1', b'', b'2']). The sep argument may consist of a multibyte sequence (for example, b'1<>2<>3'.split(b'<>') returns [b'1', b'2', b'3']). Splitting an empty sequence with a specified separator returns [b''] or [bytearray(b'')] depending on the type of object being split. The sep argument may be any bytes-like object.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定sep，则不将连续的定界符分组在一起，而是将其视为定界空的子序列（例如 b'1,,2'.split(b',') 返回 [b'1', b'', b'2'] ）。该月的参数可以由多字节序列的（例如， b'1<>2<>3'.split(b'<>') 返回 [b'1', b'2', b'3'] ） 。使用指定的分隔符分割空序列将返回 [b''] 或 [bytearray(b'')] ,具体取决于要分割的对象的类型。该月的参数可以是任何字节状物体。

trans-unit.source: If sep is given, consecutive delimiters are not grouped together and are deemed to delimit empty subsequences (for example, b'1,,2'.split(b',') returns [b'1', b'', b'2']). The sep argument may consist of a multibyte sequence (for example, b'1<>2<>3'.split(b'<>') returns [b'1', b'2', b'3']). Splitting an empty sequence with a specified separator returns [b''] or [bytearray(b'')] depending on the type of object being split. The sep argument may be any bytes-like object.

If sep is not specified or is None, a different splitting algorithm is applied: runs of consecutive ASCII whitespace are regarded as a single separator, and the result will contain no empty strings at the start or end if the sequence has leading or trailing whitespace. Consequently, splitting an empty sequence or a sequence consisting solely of ASCII whitespace without a specified separator returns [].
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定sep或为 None ，则将应用不同的拆分算法：连续ASCII空格的运行被视为单个分隔符，并且如果序列具有前导或尾随空格，则结果的开头或结尾将不包含空字符串。因此，分割空序列或不包含指定分隔符的仅由ASCII空格组成的序列将返回 [] 。

trans-unit.source: If sep is not specified or is None, a different splitting algorithm is applied: runs of consecutive whitespace are regarded as a single separator, and the result will contain no empty strings at the start or end if the string has leading or trailing whitespace. Consequently, splitting an empty string or a string consisting of just whitespace with a None separator returns [].
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定sep或为 None ，则将应用不同的拆分算法：连续的空白行将被视为单个分隔符，并且如果字符串的开头或结尾处有空白，则结果在开头或结尾将不包含空字符串。因此，使用 None 分隔符拆分空字符串或仅包含空格的字符串将返回 [] 。

trans-unit.source: If sep is specified, it must be a single character str or bytes object. It will be inserted in the output after every bytes_per_sep input bytes. Separator placement is counted from the right end of the output by default, if you wish to count from the left, supply a negative bytes_per_sep value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定sep，则它必须是单个字符str或bytes对象。将在每个bytes_per_sep输入字节之后将其插入输出中。默认情况下，分隔符的位置从输出的右端开始计数，如果希望从左侧开始计数，请提供负的bytes_per_sep值。

trans-unit.source: If shallow is true, files with identical os.stat() signatures are taken to be equal. Otherwise, the contents of the files are compared.
trans-unit.target: 如果shallow为true，则具有相同 os.stat() 签名的文件将被视为相等。否则，将比较文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: If shell is True, the specified command will be executed through the shell. This can be useful if you are using Python primarily for the enhanced control flow it offers over most system shells and still want convenient access to other shell features such as shell pipes, filename wildcards, environment variable expansion, and expansion of ~ to a user’s home directory. However, note that Python itself offers implementations of many shell-like features (in particular, glob, fnmatch, os.walk(), os.path.expandvars(), os.path.expanduser(), and shutil).
trans-unit.target: 如果shell为 True ，则将通过shell执行指定的命令。如果您主要将Python用于大多数系统Shell上提供的增强控制流，并且仍然希望方便地访问其他Shell功能（例如Shell管道，文件名通配符，环境变量扩展以及 ~ 扩展到用户的家），则这可能很有用。目录。但是，请注意，Python本身提供了许多类似于shell的功能（特别是 glob ， fnmatch ， os.walk() ， os.path.expandvars() ， os.path.expanduser() 和 shutil ）的实现。

trans-unit.source: If side_effect is an iterable then each call to the mock will return the next value from the iterable.
trans-unit.target: 如果side_effect是可迭代的，则每次对模拟的调用将返回可迭代的下一个值。

trans-unit.source: If sigma is negative, raises StatisticsError.
trans-unit.target: 如果sigma为负，则引发 StatisticsError 。

trans-unit.source: If signalnum is 0, then no signal is sent, but error checking is still performed; this can be used to check if the target thread is still running.
trans-unit.target: 如果signalnum为0，则不发送信号，但仍执行错误检查；否则，将执行错误检查。这可用于检查目标线程是否仍在运行。

trans-unit.source: If size is -1 (the default), an arbitrary number of bytes are returned (more than zero unless EOF is reached).
trans-unit.target: 如果size为 -1 （默认值），则返回任意数量的字节（除非达到EOF，否则大于零）。

trans-unit.source: If size is specified, at most size characters will be read.
trans-unit.target: 如果大小指定，最多尺寸的字符将被读取。

trans-unit.source: If skip_curdir is true (the default), the current directory is not included in the search. All other parameters are passed to the compile_dir() function. Note that unlike the other compile functions, maxlevels defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果skip_curdir为true（默认设置），则当前目录不包括在搜索中。所有其他参数都传递给 compile_dir() 函数。请注意，与其他编译函数不同， maxlevels 默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If skipkeys is false (the default), then it is a TypeError to attempt encoding of keys that are not str, int, float or None. If skipkeys is true, such items are simply skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果skipkeys为false（默认值），则尝试对非 str ， int ， float 或 None 的键进行编码是 TypeError 。如果skipkeys为true，则仅跳过此类项目。

trans-unit.source: If skipkeys is true (default: False), then dict keys that are not of a basic type (str, int, float, bool, None) will be skipped instead of raising a TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 如果skipkeys为true（默认值： False ），则将跳过非基本类型（ str ， int ， float ， bool ， None ）的dict键，而不是引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If sort_keys is true (default: False), then the output of dictionaries will be sorted by key.
trans-unit.target: 如果sort_keys为true（默认值： False ），则字典的输出将按key排序。

trans-unit.source: If sort_keys is true (default: False), then the output of dictionaries will be sorted by key; this is useful for regression tests to ensure that JSON serializations can be compared on a day-to-day basis.
trans-unit.target: 如果sort_keys为true（默认值： False ），则字典的输出将按key排序；这对于进行回归测试以确保可以每天比较JSON序列化很有用。

trans-unit.source: If source is a directory, this will create an archive from the contents of source. If source is a file, it should be an archive, and it will be copied to the target archive (or the contents of its shebang line will be displayed if the –info option is specified).
trans-unit.target: 如果source是目录，则将根据source的内容创建档案。如果source是文件，则应为归档文件，并将其复制到目标归档文件（如果指定了–info选项，则将显示其shebang行的内容）。

trans-unit.source: If spec is an object (rather than a list of strings) then __class__ returns the class of the spec object. This allows mocks to pass isinstance() tests.
trans-unit.target: 如果spec是一个对象（而不是字符串列表），则 __class__ 返回spec对象的类。这允许模拟程序通过 isinstance() 测试。

trans-unit.source: If spec_set is True then attempting to set attributes that don’t exist on the spec object will raise an AttributeError.
trans-unit.target: 如果spec_set为 True ,则尝试设置spec对象上不存在的 AttributeError 将引发AttributeError。

trans-unit.source: If spec_set is true then only attributes on the spec can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果spec_set为true，则只能设置spec的属性。

trans-unit.source: If start is None, then iteration starts at zero. If step is None, then the step defaults to one.
trans-unit.target: 如果start为 None ，则迭代从零开始。如果step为 None ，则该步骤默认为1。

trans-unit.source: If start_new_session is true the setsid() system call will be made in the child process prior to the execution of the subprocess. (POSIX only)
trans-unit.target: 如果start_new_session为true，则将在子进程执行之前在子进程中进行setsid（）系统调用。（仅POSIX）

trans-unit.source: If state is specified, it is expected to be a sequence of one or more states. If the default argument is set, it is used as a fallback value in case no specification for option is found.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了状态，则应为一个或多个状态的序列。如果设置了默认参数，则在找不到选项说明的情况下，它将用作备用值。

trans-unit.source: If strict is True and host bits are set in the supplied address, then ValueError is raised. Otherwise, the host bits are masked out to determine the appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 如果strict为 True ,并且在提供的地址中设置了主机位，则将引发 ValueError 。否则，主机位将被屏蔽以确定适当的网络地址。

trans-unit.source: If strict is True, information will be added to list of standard types, else to the list of non-standard types.
trans-unit.target: 如果strict为 True ，则信息将添加到标准类型列表中，否则将添加到非标准类型列表中。

trans-unit.source: If strict is True, information will be added to the list of standard types, else to the list of non-standard types.
trans-unit.target: 如果strict为 True ，则信息将添加到标准类型列表中，否则将添加到非标准类型列表中。

trans-unit.source: If strict is false (True is the default), then control characters will be allowed inside strings. Control characters in this context are those with character codes in the 0–31 range, including '\t' (tab), '\n', '\r' and '\0'.
trans-unit.target: 如果strict为false（默认为 True ），则在字符串中允许使用控制字符。在这种情况下，控制字符是字符代码在0-31范围内的字符，包括 '\t' （制表符）， '\n' ， '\r' 和 '\0' 。

trans-unit.source: If suffix is not None, the file name will end with that suffix, otherwise there will be no suffix. mkstemp() does not put a dot between the file name and the suffix; if you need one, put it at the beginning of suffix.
trans-unit.target: 如果后缀不为 None ，则文件名将以该后缀结尾，否则将没有后缀。 mkstemp() 在文件名和后缀之间不加点；如果需要一个，请将其放在后缀的开头。

trans-unit.source: If symlinks is true, symbolic links in the source tree are represented as symbolic links in the new tree and the metadata of the original links will be copied as far as the platform allows; if false or omitted, the contents and metadata of the linked files are copied to the new tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果symlinks为true，则将源树中的符号链接表示为新树中的符号链接，并且将在平台允许的范围内复制原始链接的元数据；如果为false或省略，则将链接文件的内容和元数据复制到新树。

trans-unit.source: If t is not provided, the current time as returned by localtime() is used. Locale information is not used by asctime().
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供t，则使用 localtime() 返回的当前时间。 asctime() 不使用语言环境信息。

trans-unit.source: If tests is given, it must be an iterable of individual test cases or other test suites that will be used to build the suite initially. Additional methods are provided to add test cases and suites to the collection later on.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了测试，则它必须是单个测试用例或其他最初用于构建套件的测试套件的可迭代项。稍后提供了其他方法来将测试用例和套件添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: If text is specified and true, the file is opened in text mode. Otherwise, (the default) the file is opened in binary mode.
If text is specified, it indicates whether to open the file in binary mode (the default) or text mode. On some platforms, this makes no difference.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了文本，则指示是以二进制模式（默认）还是文本模式打开文件。在某些平台上，这没有区别。

trans-unit.source: If themename is not given, returns the theme in use. Otherwise, sets the current theme to themename, refreshes all widgets and emits a <<ThemeChanged>> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供themename，则返回正在使用的主题。否则，将当前主题设置为themename，刷新所有小部件并发出<< ThemeChanged >>事件。

trans-unit.source: If time is non-zero, this function requests that a SIGALRM signal be sent to the process in time seconds. Any previously scheduled alarm is canceled (only one alarm can be scheduled at any time). The returned value is then the number of seconds before any previously set alarm was to have been delivered. If time is zero, no alarm is scheduled, and any scheduled alarm is canceled. If the return value is zero, no alarm is currently scheduled.

If time is non-zero, this function requests that a SIGALRM signal be sent to the process in time seconds. Any previously scheduled alarm is canceled (only one alarm can be scheduled at any time). The returned value is then the number of seconds before any previously set alarm was to have been delivered. If time is zero, no alarm is scheduled, and any scheduled alarm is canceled. If the return value is zero, no alarm is currently scheduled.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间为非零，该函数请求一个 SIGALRM 信号在被发送到处理时间秒。任何先前计划的警报都会被取消（任何时候都只能计划一个警报）。然后，返回值是在传递任何先前设置的警报之前的秒数。如果时间为零，则不会安排任何警报，并且任何计划的警报都会被取消。如果返回值为零，则当前未计划任何警报。

trans-unit.source: If timeout is not specified then it will return immediately. If timeout is a number then this specifies the maximum time in seconds to block. If timeout is None then an infinite timeout is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定超时，则它将立即返回。如果超时是一个数字，则它指定要阻止的最长时间（以秒为单位）。如果超时为“ None 则使用无限超时。

trans-unit.source: If times is None and ns is unspecified, this is equivalent to specifying ns=(atime_ns, mtime_ns) where both times are the current time.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间是 None 和NS是未指定的，这是相当于指定 ns=(atime_ns, mtime_ns) 其中两个时间是当前时间。

trans-unit.source: If times is not None, it must be a 2-tuple of the form (atime, mtime) where each member is an int or float expressing seconds.
trans-unit.target: 如果times不是 None ，那么它必须是 (atime, mtime) 形式的2元组，其中每个成员都是一个表示秒的int或float。

trans-unit.source: If typed is set to true, function arguments of different types will be cached separately. For example, f(3) and f(3.0) will be treated as distinct calls with distinct results.
trans-unit.target: 如果将typed设置为true，则将分别缓存不同类型的函数参数。例如， f(3) 和 f(3.0) 将被视为具有不同结果的不同调用。

trans-unit.source: If tz is not None, it must be an instance of a tzinfo subclass, and the current date and time are converted to tz’s time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果tz不为 None ，则它必须是 tzinfo 子类的实例，并且当前日期和时间将转换为tz的时区。

trans-unit.source: If tz is not None, it must be an instance of a tzinfo subclass, and the timestamp is converted to tz’s time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果tz不为 None ，则它必须是 tzinfo 子类的实例，并且时间戳将转换为tz的时区。

trans-unit.source: If umask is not negative, the umask() system call will be made in the child process prior to the execution of the subprocess.

If unixfrom is True, print the envelope header delimiter used by the Unix mailbox format (see mailbox) before the first of the RFC 5322 headers of the root message object. If the root object has no envelope header, craft a standard one. The default is False. Note that for subparts, no envelope header is ever printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果unixfrom为 True ，则在根消息对象的第一个RFC 5322头之前打印Unix邮箱格式（请参阅 mailbox ）使用的信封头定界符。如果根对象没有信封标头，则制作一个标准的标头。默认值为 False 。请注意，对于子部件，不会打印任何信封标题。

trans-unit.source: If unixfrom is True, print the envelope header delimiter used by the Unix mailbox format (see mailbox) before the first of the RFC 5322 headers of the root message object. If the root object has no envelope header, craft a standard one. The default is False. Note that for subparts, no envelope header is ever printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果unixfrom为 True ，则在根消息对象的第一个RFC 5322头之前打印Unix邮箱格式（请参阅 mailbox ）使用的信封头定界符。如果根对象没有信封标头，则制作一个标准的标头。默认值为 False 。请注意，对于子部件，不会打印任何信封标题。

trans-unit.source: If uri is true, database is interpreted as a URI. This allows you to specify options. For example, to open a database in read-only mode you can use:
trans-unit.target: 如果uri为true，则将数据库解释为URI。这使您可以指定选项。例如，要以只读模式打开数据库，可以使用：

trans-unit.source: If url contains a fragment identifier, return a modified version of url with no fragment identifier, and the fragment identifier as a separate string. If there is no fragment identifier in url, return url unmodified and an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果url包含片段标识符，则返回没有片段标识符的url的修改版本，并将片段标识符作为单独的字符串。如果url中没有片段标识符，则返回未经修改的url和一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If url is an absolute URL (that is, it starts with // or scheme://), the url’s hostname and/or scheme will be present in the result. For example:
If url is an absolute URL (that is, starting with // or scheme://), the url’s host name and/or scheme will be present in the result. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果url是绝对URL（即以 // 或 scheme:// 开头），则结果中将显示url的主机名和/或scheme。例如：

trans-unit.source: If use_builtin_types is true (the default) binary data will be returned as instances of bytes, otherwise it is returned as instances of Data.
trans-unit.target: 如果use_builtin_types为true（默认值），则二进制数据将作为 bytes 实例返回，否则将作为 Data 实例返回。

trans-unit.source: If user is not None, the setreuid() system call will be made in the child process prior to the execution of the subprocess. If the provided value is a string, it will be looked up via pwd.getpwnam() and the value in pw_uid will be used. If the value is an integer, it will be passed verbatim. (POSIX only)
If user_function is specified, it must be a callable. This allows the lru_cache decorator to be applied directly to a user function, leaving the maxsize at its default value of 128:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了user_function，则它必须是可调用的。这允许将lru_cache装饰器直接应用于用户函数，而将maxsize保留为其默认值128：

trans-unit.source: If validate is False (the default), characters that are neither in the normal base-64 alphabet nor the alternative alphabet are discarded prior to the padding check. If validate is True, these non-alphabet characters in the input result in a binascii.Error.
trans-unit.target: 如果validate为 False （默认值），则在填充检查之前，既不包含普通base-64字母也不包含替代字母的字符都将被丢弃。如果validate为 True ，则输入中的这些非字母字符将导致 binascii.Error 。

trans-unit.source: If value is a float, the binary floating point value is losslessly converted to its exact decimal equivalent. This conversion can often require 53 or more digits of precision. For example, Decimal(float('1.1')) converts to Decimal('1.100000000000000088817841970012523233890533447265625').
trans-unit.target: 如果value是 float ，则二进制浮点值将无损地转换为其精确的十进制等效值。这种转换通常需要53位或更多位数的精度。例如， Decimal(float('1.1')) 转换为 Decimal('1.100000000000000088817841970012523233890533447265625') 。

trans-unit.source: If value is a tuple, it should have three components, a sign (0 for positive or 1 for negative), a tuple of digits, and an integer exponent. For example, Decimal((0, (1, 4, 1, 4), -3)) returns Decimal('1.414').
trans-unit.target: 如果value是一个 tuple ，则它应包含三个组成部分：一个符号（ 0 表示正， 1 表示负），一个数字 tuple 和一个整数指数。例如， Decimal((0, (1, 4, 1, 4), -3)) Decimal('1.414') ），-3））返回Decimal（'1.414'）。

trans-unit.source: If value is not None, this function prints repr(value) to sys.stdout, and saves value in builtins._. If repr(value) is not encodable to sys.stdout.encoding with sys.stdout.errors error handler (which is probably 'strict'), encode it to sys.stdout.encoding with 'backslashreplace' error handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果value不为 None ，则此函数将 repr(value) 打印到 sys.stdout ，并将value保存在 builtins._ 中。如果 repr(value) 不向可编码 sys.stdout.encoding 与 sys.stdout.errors 错误处理程序（这可能是 'strict' ），它编码到 sys.stdout.encoding 与 'backslashreplace' 错误处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If vars is provided, it must be a dictionary of variables that will update the dictionary return by get_config_vars().
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了vars，则它必须是变量字典，它将更新 get_config_vars() 返回的字典。

trans-unit.source: If vars is provided, it must be a dictionary of variables that will update the dictionary used to expand the paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了vars，则它必须是变量字典，该变量字典将更新用于扩展路径的字典。

trans-unit.source: If verbosity is None, doctest.testmod() is run with verbosity set to verbose. Otherwise, it is run with verbosity set to None. optionflags is passed as optionflags to doctest.testmod().
trans-unit.target: 如果verbosity为 None ，则在 doctest.testmod() 设置为 verbose 的情况下运行doctest.testmod（）。否则，将其详细程度设置为 None 。optionflags作为 optionflags 传递给 doctest.testmod() 。

trans-unit.source: If wait is True then this method will not return until all the pending futures are done executing and the resources associated with the executor have been freed. If wait is False then this method will return immediately and the resources associated with the executor will be freed when all pending futures are done executing. Regardless of the value of wait, the entire Python program will not exit until all pending futures are done executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果wait为 True ,则该方法将在所有未完成的期货执行完毕并且与执行者关联的资源被释放之前不会返回。如果wait为 False ,则此方法将立即返回，并且当所有未决的期货执行完毕时，与执行程序关联的资源将被释放。无论wait的值如何，整个Python程序都不会退出，直到所有未完成的Future完成执行为止。

trans-unit.source: If write_through is True, calls to write() are guaranteed not to be buffered: any data written on the TextIOWrapper object is immediately handled to its underlying binary buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果write_through为 True ，则保证不会缓冲对 write() 的调用：写在 TextIOWrapper 对象上的任何数据都会立即处理到其基础二进制缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: If x is a NaN (not a number), return x.
If x is a positive infinity, return x.
If x is equal to y, return y.
If x is equal to the largest positive representable float, return the value of the least significant bit of x, such that the first float smaller than x is x - ulp(x).
If x is equal to zero, return the smallest positive denormalized representable float (smaller than the minimum positive normalized float, sys.float_info.min).
If x is negative, return ulp(-x).

If x is not a number or if base is given, then x must be a string, bytes, or bytearray instance representing an integer literal in radix base. Optionally, the literal can be preceded by + or - (with no space in between) and surrounded by whitespace. A base-n literal consists of the digits 0 to n-1, with a to z (or A to Z) having values 10 to 35. The default base is 10. The allowed values are 0 and 2–36. Base-2, -8, and -16 literals can be optionally prefixed with 0b/0B, 0o/0O, or 0x/0X, as with integer literals in code. Base 0 means to interpret exactly as a code literal, so that the actual base is 2, 8, 10, or 16, and so that int('010', 0) is not legal, while int('010') is, as well as int('010', 8).
trans-unit.target: 如果x不是数字或给定base，则x必须是表示基数base中的整数文字的字符串， bytes 或 bytearray 实例。可选地，文字可以在 + 或 - 之前（之间没有空格）并由空格包围。以n为底的原义文字由数字0到n-1组成，其中 a 到 z （或 A 到 Z ）的值是10到35。默认的底数是10。允许的值是0和2–36。 Base-2，-8和-16文字可以选择以 0b 前缀/ 0B ， 0o / 0O 或 0x / 0X ，与代码中的整数文字一样。底数0表示要完全解释为代码文字，因此实际的底数是2、8、10或16，因此 int('010', 0) 是不合法的，而 int('010') 是合法的，以及 int('010', 8) 。

trans-unit.source: If x is not a number or if base is given, then x must be a string, bytes, or bytearray instance representing an integer literal in radix base. Optionally, the literal can be preceded by + or - (with no space in between) and surrounded by whitespace. A base-n literal consists of the digits 0 to n-1, with a to z (or A to Z) having values 10 to 35. The default base is 10. The allowed values are 0 and 2–36. Base-2, -8, and -16 literals can be optionally prefixed with 0b/0B, 0o/0O, or 0x/0X, as with integer literals in code. Base 0 means to interpret exactly as a code literal, so that the actual base is 2, 8, 10, or 16, and so that int('010', 0) is not legal, while int('010') is, as well as int('010', 8).
If y is None, x must be a pair of coordinates or a Vec2D (e.g. as returned by pos()).
trans-unit.target: 如果y为 None ，则x必须是一对坐标或 Vec2D （例如 pos() 返回）。

trans-unit.source: If zdict is a mutable object (such as a bytearray), you must not modify its contents between the call to decompressobj() and the first call to the decompressor’s decompress() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果zdict是可变对象（例如 bytearray ），则不得在对 decompressobj() 的调用与对decompressor的 decompress() 方法的第一次调用之间修改其内容。

trans-unit.source: If name has no leading dots, then name is simply returned. This allows for usage such as importlib.util.resolve_name('sys', __package__) without doing a check to see if the package argument is needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称没有前导点，则仅返回名称。这允许使用诸如 importlib.util.resolve_name('sys', __package__) 用法，而无需检查是否需要package参数。

trans-unit.source: If name is for a submodule (contains a dot), the parent module is automatically imported.
trans-unit.target: 如果名称用于子模块（包含点），则将自动导入父模块。

trans-unit.source: If EOF is reached before the complete separator is found, an IncompleteReadError exception is raised, and the internal buffer is reset. The IncompleteReadError.partial attribute may contain a portion of the separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果在找到完整的分隔符之前已到达EOF，则会引发 IncompleteReadError 异常，并重置内部缓冲区。所述 IncompleteReadError.partial 属性可以包含分离器的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If EOF is received and \n was not found, the method returns partially read data.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到EOF并且未找到 \n ，则该方法返回部分读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: If EOF is received and the internal buffer is empty, return an empty bytes object.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收到EOF并且内部缓冲区为空，则返回一个空 bytes 对象。

trans-unit.source: If EOF was received and the internal buffer is empty, return an empty bytes object.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收到EOF并且内部缓冲区为空，则返回一个空 bytes 对象。

trans-unit.source: If IDLE is started with the -n command line switch it will run in a single process and will not create the subprocess which runs the RPC Python execution server. This can be useful if Python cannot create the subprocess or the RPC socket interface on your platform. However, in this mode user code is not isolated from IDLE itself. Also, the environment is not restarted when Run/Run Module (F5) is selected. If your code has been modified, you must reload() the affected modules and re-import any specific items (e.g. from foo import baz) if the changes are to take effect. For these reasons, it is preferable to run IDLE with the default subprocess if at all possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 -n 命令行开关启动 IDLE,它将在单个进程中运行,而不会创建运行 RPC Python 执行服务器的子进程。如果Python不能在你的平台上创建子进程或RPC套接字接口,这可能是有用的。然而,在这种模式下,用户代码不会与IDLE本身隔离。另外,当选择Run/Run Module (F5)时,环境不会被重新启动。如果您的代码已被修改,您必须重新加载()受影响的模块,并重新导入任何特定的项目(例如,从foo导入baz),如果更改要生效。由于这些原因,如果可能的话,最好使用默认子进程运行IDLE。

trans-unit.source: If IDLE quits with no message, and it was not started from a console, try starting from a console (python -m idlelib) and see if a message appears.
trans-unit.target: 如果IDLE退出但没有消息，并且不是从控制台启动的，请尝试从控制台启动（ python -m idlelib ），然后查看是否出现消息。

trans-unit.source: If IDLE quits with no message, and it was not started from a console, try starting it from a console or terminal (python -m idlelib) and see if this results in an error message.
If Python is configured –with-pydebug, it also performs some expensive internal consistency checks.
trans-unit.target: 如果将Python配置为–with-pydebug，它还将执行一些昂贵的内部一致性检查。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is NULL (pushed by BEGIN_FINALLY) continue from the next instruction. TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为 NULL （由 BEGIN_FINALLY 推动），则从下一条指令继续。TOS弹出。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is NULL or an integer (pushed by BEGIN_FINALLY or CALL_FINALLY) it is popped from the stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为 NULL 或整数（由 BEGIN_FINALLY 或 CALL_FINALLY 推送），则将其从堆栈中弹出。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is NULL, calls SECOND(None, None, None), removes the function from the stack, leaving TOS, and pushes None to the stack. Otherwise calls SEVENTH(TOP, SECOND, THIRD), shifts the bottom 3 values of the stack down, replaces the empty spot with NULL and pushes TOS. Finally pushes the result of the call.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为 NULL ，则调用 SECOND(None, None, None) ，从堆栈中删除该函数，保留TOS，然后将 None 推入堆栈。否则调用 SEVENTH(TOP, SECOND, THIRD) ，向下移动堆栈的底部3个值，将空位替换为 NULL 并推入TOS。最后推送呼叫结果。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is an exception type (pushed when an exception has been raised) 6 values are popped from the stack, the first three popped values are used to re-raise the exception and the last three popped values are used to restore the exception state. An exception handler block is removed from the block stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS是异常类型(当异常被引发时推送),则会从堆栈中弹出6个值,前三个弹出的值用于重新引发异常,后三个弹出的值用于恢复异常状态。异常处理块从块栈中删除。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is an exception type (pushed when an exception has been raised) 6 values are popped from the stack, the last three popped values are used to restore the exception state. An exception handler block is removed from the block stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS是异常类型(当异常被引发时推送),则从堆栈中弹出6个值,最后三个弹出的值用于恢复异常状态。异常处理块会从块堆栈中删除。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is an integer (pushed by CALL_FINALLY), sets the bytecode counter to TOS. TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS是整数（由 CALL_FINALLY 推送），则将字节码计数器设置为TOS。TOS弹出。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is false, sets the bytecode counter to target and leaves TOS on the stack. Otherwise (TOS is true), TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为假，则将字节码计数器设置为目标并将TOS留在堆栈上。否则（TOS为true），将弹出TOS。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is false, sets the bytecode counter to target. TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为false，则将字节码计数器设置为target。TOS弹出。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is true, sets the bytecode counter to target and leaves TOS on the stack. Otherwise (TOS is false), TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为true，则将字节码计数器设置为目标并将TOS留在堆栈上。否则（TOS为假），将弹出TOS。

trans-unit.source: If TOS is true, sets the bytecode counter to target. TOS is popped.
trans-unit.target: 如果TOS为true，则将字节码计数器设置为target。TOS弹出。

trans-unit.source: If a join() is currently blocking, it will resume when all items have been processed (meaning that a task_done() call was received for every item that had been put() into the queue).
trans-unit.target: 如果 join() 当前正在阻塞，它将在处理 task_done() 所有项目后恢复（这意味着已将每个 put() 放入队列的项目都收到了task_done（）调用）。
