trans-unit.target: 如果 field() 指定 default_factory ，则在需要该字段的默认值时使用零参数调用它。例如，要创建列表的新实例，请使用：

trans-unit.source: If a join() is currently blocking, it will resume when all items have been processed (meaning that a task_done() call was received for every item that had been put() into the queue).
trans-unit.target: 如果 join() 当前正在阻塞，它将在处理 task_done() 所有项目后恢复（这意味着已将每个 put() 放入队列的项目都收到了task_done（）调用）。

trans-unit.source: If a Future.set_exception() is called but the Future object is never awaited on, the exception would never be propagated to the user code. In this case, asyncio would emit a log message when the Future object is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 Future.set_exception() 但从未等待过Future对象，则永远不会将异常传播到用户代码。在这种情况下，当Future对象被垃圾回收时，asyncio将发出一条日志消息。

trans-unit.source: If a join() is currently blocking, it will resume when all items have been processed (meaning that a task_done() call was received for every item that had been put() into the queue).
trans-unit.target: 如果 join() 当前正在阻塞，它将在处理 task_done() 所有项目后恢复（这意味着已将每个 put() 放入队列的项目都收到了task_done（）调用）。

trans-unit.source: If a virtual environment is in effect, this value will be changed in site.py to point to the virtual environment. The value for the Python installation will still be available, via base_exec_prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果虚拟环境有效，则此值将在 site.py 中更改为指向虚拟环境。通过 base_exec_prefix ，Python安装的值仍然可用。

trans-unit.source: If a virtual environment is in effect, this value will be changed in site.py to point to the virtual environment. The value for the Python installation will still be available, via base_prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果虚拟环境有效，则此值将在 site.py 中更改为指向虚拟环境。通过 base_prefix ，Python安装的值仍然可用。

trans-unit.source: If a func call raises an exception, then that exception will be raised when its value is retrieved from the iterator.
trans-unit.target: 如果func调用引发异常，则从迭代器中检索其值时将引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: If a weights sequence is specified, selections are made according to the relative weights. Alternatively, if a cum_weights sequence is given, the selections are made according to the cumulative weights (perhaps computed using itertools.accumulate()). For example, the relative weights [10, 5, 30, 5] are equivalent to the cumulative weights [10, 15, 45, 50]. Internally, the relative weights are converted to cumulative weights before making selections, so supplying the cumulative weights saves work.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了权重序列，则根据相对权重进行选择。或者，如果给出了cum_weights序列，则根据累积权重（可能使用 itertools.accumulate() 计算）进行选择。例如，相对权重 [10, 5, 30, 5] 等于累积权重 [10, 15, 45, 50] 。在内部，相对权重在进行选择之前会转换为累积权重，因此提供累积权重可以节省工作。

trans-unit.source: If a DOM implementation supports modification of the document, the NodeList implementation must also support the __setitem__() and __delitem__() methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果DOM实现支持对文档的修改，则 NodeList 实现还必须支持 __setitem__() 和 __delitem__() 方法。

trans-unit.source: If a DOM implementation supports modification of the document, the NodeList implementation must also support the __setitem__() and __delitem__() methods.
If a Python build or implementation cannot reasonably compute this information, getallocatedblocks() is allowed to return 0 instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果Python构建或实现无法合理地计算此信息，则允许 getallocatedblocks() 返回0。

trans-unit.source: If a bytes object is specified as first argument, the buffer is made one item larger than its length so that the last element in the array is a NUL termination character. An integer can be passed as second argument which allows specifying the size of the array if the length of the bytes should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定一个字节对象作为第一个参数,缓冲区将比它的长度大一项,因此数组中的最后一个元素是一个NUL终止字符。如果不使用字节的长度,可以传递一个整数作为第二个参数,允许指定数组的大小。

trans-unit.source: If a class is used as a spec then the return value of the mock (the instance of the class) will have the same spec. You can use a class as the spec for an instance object by passing instance=True. The returned mock will only be callable if instances of the mock are callable.
trans-unit.target: 如果将一个类用作规范，则模拟的返回值（该类的实例）将具有相同的规范。通过传递 instance=True ,可以将类用作实例对象的规范。返回的模拟仅在该模拟的实例可调用时才可调用。

trans-unit.source: If a client certificate is needed for the connection, it can be added with SSLContext.load_cert_chain().
trans-unit.target: 如果连接需要客户端证书，则可以使用 SSLContext.load_cert_chain() 添加该证书。

trans-unit.source: If a combination of Flag members is not named, the repr() will include all named flags and all named combinations of flags that are in the value:
trans-unit.target: 如果未命名Flag成员的组合，则 repr() 将包括值中所有已命名的标志和所有已命名标志的组合：

trans-unit.source: If a derived class does not wish to comply with this requirement, all of the special methods supported by this class will need to be overridden; please consult the sources for information about the methods which need to be provided in that case.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个派生类不愿意遵守这个要求,那么这个类所支持的所有特殊方法都需要被覆盖,请查阅资料来源,了解在这种情况下需要提供的方法。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback has been set, forward npgettext() to the fallback. Otherwise, return the translated message. Overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了后备， npgettext() 转发到后备。否则，返回翻译后的消息。在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback has been set, forward pgettext() to the fallback. Otherwise, return the translated message. Overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了后备， pgettext() 转发到后备。否则，返回翻译后的消息。在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback has been set, forward gettext() to the fallback. Otherwise, return message. Overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了后备，则将 gettext() 转发到后备。否则，返回message。在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback has been set, forward ngettext() to the fallback. Otherwise, return singular if n is 1; return plural otherwise. Overridden in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了后备， ngettext() 转发到后备。否则，如果n为1 ，则返回单数；否则，返回奇数。否则返回复数。在派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: If a field is excluded from __init__() (using init=False) and the field also specifies default_factory, then the default factory function will always be called from the generated __init__() function. This happens because there is no other way to give the field an initial value.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 __init__() 排除某个字段（使用 init=False ），并且该字段还指定 default_factory ，则将始终从生成的 __init__() 函数中调用默认工厂函数。发生这种情况是因为没有其他方法可以为该字段提供初始值。

trans-unit.source: If a field is excluded from __init__() (using init=False) and the field also specifies default_factory, then the default factory function will always be called from the generated __init__() function. This happens because there is no other way to give the field an initial value.

If a field represents an uploaded file, accessing the value via the value attribute or the getvalue() method reads the entire file in memory as bytes. This may not be what you want. You can test for an uploaded file by testing either the filename attribute or the file attribute. You can then read the data from the file attribute before it is automatically closed as part of the garbage collection of the FieldStorage instance (the read() and readline() methods will return bytes):
trans-unit.target: 如果字段表示上传的文件，则通过 value 属性或 getvalue() 方法访问该值将读取内存中的整个文件（以字节为单位）。这可能不是您想要的。您可以通过测试 filename 属性或 file 属性来测试上传的文件。然后，您可以从 file 属性读取数据，然后将其自动关闭，作为 FieldStorage 实例的垃圾回收的一部分（ read() 和 readline() 方法将返回字节）：

trans-unit.source: If a file .pdbrc exists in the user’s home directory or in the current directory, it is read in and executed as if it had been typed at the debugger prompt. This is particularly useful for aliases. If both files exist, the one in the home directory is read first and aliases defined there can be overridden by the local file.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件 .pdbrc 在用户的主目录或当前目录中存在，则将其读入并执行，就像在调试器提示符下键入该文件一样。这对于别名特别有用。如果两个文件都存在，则首先读取主目录中的文件，并且本地文件可以覆盖其中定义的别名。

trans-unit.source: If a file named “pyvenv.cfg” exists one directory above sys.executable, sys.prefix and sys.exec_prefix are set to that directory and it is also checked for site-packages (sys.base_prefix and sys.base_exec_prefix will always be the “real” prefixes of the Python installation). If “pyvenv.cfg” (a bootstrap configuration file) contains the key “include-system-site-packages” set to anything other than “true” (case-insensitive), the system-level prefixes will not be searched for site-packages; otherwise they will.
trans-unit.target: 如果名为“ pyvenv.cfg”的文件位于sys.executable上方的一个目录下，则sys.prefix和sys.exec_prefix设置为该目录，并且还会检查站点包（sys.base_prefix和sys.base_exec_prefix将始终是Python安装的“真实”前缀）。如果“ pyvenv.cfg”（引导程序配置文件）包含设置为除“ true”（不区分大小写）以外的任何键的“ include-system-site-packages”键，则不会在系统级前缀中搜索site-包装;否则他们会的。

trans-unit.source: If a file named filename is not found, the function first checks for a PEP 302__loader__ in module_globals. If there is such a loader and it defines a get_source method, then that determines the source lines (if get_source() returns None, then '' is returned). Finally, if filename is a relative filename, it is looked up relative to the entries in the module search path, sys.path.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文件名为文件名没有找到，对于该函数首先检查PEP 302 __loader__ 在module_globals。如果有这样的加载器，并且定义了 get_source 方法，则该方法确定源代码行（如果 get_source() 返回 None ，则返回 '' ）。最后，如果filename是一个相对文件名，则会相对于模块搜索路径 sys.path 中的条目进行查找。

trans-unit.source: If a file object is specified for source or target, it is the caller’s responsibility to close it after calling create_archive.
trans-unit.target: 如果为源或目标指定了文件对象，则调用方有责任在调用create_archive之后将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: If a formatter is specified, it is used to format the record. The record is then written to the stream followed by terminator. If exception information is present, it is formatted using traceback.print_exception() and appended to the stream.

If a formatter is specified, it is used to format the record. The record is then written to the stream with a terminator. If exception information is present, it is formatted using traceback.print_exception() and appended to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了格式化程序，则将其用于格式化记录。然后使用终止符将记录写入流中。如果存在异常信息，则使用 traceback.print_exception() 对其进行格式化并附加到流中。

trans-unit.source: If a generator code directly or indirectly raises StopIteration, it is converted into a RuntimeError (retaining the StopIteration as the new exception’s cause).
trans-unit.target: 如果生成器代码直接或间接引发 StopIteration ，则它将转换为 RuntimeError （将 StopIteration 保留为新异常的原因）。

trans-unit.source: If a group matches multiple times, only the last match is accessible:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个组多次匹配,只能访问最后一次匹配。

trans-unit.source: If a member filename is an absolute path, a drive/UNC sharepoint and leading (back)slashes will be stripped, e.g.: ///foo/bar becomes foo/bar on Unix, and C:\foo\bar becomes foo\bar on Windows. And all ".." components in a member filename will be removed, e.g.: ../../foo../../ba..r becomes foo../ba..r. On Windows illegal characters (:, <, >, |, ", ?, and *) replaced by underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: 如果成员文件名是绝对路径，则将删除驱动器/ UNC共享点和前导（反）斜杠，例如： ///foo/bar foo/bar 在Unix上变为foo / bar，而 C:\foo\bar 变为 foo\bar 在Windows上。并且成员文件名中的所有 ".." 组件都将被删除，例如： ../../foo../../ba..r foo../ba..r ba..r变为foo ../ ba..r。在Windows非法字符（ : ， < ， > ， | ， " ， ? 和 * ）用下划线（代替 _ ）。

trans-unit.source: If a member occurs more than once in the archive, its last occurrence is assumed to be the most up-to-date version.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个成员在档案中出现一次以上,那么最后一次出现的成员被认为是最新的版本。

trans-unit.source: If a mock instance with a name or a spec is assigned to an attribute it won’t be considered in the sealing chain. This allows one to prevent seal from fixing part of the mock object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将具有名称或规格的模拟实例分配给属性，则不会在密封链中考虑该实例。这样可以防止密封件固定模拟对象的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If a module imports objects from another module using from … import …, calling reload() for the other module does not redefine the objects imported from it — one way around this is to re-execute the from statement, another is to use import and qualified names (module.name) instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个模块使用 from … import … 从另一个模块导入对象，则对另一个模块调用 reload() 不会重新定义从该模块导入的对象-一种解决方法是重新执行 from 语句，另一种方法是使用 import 和限定名称（module.name）代替。

trans-unit.source: If a module imports objects from another module using from … import …, calling reload() for the other module does not redefine the objects imported from it — one way around this is to re-execute the from statement, another is to use import and qualified names (module.name) instead.

If a module instantiates instances of a class, reloading the module that defines the class does not affect the method definitions of the instances — they continue to use the old class definition. The same is true for derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 如果模块实例化了一个类的实例，则重新加载定义该类的模块不会影响实例的方法定义-它们将继续使用旧的类定义。派生类也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If a module provides a load_tests function it will be called to load the tests. This allows modules to customize test loading. This is the load_tests protocol. The pattern argument is passed as the third argument to load_tests.
trans-unit.target: 如果模块提供了 load_tests 函数，则会调用它以加载测试。这允许模块自定义测试加载。这是load_tests协议。的图案参数作为第三个参数，以传递 load_tests 。

trans-unit.source: If a mutable buffer is passed, then the behaviour is determined by the value of the mutate_flag parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了可变缓冲区，则行为由mutate_flag参数的值确定。

trans-unit.source: If a mutable mapping is not available or if space-efficient key sharing is desired, an effect similar to cached_property() can be achieved by a stacking property() on top of cache():
If a new seeding method is added, then a backward compatible seeder will be offered.
trans-unit.target: 如果增加了新的播种方式,则会提供落后的兼容播种机。

trans-unit.source: If a package (a directory containing a file named __init__.py) is found, the package will be checked for a load_tests function. If this exists then it will be called package.load_tests(loader, tests, pattern). Test discovery takes care to ensure that a package is only checked for tests once during an invocation, even if the load_tests function itself calls loader.discover.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一个包（包含名为 __init__.py 的文件的目录），则将检查该包的 load_tests 函数。如果存在，则将其称为 package.load_tests(loader, tests, pattern) 。测试发现要小心确保即使调用load_tests函数本身调用 loader.discover ，在调用过程中仅对软件包进行一次测试检查。

trans-unit.source: If a part has a Content-Disposition header, only consider the part a candidate match if the value of the header is inline.
trans-unit.target: 如果零件具有Content-Disposition标头，则仅当标头值为 inline 时，才将该零件视为候选匹配项。

trans-unit.source: If a particular application uses this pattern a lot, it can be simplified even further by means of a small helper class:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个特定的应用程序大量使用这种模式,可以通过一个小的辅助类来进一步简化。

trans-unit.source: If a pointer points to an array, its elements can be read and written using standard subscript and slice accesses. Pointer objects have no size, so len() will raise TypeError. Negative subscripts will read from the memory before the pointer (as in C), and out-of-range subscripts will probably crash with an access violation (if you’re lucky).
trans-unit.target: 如果指针指向数组，则可以使用标准下标和切片访问来读取和写入其元素。指针对象没有大小，因此 len() 将引发 TypeError 。负下标将在指针之前从内存中读取（与C中一样），超出范围的下标可能会因访问冲突而崩溃（如果很幸运）。

trans-unit.source: If a process is killed using Process.terminate() or os.kill() while it is trying to use a Queue, then the data in the queue is likely to become corrupted. This may cause any other process to get an exception when it tries to use the queue later on.
trans-unit.target: 如果在尝试使用 Queue 时使用 Process.terminate() 或 os.kill() 将其杀死，则该队列中的数据可能会损坏。这可能会导致其他进程稍后尝试使用队列时获得异常。

trans-unit.source: If a process is killed while it is trying to read or write to a pipe then the data in the pipe is likely to become corrupted, because it may become impossible to be sure where the message boundaries lie.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个进程在试图读取或写入管道时被杀死,那么管道中的数据很可能会被破坏,因为可能无法确定消息的边界在哪里。

trans-unit.source: If a regular expression ends with a greedy match (such as .*) or if more than one expression can match the same input, the results are non-deterministic, and may depend on the I/O timing.
trans-unit.target: 如果正则表达式以贪婪的匹配（例如 .* ）结尾，或者一个以上的表达式可以匹配同一输入，则结果是不确定的，并且可能取决于I / O时序。

trans-unit.source: If a row has more fields than fieldnames, the remaining data is put in a list and stored with the fieldname specified by restkey (which defaults to None). If a non-blank row has fewer fields than fieldnames, the missing values are filled-in with None.
trans-unit.target: 如果行中的字段多于字段名，则其余数据将放入列表中，并以restkey指定的字段名存储（默认为 None ）。如果非空白行的字段少于字段名，则缺少的值将用 None 填充。

trans-unit.source: If a row has more fields than fieldnames, the remaining data is put in a list and stored with the fieldname specified by restkey (which defaults to None). If a non-blank row has fewer fields than fieldnames, the missing values are filled-in with the value of restval (which defaults to None).
If a second argument is present, it is an expression which must evaluate to true before the breakpoint is honored.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在第二个参数,它是一个表达式,在断点被尊重之前,它必须评估为真。

trans-unit.source: If a sequence of events takes longer to run than the time available before the next event, the scheduler will simply fall behind. No events will be dropped; the calling code is responsible for canceling events which are no longer pertinent.
trans-unit.target: 如果一连串事件的运行时间超过了下一个事件之前的可用时间,调度器就会落后。任何事件都不会被放弃;调用代码负责取消不再相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: If a string is returned, the string should be interpreted as the name of a global variable. It should be the object’s local name relative to its module; the pickle module searches the module namespace to determine the object’s module. This behaviour is typically useful for singletons.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回字符串，则该字符串应解释为全局变量的名称。它应该是对象相对于其模块的本地名称；pickle模块搜索模块名称空间以确定对象的模块。此行为通常对单例有用。

trans-unit.source: If a string is specified as first argument, the buffer is made one item larger than the length of the string so that the last element in the array is a NUL termination character. An integer can be passed as second argument which allows specifying the size of the array if the length of the string should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定一个字符串作为第一个参数,则缓冲区会比字符串的长度大一项,这样数组中的最后一个元素就是一个NUL终止字符。如果不使用字符串的长度,可以传递一个整数作为第二个参数,允许指定数组的大小。

trans-unit.source: If a string of characters is typed, the ACW selection will jump to the entry most closely matching those characters. Entering a
trans-unit.target: 如果输入了一串字符,ACW选择将跳转到与这些字符最匹配的条目。输入一个

trans-unit.source: If a subclass of dict defines a method __missing__() and key is not present, the d[key] operation calls that method with the key key as argument. The d[key] operation then returns or raises whatever is returned or raised by the __missing__(key) call. No other operations or methods invoke __missing__(). If __missing__() is not defined, KeyError is raised. __missing__() must be a method; it cannot be an instance variable:
trans-unit.target: 如果dict的子类定义了方法 __missing__() 并且key不存在，则 d[key] 操作将以key key作为参数调用该方法。的 d[key] 然后，操作返回或任何由返回或凸起加注 __missing__(key) 呼叫。没有其他操作或方法调用 __missing__() 。如果 __missing__() 没有定义， KeyError 异常升高。 __missing__() 必须是一个方法；它不能是实例变量：

trans-unit.source: If a subclass of dict defines a method __missing__() and key is not present, the d[key] operation calls that method with the key key as argument. The d[key] operation then returns or raises whatever is returned or raised by the __missing__(key) call. No other operations or methods invoke __missing__(). If __missing__() is not defined, KeyError is raised. __missing__() must be a method; it cannot be an instance variable:
If a subclass overrides the constructor, it must make sure it invokes the base class constructor (Process.__init__()) before doing anything else to the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果子类覆盖了构造函数，则必须确保在对 Process.__init__() 进行其他任何操作之前，它调用基类的构造函数（Process .__ init __（））。

trans-unit.source: If a test is dependent on a specific condition of the operating system then verify the condition already exists before attempting the test.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个测试依赖于操作系统的特定条件,那么在尝试测试之前,请确认该条件已经存在。

trans-unit.source: If a test module defines load_tests it will be called by TestLoader.loadTestsFromModule() with the following arguments:
trans-unit.target: 如果测试模块定义了 load_tests ，它将由 TestLoader.loadTestsFromModule() 使用以下参数调用：

trans-unit.source: If a test using SHORT_TIMEOUT starts to fail randomly on slow buildbots, use LONG_TIMEOUT instead.
If a timeout occurs, it cancels the task and raises asyncio.TimeoutError.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生超时，它将取消任务并引发 asyncio.TimeoutError 。

trans-unit.source: If a timestamp stored in SQLite has a fractional part longer than 6 numbers, its value will be truncated to microsecond precision by the timestamp converter.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储在SQLite中的时间戳的小数部分长于6个数字,它的值将被时间戳转换器截断为微秒精度。

trans-unit.source: If a valid align value is specified, it can be preceded by a fill character that can be any character and defaults to a space if omitted. It is not possible to use a literal curly brace (“{” or “}”) as the fill character in a formatted string literal or when using the str.format() method. However, it is possible to insert a curly brace with a nested replacement field. This limitation doesn’t affect the format() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了有效的对齐值，则可以在其前面加上填充字符，该填充字符可以是任何字符，并且如果省略则默认为空格。在格式化的字符串文字中或使用 str.format() 方法时，不能使用文字大括号（“ { ”或“ } ”）作为填充字符。但是，可以插入带有嵌套替换字段的花括号。此限制不会影响 format() 函数。

trans-unit.source: If a valid align value is specified, it can be preceded by a fill character that can be any character and defaults to a space if omitted. It is not possible to use a literal curly brace (“{” or “}”) as the fill character in a formatted string literal or when using the str.format() method. However, it is possible to insert a curly brace with a nested replacement field. This limitation doesn’t affect the format() function.
If a warning is reported and doesn’t match any registered filter then the “default” action is applied (hence its name).
trans-unit.target: 如果报告了警告，但与任何已注册的过滤器都不匹配，则将应用“默认”操作（因此其名称）。

trans-unit.source: If a welcome message is not received, then AuthenticationError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果未收到欢迎消息，则会引发 AuthenticationError 。

trans-unit.source: If all awaitables are completed successfully, the result is an aggregate list of returned values. The order of result values corresponds to the order of awaitables in aws.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有等待项都成功完成，则结果将是返回值的汇总列表。结果值的顺序对应于aws中的等待顺序。

trans-unit.source: If all of the input data was decompressed and returned (either because this was less than max_length bytes, or because max_length was negative), the needs_input attribute will be set to True.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有输入数据都已解压缩并返回（或者因为它小于max_length个字节，或者因为max_length为负数），那么 needs_input 属性将设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: If all of the input data was decompressed and returned (either because this was less than max_length bytes, or because max_length was negative), the needs_input attribute will be set to True.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有输入数据都已解压缩并返回（或者因为它小于max_length个字节，或者因为max_length为负数），那么 needs_input 属性将设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: If all you want is a unique ID, you should probably call uuid1() or uuid4(). Note that uuid1() may compromise privacy since it creates a UUID containing the computer’s network address. uuid4() creates a random UUID.
trans-unit.target: 如果只需要一个唯一的ID，则应该调用 uuid1() 或 uuid4() 。请注意， uuid1() 可能会破坏隐私，因为它会创建一个包含计算机网络地址的UUID。 uuid4() 创建一个随机UUID。

trans-unit.source: If an action was provided to the constructor, one of the threads will have called it prior to being released. Should this call raise an error, the barrier is put into the broken state.
trans-unit.target: 如果向构造函数提供了操作，则其中一个线程将在释放之前对其进行调用。如果此调用引发错误，则屏障将进入断开状态。

trans-unit.source: If an address of ‘0.0.0.0’ is used, the address will not be a connectable end point on Windows. If you require a connectable end-point, you should use ‘127.0.0.1’.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的地址为“ 0.0.0.0”，则该地址在Windows上将不是可连接的端点。如果需要可连接的端点，则应使用“ 127.0.0.1”。

trans-unit.source: If an ancestor is found with a level other than NOTSET, then that ancestor’s level is treated as the effective level of the logger where the ancestor search began, and is used to determine how a logging event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现某个祖先的级别不是NOTSET，那么该祖先的级别将被视为祖先搜索开始的记录器的有效级别，并用于确定如何处理日志事件。

trans-unit.source: If an application archive has a shebang line, it may have the executable bit set on POSIX systems, to allow it to be executed directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个应用程序存档有shebang行,它可能在POSIX系统上设置了可执行位,以允许它直接执行。

trans-unit.source: If an application does not care about tracking significance, it is easy to remove the exponent and trailing zeroes, losing significance, but keeping the value unchanged:
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序不关心跟踪意义,很容易去掉指数和尾部的零,失去意义,但保持值不变。

trans-unit.source: If an argument outside those ranges is given, ValueError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了超出这些范围的参数，则会引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: If an argument outside those ranges is given, ValueError is raised. All default to 0 except tzinfo, which defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了超出这些范围的参数，则会引发 ValueError 。除tzinfo以外，所有其他均默认为 0 ，其默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to change any object in a way that is not permitted with regard to the Namespaces in XML recommendation, this exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果试图以XML命名空间建议中所不允许的方式更改任何对象，则会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered during configuration, this function will raise a ValueError, TypeError, AttributeError or ImportError with a suitably descriptive message. The following is a (possibly incomplete) list of conditions which will raise an error:
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置过程中遇到错误，此函数将引发 ValueError ， TypeError ， AttributeError 或 ImportError 以及适当的描述性消息。以下是（可能不完整）会引起错误的条件列表：

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered when obtaining the contents of an uploaded file (for example, when the user interrupts the form submission by clicking on a Back or Cancel button) the done attribute of the object for the field will be set to the value -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在获取上载文件的内容时遇到错误（例如，当用户通过单击“上一步”或“取消”来中断表单提交时），则该字段的对象的 done 属性将设置为值-1 。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised by the call, then is re-raised by _callmethod(). If some other exception is raised in the manager’s process then this is converted into a RemoteError exception and is raised by _callmethod().
trans-unit.target: 如果调用引发异常，则由 _callmethod() 重新引发。如果在管理器的过程中引发了其他异常，则该异常将转换为 RemoteError 异常，并由 _callmethod() 引发。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised by the decorated method and a module was added to sys.modules, then the module will be removed to prevent a partially initialized module from being in left in sys.modules. If the module was already in sys.modules then it is left alone.
trans-unit.target: 如果修饰的方法引发异常，并且已将模块添加到 sys.modules 中，则将删除该模块，以防止部分初始化的模块留在 sys.modules 中。如果模块已经在 sys.modules 中,则将其保留下来。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised during a setUpClass then the tests in the class are not run and the tearDownClass is not run. Skipped classes will not have setUpClass or tearDownClass run. If the exception is a SkipTest exception then the class will be reported as having been skipped instead of as an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 setUpClass 期间引发异常，则不会运行该类中的测试，也不会运行 tearDownClass 。跳过的类将不会运行 setUpClass 或 tearDownClass 。如果该异常是 SkipTest 异常，则该类将被报告为已跳过而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised during execution of the exit handlers, a traceback is printed (unless SystemExit is raised) and the exception information is saved. After all exit handlers have had a chance to run the last exception to be raised is re-raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果在执行出口处理程序的过程中引发异常，则会打印回溯（除非引发 SystemExit ）并保存异常信息。在所有退出处理程序都有机会运行之后，将重新引发要引发的最后一个异常。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised from the sni_callback function the TLS connection will terminate with a fatal TLS alert message ALERT_DESCRIPTION_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE.
trans-unit.target: 如果sni_callback函数引发异常，则TLS连接将以致命的TLS警报消息 ALERT_DESCRIPTION_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE 终止。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised in a setUpModule then none of the tests in the module will be run and the tearDownModule will not be run. If the exception is a SkipTest exception then the module will be reported as having been skipped instead of as an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果 setUpModule 中引发了异常，则模块中的任何测试都不会运行，而 tearDownModule 也不会运行。如果该异常是 SkipTest 异常，则该模块将被报告为已跳过而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If an exception is raised in the coroutine, the returned Future will be notified. It can also be used to cancel the task in the event loop:
trans-unit.target: 如果在coroutine中出现异常,返回的Future将被通知。它也可以用来取消事件循环中的任务。

trans-unit.source: If an implementation registered to abstract base class, virtual subclasses will be dispatched to that implementation:

If an implementation wishes to retain compatibility with the existing email package policies, name should be the case preserved name (all characters up to the ‘:’ separator), while value should be the unfolded value (all line separator characters removed, but whitespace kept intact), stripped of leading whitespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现希望保持与现有电子邮件软件包策略的兼容性，则name应该是大小写保留的名称（所有字符，直到' : '分隔符），而value应该是展开的值（所有行分隔符都被删除，但保留空白）完整），去除了领先的空白。

trans-unit.source: If an implementation wishes to retain compatibility with the existing email package policies, the name and value should be strings or string subclasses that do not change the content of the passed in arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现希望保持与现有电子邮件软件包策略的兼容性，则名称和值应为不更改传入参数内容的字符串或字符串子类。

trans-unit.source: If an iterable of key names is passed to the only_keys parameter, only the specified keys will be removed from the cache. Keys passed to only_keys but not found in the cache are ignored.
If an object containing an unsupported type was marshalled with dump(), load() will substitute None for the unmarshallable type.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 dump() 整理了包含不受支持类型的对象，则 load() 将用 None 替代无法整理的类型。

trans-unit.source: If any Task or Future from the aws sequence is cancelled, it is treated as if it raised CancelledError – the gather() call is not cancelled in this case. This is to prevent the cancellation of one submitted Task/Future to cause other Tasks/Futures to be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 如果aws序列中的任何Task或Future 被取消，则将其视为引发 CancelledError 的情况 – 在这种情况下，不会取消collect gather() 调用。这是为了防止取消一个已提交的任务/未来导致其他任务/未来被取消。

trans-unit.source: If any argument is a float and there are fractional microseconds, the fractional microseconds left over from all arguments are combined and their sum is rounded to the nearest microsecond using round-half-to-even tiebreaker. If no argument is a float, the conversion and normalization processes are exact (no information is lost).
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数是浮动数,并且有小数微秒,则将所有参数剩余的小数微秒合并,并使用四舍五入平分法将其总和四舍五入到最接近的微秒。如果没有参数是float,则转换和归一化过程是精确的(没有信息丢失)。

trans-unit.source: If any awaitable in aws is a coroutine, it is automatically scheduled as a Task.
trans-unit.target: 如果aws中有任何等待的协程，它将自动安排为任务。

trans-unit.source: If any cycle is detected, CycleError will be raised.
If any members of the iterable are exceptions they will be raised instead of returned:
trans-unit.target: 如果iterable中的任何成员是异常,它们将被提出而不是返回。

trans-unit.source: If any of suffix, prefix, and dir are not None, they must be the same type. If they are bytes, the returned name will be bytes instead of str. If you want to force a bytes return value with otherwise default behavior, pass suffix=b''.
trans-unit.target: 如果后缀，prefix和dir中的任何 None 都不为None，则它们必须是同一类型。如果它们是字节，则返回的名称将是字节而不是str。如果要使用其他默认行为强制返回字节返回值，请传递 suffix=b'' 。

trans-unit.source: If any option is given, the script will exit with one of these values: 0 if the user site-packages directory is enabled, 1 if it was disabled by the user, 2 if it is disabled for security reasons or by an administrator, and a value greater than 2 if there is an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何选项，则该脚本将这些值中的一个退出： 0 如果启用了用户site-packages目录， 1 ，如果它是由用户，禁用 2 如果是出于安全考虑还是被管理员禁用，并如果有错误，则该值大于2。

trans-unit.source: If any precondition isn’t met (e.g. not TLS 1.3, PHA not enabled), an SSLError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果不满足任何前提条件（例如不支持TLS 1.3，未启用PHA）， SSLError 引发SSLError。

trans-unit.source: If at least one of encoding or errors is given, object should be a bytes-like object (e.g. bytes or bytearray). In this case, if object is a bytes (or bytearray) object, then str(bytes, encoding, errors) is equivalent to bytes.decode(encoding, errors). Otherwise, the bytes object underlying the buffer object is obtained before calling bytes.decode(). See Binary Sequence Types — bytes, bytearray, memoryview and Buffer Protocol for information on buffer objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少给出编码或错误之一，则object应该是类似字节的对象（例如 bytes 或 bytearray ）。在这种情况下，如果object是一个 bytes （或 bytearray ）对象，则 str(bytes, encoding, errors) 等效于 bytes.decode(encoding, errors) 。否则，将在调用 bytes.decode() 之前获取缓冲区对象基础的bytes对象。有关缓冲区对象的信息，请参见二进制序列类型-字节，字节数组，内存视图和缓冲区协议。

trans-unit.source: If at least one of encoding or errors is given, object should be a bytes-like object (e.g. bytes or bytearray). In this case, if object is a bytes (or bytearray) object, then str(bytes, encoding, errors) is equivalent to bytes.decode(encoding, errors). Otherwise, the bytes object underlying the buffer object is obtained before calling bytes.decode(). See Binary Sequence Types — bytes, bytearray, memoryview and Buffer Protocol for information on buffer objects.

If authentication is requested but no authentication key is specified then the return value of current_process().authkey is used (see Process). This value will be automatically inherited by any Process object that the current process creates. This means that (by default) all processes of a multi-process program will share a single authentication key which can be used when setting up connections between themselves.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求身份验证但未指定身份验证密钥，则使用 current_process().authkey 的返回值（请参阅 Process ）。当前进程创建的任何 Process 对象都会自动继承此值。这意味着（默认情况下）多进程程序的所有进程将共享一个身份验证密钥，该身份验证密钥可在它们之间建立连接时使用。

trans-unit.source: If backslashes immediately precede a double quotation mark, every pair of backslashes is interpreted as a literal backslash. If the number of backslashes is odd, the last backslash escapes the next double quotation mark as described in rule 3.
trans-unit.target: 如果反斜线紧接在双引号之前,每一对反斜线都被解释为一个字面反斜线。如果反斜杠的数量是奇数,则最后一个反斜杠按照规则3的规定转过下一个双引号。

trans-unit.source: If both cancel_futures and wait are True, all futures that the executor has started running will be completed prior to this method returning. The remaining futures are cancelled.

If both are aware and have different tzinfo attributes, a-b acts as if a and b were first converted to naive UTC datetimes first. The result is (a.replace(tzinfo=None) - a.utcoffset()) - (b.replace(tzinfo=None) - b.utcoffset()) except that the implementation never overflows.
trans-unit.target: 如果两者都知道并且具有不同的 tzinfo 属性，则 a-b 作用就好像首先将a和b首先转换为朴素的UTC日期时间一样。结果是 (a.replace(tzinfo=None) - a.utcoffset()) - (b.replace(tzinfo=None) - b.utcoffset()) 除了实现永不溢出。

trans-unit.source: If both are naive, or both are aware and have the same tzinfo attribute, the tzinfo attributes are ignored, and the result is a timedelta object t such that datetime2 + t == datetime1. No time zone adjustments are done in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果两者都很幼稚，或者两者都知道并且具有相同的 tzinfo 属性，则 tzinfo 属性将被忽略，结果是一个 timedelta 对象t，使得 datetime2 + t == datetime1 。在这种情况下，不进行时区调整。

trans-unit.source: If both callbacks signal EOF then spawn will probably never return, unless select throws an error on your platform when passed three empty lists. This is a bug, documented in issue 26228.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个回调均指示EOF，则除非可能在传递三个空列表时select在平台上抛出错误，否则spawn可能永远不会返回。这是一个错误，已在问题26228中记录。

trans-unit.source: If both comparands are aware, and have the same tzinfo attribute, the common tzinfo attribute is ignored and the base datetimes are compared. If both comparands are aware and have different tzinfo attributes, the comparands are first adjusted by subtracting their UTC offsets (obtained from self.utcoffset()).
trans-unit.target: 如果两个比较符都知道并且具有相同的 tzinfo 属性，则将忽略公共 tzinfo 属性，并比较基本日期时间。如果两个比较器都知道并且具有不同的 tzinfo 属性，则首先通过减去其UTC偏移量（从 self.utcoffset() 获得）来调整比较器。

trans-unit.source: If both comparands are aware, and have the same tzinfo attribute, the common tzinfo attribute is ignored and the base times are compared. If both comparands are aware and have different tzinfo attributes, the comparands are first adjusted by subtracting their UTC offsets (obtained from self.utcoffset()). In order to stop mixed-type comparisons from falling back to the default comparison by object address, when a time object is compared to an object of a different type, TypeError is raised unless the comparison is == or !=. The latter cases return False or True, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个比较器都知道并且具有相同的 tzinfo 属性，则将忽略公共 tzinfo 属性并比较基准时间。如果两个比较器都知道并且具有不同的 tzinfo 属性，则首先通过减去其UTC偏移量（从 self.utcoffset() 获得）来调整比较器。为了阻止混合类型比较回退到按对象地址进行的默认比较，当将 time 对象与其他类型的对象进行比较时，除非比较 == 或 != ,否则 TypeError 。后一种情况分别返回 False 或 True 。

trans-unit.source: If both options are given, user base and user site will be printed (always in this order), separated by os.pathsep.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时给出两个选项，则将打印用户基础和用户站点（始终按此顺序），并以 os.pathsep 分隔。

trans-unit.source: If both the dispatch_table and reducer_override() are defined, then reducer_override() method takes priority.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时定义了 dispatch_table 和 reducer_override() ，则 reducer_override() 方法优先。

trans-unit.source: If called for text that doesn’t include a period character ('.'), it will complete from names currently defined in __main__, builtins and keywords (as defined by the keyword module).
trans-unit.target: 如果要求输入不包含句点字符（ '.' ）的文本，它将以 __main__ 中当前定义的名称， builtins 函数和关键字（由 keyword 模块定义）完成。

trans-unit.source: If called for a dotted name, it will try to evaluate anything without obvious side-effects (functions will not be evaluated, but it can generate calls to __getattr__()) up to the last part, and find matches for the rest via the dir() function. Any exception raised during the evaluation of the expression is caught, silenced and None is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果要求使用点名，它将尝试评估没有明显副作用（不会评估函数，但可以生成对 __getattr__() 调用）到最后一部分的内容，并通过 dir() 查找其余部分的匹配项。（）功能。表达式求值期间引发的任何异常都将被捕获，沉默并返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: If called for a dotted name, it will try to evaluate anything without obvious side-effects (functions will not be evaluated, but it can generate calls to __getattr__()) up to the last part, and find matches for the rest via the dir() function. Any exception raised during the evaluation of the expression is caught, silenced and None is returned.
If called multiple times with the same node argument, the set of dependencies will be the union of all dependencies passed in.

If called without arguments (or with tz=None) the system local timezone is assumed for the target timezone. The .tzinfo attribute of the converted datetime instance will be set to an instance of timezone with the zone name and offset obtained from the OS.
trans-unit.target: 如果在不带参数的情况下（或在 tz=None 的情况下）被调用，则系统本地时区将作为目标时区。转换后的datetime实例的 .tzinfo 属性将设置为具有从OS获得的区域名称和偏移量的 timezone 实例。

trans-unit.source: If calling default_factory raises an exception this exception is propagated unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 default_factory 引发异常，则此异常将不更改地传播。

trans-unit.source: If completion is enabled, completing commands will be done automatically, and completing of commands args is done by calling complete_foo() with arguments text, line, begidx, and endidx. text is the string prefix we are attempting to match: all returned matches must begin with it. line is the current input line with leading whitespace removed, begidx and endidx are the beginning and ending indexes of the prefix text, which could be used to provide different completion depending upon which position the argument is in.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了完成功能，则完成命令将自动完成，而参数args的完成则通过调用带有参数text，line，begidx和endidx的 complete_foo() 来完成。text是我们尝试匹配的字符串前缀：所有返回的匹配项都必须以它开头。line是当前输入行，其中删除了前导空格，begidx和endidx是前缀文本的开始和结束索引，可根据参数所处的位置来提供不同的补全。

trans-unit.source: If cookie has the named cookie-attribute, return its value. Otherwise, return default.
trans-unit.target: 如果cookie具有命名的cookie属性，则返回其值。否则，返回default。

trans-unit.source: If defined, persistent_load() should return the object specified by the persistent ID pid. If an invalid persistent ID is encountered, an UnpicklingError should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果已定义，则 persistent_load() 应返回由持久性ID pid指定的对象。如果遇到无效的永久性ID，则应引发 UnpicklingError 。

trans-unit.source: If discovery is started in a directory containing a package, either from the command line or by calling TestLoader.discover(), then the package __init__.py will be checked for load_tests. If that function does not exist, discovery will recurse into the package as though it were just another directory. Otherwise, discovery of the package’s tests will be left up to load_tests which is called with the following arguments:
trans-unit.target: 如果从命令行或通过调用 TestLoader.discover() 在包含软件包的目录中开始发现，则将检查软件包 __init__.py 中的 load_tests 。如果该功能不存在，发现将被递归到软件包中，就好像它只是另一个目录一样。否则，包测试的发现将留给 load_tests ，它使用以下参数调用：

trans-unit.source: If echo free input is unavailable getpass() falls back to printing a warning message to stream and reading from sys.stdin and issuing a GetPassWarning.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有无回声输入，则getpass（）会退回到打印警告消息以流式传输并从 sys.stdin 中读取并发出 GetPassWarning 。

trans-unit.source: If either BrokenPipeError or ConnectionResetError exception is raised when writing input into stdin, the exception is ignored. This condition occurs when the process exits before all data are written into stdin.
trans-unit.target: 如果将输入写入stdin时引发了 BrokenPipeError 或 ConnectionResetError 异常，则将忽略该异常。当进程在所有数据都写入stdin之前退出时，就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If either format string is not supported by the struct module, then the objects will always compare as unequal (even if the format strings and buffer contents are identical):
trans-unit.target: 如果 struct 模块不支持任何一个格式字符串，则对象将始终比较不相等（即使格式字符串和缓冲区内容相同）：

trans-unit.source: If end of file is found and no bytes were read, raise EOFError. Otherwise, when nothing matches, return (-1, None, data) where data is the bytes received so far (may be empty bytes if a timeout happened).
trans-unit.target: 如果找到文件末尾且未读取任何字节，请引发 EOFError 。否则，如果没有匹配项，则返回 (-1, None, data) ，其中data是到目前为止接收到的字节（如果发生超时，则可以是空字节）。

trans-unit.source: If exception(s) occur, an Error is raised with a list of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常，则会引发 Error 并列出原因。

trans-unit.source: If fullname contains a ‘.’, the finders will be for the package containing fullname, otherwise they will be all registered top level finders (i.e. those on both sys.meta_path and sys.path_hooks).
trans-unit.target: 如果全名包含“。”，则查找器将用于包含全名的程序包，否则它们将是所有已注册的顶级查找器（即sys.meta_path和sys.path_hooks上的顶级查找器）。

trans-unit.source: If given a list or string, the initializer is passed to the new array’s fromlist(), frombytes(), or fromunicode() method (see below) to add initial items to the array. Otherwise, the iterable initializer is passed to the extend() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了列表或字符串，则将初始化程序传递给新数组的 fromlist() ， frombytes() 或 fromunicode() 方法（请参见下文），以将初始项添加到数组中。否则，可迭代的初始值设定项将传递给 extend() 方法。

trans-unit.source: If given, compress_type overrides the value given for the compression parameter to the constructor for the new entry, or in the zinfo_or_arcname (if that is a ZipInfo instance). Similarly, compresslevel will override the constructor if given.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，compress_type会为新条目的构造函数或zinfo_or_arcname（如果是 ZipInfo 实例）覆盖为压缩参数给构造函数的值。同样，如果指定，compresslevel将覆盖构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If given, default will be returned if the object does not provide means to retrieve the size. Otherwise a TypeError will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，则如果对象不提供检索大小的方法，则将返回默认值。否则会引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If given, doc will be the docstring of the property attribute. Otherwise, the property will copy fget’s docstring (if it exists). This makes it possible to create read-only properties easily using property() as a decorator:
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，doc将是属性属性的文档字符串。否则，该属性将复制fget的文档字符串（如果存在）。这样就可以使用 property() 作为修饰符轻松地创建只读属性：

trans-unit.source: If given, doc will be the docstring of the property attribute. Otherwise, the property will copy fget’s docstring (if it exists). This makes it possible to create read-only properties easily using property() as a decorator:
If given, extra_args is a sequence of (name, value) pairs that will be used as extra keywords arguments when the archiver callable is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，extra_args是 (name, value) 对的序列，当使用Archiver Callable时将用作额外的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: If given, level should be either a numeric logging level or its string equivalent (for example either "ERROR" or logging.ERROR). The default is logging.INFO.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，则level应该是数字日志记录级别或其等效的字符串（例如 "ERROR" 或 logging.ERROR ）。默认值为 logging.INFO 。

trans-unit.source: If given, logger should be a logging.Logger object or a str giving the name of a logger. The default is the root logger, which will catch all messages that were not blocked by a non-propagating descendent logger.
If given, logger should be a logging.Logger object or a str giving the name of a logger. The default is the root logger, which will catch all messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，则logger应该是 logging.Logger 对象或提供记录器名称的 str 。默认值为root logger，它将捕获所有消息。

trans-unit.source: If given, startupinfo will be a STARTUPINFO object, which is passed to the underlying CreateProcess function. creationflags, if given, can be one or more of the following flags:
trans-unit.target: 如果给定，startupinfo将是一个 STARTUPINFO 对象，该对象将传递给基础 CreateProcess 函数。creationflags（如果提供）可以是以下一个或多个标志：

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, specifies how much space, in character widths, to allocate for the text label, if less than zero, specifies a minimum width. If zero or unspecified, the natural width of the text label is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,指定为文本标签分配多少字符宽度的空间,如果小于零,指定最小宽度。如果为零或未指定,则使用文本标签的自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: If importing a module fails, for example due to a syntax error, then this will be recorded as a single error and discovery will continue. If the import failure is due to SkipTest being raised, it will be recorded as a skip instead of an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果导入模块失败，例如由于语法错误，则将其记录为单个错误，并且发现将继续。如果导入失败是由于引发 SkipTest 引起的，它将被记录为跳过而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If input is a number greater than 10 or smaller than 0.5, speed is set to 0. Speedstrings are mapped to speedvalues as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的数字大于10或小于0.5,则将速度设置为0。 速度字符串与速度值的映射如下。

trans-unit.source: If invalid arguments are passed in, it will issue an error:
trans-unit.target: 如果传入无效的参数,它将发出一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If invoked without arguments, clear all cookies. If given a single argument, only cookies belonging to that domain will be removed. If given two arguments, cookies belonging to the specified domain and URL path are removed. If given three arguments, then the cookie with the specified domain, path and name is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在不带参数的情况下调用，请清除所有cookie。如果给定单个参数，则仅删除属于该域的 cookie 。如果提供两个参数，则将删除属于指定域和URL 路径的 cookie 。如果提供了三个参数，则将删除具有指定domain，path和name的cookie 。

trans-unit.source: If it falls back to the boilerplate, there are no more possible methods to try, so this is where the default implementation should live.
trans-unit.target: 如果落回锅炉模板,就没有更多可能的方法可以尝试,所以这就是默认实现应该存在的地方。

trans-unit.source: If it is a str, unescaped non-ASCII characters in string are encoded into UTF-8 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是一个 str ，在不转义非ASCII字符的字符串被编码成UTF-8字节。

trans-unit.source: If it is a string, you must also give the encoding (and optionally, errors) parameters; bytearray() then converts the string to bytes using str.encode().
trans-unit.target: 如果它是字符串，则还必须提供encoding（和可选的errors）参数。然后， bytearray() 使用 str.encode() 将字符串转换为字节。

trans-unit.source: If it is an integer, the array will have that size and will be initialized with null bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是整数，则数组将具有该大小，并将使用空字节初始化。

trans-unit.source: If it is an iterable, it must be an iterable of integers in the range 0 <= x < 256, which are used as the initial contents of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是可迭代的，则它必须是 0 <= x < 256 范围内的整数的可迭代对象，这些整数用作数组的初始内容。

trans-unit.source: If it is an object conforming to the buffer interface, a read-only buffer of the object will be used to initialize the bytes array.
If it is an object conforming to the buffer interface, a read-only buffer of the object will be used to initialize the bytes array.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是符合缓冲区接口的对象，则该对象的只读缓冲区将用于初始化bytes数组。

trans-unit.source: If it is an open file object, the archive will be written to that file object, which must be open for writing in bytes mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果是打开的文件对象,档案将被写入该文件对象,该文件对象必须以字节模式打开才能写入。

trans-unit.source: If it is called without arguments, it will print the contents of sys.path on the standard output, followed by the value of USER_BASE and whether the directory exists, then the same thing for USER_SITE, and finally the value of ENABLE_USER_SITE.
trans-unit.target: 如果不带参数调用它，它将在标准输出上打印 sys.path 的内容，然后打印 USER_BASE 的值和目录是否存在，然后对 USER_SITE 进行相同的打印，最后对 ENABLE_USER_SITE 进行打印。

trans-unit.source: If it is desired to send data to the process’ stdin, the process needs to be created with stdin=PIPE. Similarly, to get anything other than None in the result tuple, the process has to be created with stdout=PIPE and/or stderr=PIPE arguments.

trans-unit.source: If modifying your production classes to add defaults isn’t to your liking then there are more options. One of these is simply to use an instance as the spec rather than the class. trans-unit.source: If multiple items are maximal, the function returns the first one encountered. This is consistent with other sort-stability preserving tools such as sorted(iterable, key=keyfunc, reverse=True)[0] and heapq.nlargest(1, iterable, key=keyfunc).
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个最大项，则该函数返回遇到的第一个项。这与其他排序稳定性保持工具一致，例如 sorted(iterable, key=keyfunc, reverse=True)[0] 和 heapq.nlargest(1, iterable, key=keyfunc) 。

trans-unit.source: If multiple items are minimal, the function returns the first one encountered. This is consistent with other sort-stability preserving tools such as sorted(iterable, key=keyfunc)[0] and heapq.nsmallest(1, iterable, key=keyfunc).

trans-unit.source: If multiple processes are enqueuing objects, it is possible for the objects to be received at the other end out-of-order. However, objects enqueued by the same process will always be in the expected order with respect to each other.

trans-unit.source: If name is not given, this examines the available implementations to find one with the required feature set. If no implementation can be found, raise an ImportError. trans-unit.target: 如果未提供名称，它将检查可用的实现，以找到具有所需功能集的实现。如果找不到实现，请引发 ImportError 。功能列表必须是 (feature, version) 对的序列，这些对将传递到可用的 DOMImplementation 对象上的 hasFeature() 方法。

trans-unit.target: 如果既没有编码也不错误给出， str(object) 返回 object.__str__() ，它是“非正规”或很好的可打印字符串表示对象。对于字符串对象，这是字符串本身。如果object没有 __str__() 方法，则 str() 会返回返回 repr(object) 。

trans-unit.source: If no exception is being handled anywhere on the stack, a tuple containing three None values is returned. Otherwise, the values returned are (type, value, traceback). Their meaning is: type gets the type of the exception being handled (a subclass of BaseException); value gets the exception instance (an instance of the exception type); traceback gets a traceback object which encapsulates the call stack at the point where the exception originally occurred.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈上任何地方都没有异常处理，则返回包含三个 None 值的元组。否则，返回的值为 (type, value, traceback) 。它们的含义是：type获取要处理的异常的类型（ BaseException 的子类）；value获取异常实例（异常类型的实例）；traceback获取一个traceback对象，该对象封装了最初发生异常时的调用堆栈。

trans-unit.source: If no exception is being handled anywhere on the stack, a tuple containing three None values is returned. Otherwise, the values returned are (type, value, traceback). Their meaning is: type gets the type of the exception being handled (a subclass of BaseException); value gets the exception instance (an instance of the exception type); traceback gets a traceback object which encapsulates the call stack at the point where the exception originally occurred.

trans-unit.source: If no positional argument is given, an empty dictionary is created. If a positional argument is given and it is a mapping object, a dictionary is created with the same key-value pairs as the mapping object. Otherwise, the positional argument must be an iterable object. Each item in the iterable must itself be an iterable with exactly two objects. The first object of each item becomes a key in the new dictionary, and the second object the corresponding value. If a key occurs more than once, the last value for that key becomes the corresponding value in the new dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出位置参数，则创建一个空字典。如果给出了位置参数并且它是一个映射对象，则将使用与该映射对象相同的键值对创建一个字典。否则，位置参数必须是可迭代的对象。可迭代对象中的每个项目本身都必须是具有两个对象的可迭代对象。每个项目的第一个对象成为新字典中的键，第二个对象成为相应的值。如果某个键多次出现，则该键的最后一个值将成为新字典中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: If no positional argument is given, an empty dictionary is created. If a positional argument is given and it is a mapping object, a dictionary is created with the same key-value pairs as the mapping object. Otherwise, the positional argument must be an iterable object. Each item in the iterable must itself be an iterable with exactly two objects. The first object of each item becomes a key in the new dictionary, and the second object the corresponding value. If a key occurs more than once, the last value for that key becomes the corresponding value in the new dictionary.

trans-unit.source: If optional mangle_from_ is True, put a > character in front of any line in the body that starts with the exact string "From ", that is From followed by a space at the beginning of a line. mangle_from_ defaults to the value of the mangle_from_ setting of the policy (which is True for the compat32 policy and False for all others). mangle_from_ is intended for use when messages are stored in unix mbox format (see mailbox and WHY THE CONTENT-LENGTH FORMAT IS BAD).
trans-unit.target: 如果可选的mangle_from_为 True ，则在正文中以精确字符串 "From " 开头的任何行之前放置一个 > 字符，即 From ,然后在行首添加一个空格。mangle_from_默认为价值 mangle_from_ 的设定政策（这是 True 的 compat32 政策和 False ，所有其他）。mangle_from_适用于以unix mbox格式存储消息的情况（请参阅 mailbox 和“ 为什么内容长度格式不正确”）。

trans-unit.source: If optional rest is given, a REST command is sent to the server, passing rest as an argument. rest is usually a byte offset into the requested file, telling the server to restart sending the file’s bytes at the requested offset, skipping over the initial bytes. Note however that RFC 959 requires only that rest be a string containing characters in the printable range from ASCII code 33 to ASCII code 126. The transfercmd() method, therefore, converts rest to a string, but no check is performed on the string’s contents. If the server does not recognize the REST command, an error_reply exception will be raised. If this happens, simply call transfercmd() without a rest argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了可选的rest，则将 REST 命令发送到服务器，并将rest作为参数传递。rest通常是请求文件的字节偏移量，它告诉服务器以请求的偏移量重新开始发送文件的字节，跳过初始字节。但是请注意，RFC 959仅要求rest是包含从ASCII代码33到ASCII代码126的可打印范围内的字符的字符串。因此， transfercmd() 方法将rest转换为字符串，但不对字符串的内容执行检查。如果服务器无法识别 REST 命令， error_reply 将会引发异常。如果发生这种情况，只需调用 transfercmd() 而不使用rest参数。

trans-unit.source: If optional rest is given, a REST command is sent to the server, passing rest as an argument. rest is usually a byte offset into the requested file, telling the server to restart sending the file’s bytes at the requested offset, skipping over the initial bytes. Note however that the transfercmd() method converts rest to a string with the encoding parameter specified at initialization, but no check is performed on the string’s contents. If the server does not recognize the REST command, an error_reply exception will be raised. If this happens, simply call transfercmd() without a rest argument.

If optional argument topdown is True or not specified, the triple for a directory is generated before the triples for any of its subdirectories (directories are generated top-down). If topdown is False, the triple for a directory is generated after the triples for all of its subdirectories (directories are generated bottom-up). No matter the value of topdown, the list of subdirectories is retrieved before the tuples for the directory and its subdirectories are generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选参数topdown为 True 或未指定，则将在其任何子目录的三元组之前生成目录的三元组（目录是自上而下生成的）。如果topdown为 False ，则在其所有子目录的三元组之后生成目录的三元组（目录是自下而上生成的）。无论topdown的值如何，都将在生成目录及其子目录的元组之前检索子目录的列表。

trans-unit.source: If optional argument tz is None or not specified, this is like today(), but, if possible, supplies more precision than can be gotten from going through a time.time() timestamp (for example, this may be possible on platforms supplying the C gettimeofday() function).
trans-unit.target: 如果可选参数tz为 None 或未指定，则类似于 today() ，但是，如果可能，提供的精度比通过 time.time() 时间戳获得的精度更高（例如，在提供C gettimeofday() 函数）。

trans-unit.source: If optional argument verbose is true, output is generated even if there are no failures. By default, output is generated only in case of an example failure.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选参数verbose为true，则即使没有失败，也会生成输出。默认情况下，仅在示例失败的情况下才生成输出。

trans-unit.source: If optional keyword argument initial_response_ok is true, authobject() will be called first with no argument. It can return the RFC 4954 “initial response” ASCII str which will be encoded and sent with the AUTH command as below. If the authobject() does not support an initial response (e.g. because it requires a challenge), it should return None when called with challenge=None. If initial_response_ok is false, then authobject() will not be called first with None.
trans-unit.target: 如果可选关键字参数initial_response_ok为true，则将首先调用不带参数的 authobject() 。它可以返回RFC 4954 “初始响应” ASCII str ，该字符串将通过 AUTH 命令进行编码和发送，如下所示。如果 authobject() 不支持的初步反应（例如，因为它需要一个挑战），它应该返回 None 调用时使用 challenge=None 。如果initial_response_ok为false，则不会首先使用 None 调用 authobject() 。

trans-unit.source: If passed an object that is not a context manager, this method assumes it is a callback with the same signature as a context manager’s __exit__() method and adds it directly to the callback stack.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递的对象不是上下文管理器，则此方法假定它是一个与上下文管理器的 __exit__() 方法具有相同签名的回调，并将其直接添加到回调堆栈中。

trans-unit.source: If passed an object that is not a context manager, this method assumes it is a callback with the same signature as a context manager’s __exit__() method and adds it directly to the callback stack.
If policy allows (ie. the rfc2965 and hide_cookie2 attributes of the CookieJar’s CookiePolicy instance are true and false respectively), the Cookie2 header is also added when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果政策允许（即 CookieJar 的 CookiePolicy 实例的 rfc2965 和 hide_cookie2 属性分别为true和false），则还可以在适当时添加Cookie2标头。

trans-unit.source: If precision is N, the output is truncated to N characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果precision为 N ，则输出将被截断为 N 个字符。

trans-unit.source: If prefix “0b” is desired or not, you can use either of the following ways.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要前缀“ 0b”，则可以使用以下两种方式之一。

trans-unit.source: If present and greater than zero, specified the desired width of the pane area (not including internal padding). Otherwise, the maximum width of all panes is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在且大于零,则指定窗格区域的理想宽度(不包括内部填充)。否则,将使用所有窗格的最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: If present and greater than zero, specifies the desired height of the pane area (not including internal padding or tabs). Otherwise, the maximum height of all panes is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在且大于零,则指定窗格区域的所需高度(不包括内部填充或标签)。否则,将使用所有窗格的最大高度。

trans-unit.source: If provided, tz must be an instance of a tzinfo subclass, and its utcoffset() and dst() methods must not return None. If self is naive, it is presumed to represent time in the system timezone.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则tz必须是 tzinfo 子类的实例，并且其 utcoffset() 和 dst() 方法不得返回 None 。如果self天真，则假定它代表系统时区中的时间。

trans-unit.source: If returning a tuple doesn’t suffice and you want name-based access to columns, you should consider setting row_factory to the highly-optimized sqlite3.Row type. Row provides both index-based and case-insensitive name-based access to columns with almost no memory overhead. It will probably be better than your own custom dictionary-based approach or even a db_row based solution.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回一个元组还不够，并且您希望基于名称的列访问，则应考虑将 row_factory 设置为高度优化的 sqlite3.Row 类型。 Row 提供对列的基于索引和不区分大小写的基于名称的访问，几乎没有内存开销。它可能会比您自己的基于字典的自定义方法甚至基于db_row的解决方案都要好。

trans-unit.source: If set to 1, causes the element and all of its descendants to be treated as a single element for the purposes of Widget.identify() et al. It’s used for things like scrollbar thumbs with grips.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为1，则出于 Widget.identify() 等的目的，导致将该元素及其所有后代视为一个元素。它用于带有手柄的滚动条拇指之类的东西。

trans-unit.source: If set to a non-zero integer, the parser will report only those attributes which were specified in the document instance and not those which were derived from attribute declarations. Applications which set this need to be especially careful to use what additional information is available from the declarations as needed to comply with the standards for the behavior of XML processors. By default, this attribute is false; it may be changed at any time.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为非零整数,解析器将只报告那些在文档实例中指定的属性,而不报告那些从属性声明中衍生出来的属性。设置这个属性的应用程序需要特别小心,根据需要使用从声明中获得的额外信息,以符合XML处理器行为的标准。默认情况下,这个属性是假的;它可以在任何时候被更改。

trans-unit.source: If set to true stop() will be called on the first failure or error, halting the test run.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true ，则在第一次失败或错误时将调用 stop() ，从而停止测试运​​行。

trans-unit.source: If set to true then local variables will be shown in tracebacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 "true",那么局部变量将在回溯中显示。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, sys.stdout and sys.stderr will be buffered in between startTest() and stopTest() being called. Collected output will only be echoed onto the real sys.stdout and sys.stderr if the test fails or errors. Any output is also attached to the failure / error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为true，则 sys.stdout 和 sys.stderr 将在 startTest() 和 stopTest() 之间进行缓冲。如果测试失败或错误，则仅将收集的输出回显到实际的 sys.stdout 和 sys.stderr 上。任何输出也将附加到失败/错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If set, a new dict will be created for the frame’s f_locals when the code object is executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则在执行代码对象时将为框架的 f_locals 创建一个新的字典。

trans-unit.source: If set, specifies the index (0-based) of a character to underline in the text string. The underline character is used for mnemonic activation.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则指定文本字符串中下划线字符的索引(基于0)。下划线字符用于激活记忆符号。

trans-unit.source: If some data was successfully read, it will return the number of bytes read. If no bytes were read, it will return -1 and set errno to errno.EAGAIN.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功读取了某些数据，它将返回读取的字节数。如果未读取任何字节，它将返回 -1 并将errno设置为 errno.EAGAIN 。

trans-unit.source: If source code is available, then the method should return the path to the source file, regardless of whether a bytecode was used to load the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果有源代码,那么该方法应该返回源文件的路径,不管是否使用字节码来加载模块。

trans-unit.source: If specified, default should be a function that gets called for objects that can’t otherwise be serialized. It should return a JSON encodable version of the object or raise a TypeError. If not specified, TypeError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则default应该是一个为无法序列化的对象调用的函数。它应该返回该对象的JSON可编码版本或引发 TypeError 。如果未指定，则引发 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: If specified, env must provide any variables required for the program to execute. On Windows, in order to run a side-by-side assembly the specified envmust include a valid SystemRoot.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，env必须提供程序执行所需的任何变量。在Windows上，为了运行并行程序集，指定的env 必须包含有效的 SystemRoot 。

trans-unit.source: If specified, separators should be an (item_separator, key_separator) tuple. The default is (', ', ': ') if indent is None and (',', ': ') otherwise. To get the most compact JSON representation, you should specify (',', ':') to eliminate whitespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则分隔符应为 (item_separator, key_separator) 元组。如果缩进为 None ，则默认值为 (', ', ': ') 否则为 (',', ': ') 。为了获得最紧凑的JSON表示形式，您应该指定 (',', ':') 以消除空格。

trans-unit.source: If specified, this should be an iterable of already created handlers to add to the root logger. Any handlers which don’t already have a formatter set will be assigned the default formatter created in this function. Note that this argument is incompatible with filename or stream - if both are present, a ValueError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，这应该是已经创建的处理程序的迭代过程，以添加到根记录器。任何尚未设置格式器的处理程序都将被分配此函数中创建的默认格式器。请注意，此参数与文件名或流不兼容-如果同时存在，则会引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: If stack information is available, it’s appended after the exception information, using formatStack() to transform it if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果堆栈信息可用，则将其附加在异常信息之后，并在必要时使用 formatStack() 对其进行转换。

trans-unit.source: If standard (non-proxy) list or dict objects are contained in a referent, modifications to those mutable values will not be propagated through the manager because the proxy has no way of knowing when the values contained within are modified. However, storing a value in a container proxy (which triggers a __setitem__ on the proxy object) does propagate through the manager and so to effectively modify such an item, one could re-assign the modified value to the container proxy:
trans-unit.target: 如果引用中包含标准（非代理） list 或 dict 对象，则对这些可变值的修改将不会通过管理器传播，因为代理无法知道何时修改了其中包含的值。但是，将值存储在容器代理中（会触发代理对象上的 __setitem__ ）确实会通过管理器传播，因此为了有效地修改此类项目，可以将修改后的值重新分配给容器代理：

trans-unit.source: If supplied, source_address must be a 2-tuple (host, port) for the socket to bind to as its source address before connecting. If host or port are ‘’ or 0 respectively the OS default behavior will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则source_address必须为2元组 (host, port) ，以便套接字在连接之前绑定为其源地址。如果主机或端口分别为''或0，则将使用操作系统默认行为。

trans-unit.source: If text mode is not used, stdin, stdout and stderr will be opened as binary streams. No encoding or line ending conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用文本模式，则stdin，stdout和stderr将作为二进制流打开。不执行编码或行尾转换。

trans-unit.source: If the default_factory attribute is None, this raises a KeyError exception with the key as argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 default_factory 属性为 None ，则将key作为参数引发 KeyError 异常。

trans-unit.source: If the FloatOperation signal is trapped, accidental mixing of decimals and floats in constructors or ordering comparisons raises an exception:
trans-unit.target: 如果捕获到 FloatOperation 信号，则在构造函数或顺序比较中意外混合小数和浮点数将引发异常：

trans-unit.source: If the GRND_NONBLOCK flag is set, then getrandom() does not block in these cases, but instead immediately raises BlockingIOError.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 GRND_NONBLOCK 标志，则在这些情况下 getrandom() 不会阻塞，而是立即引发 BlockingIOError 。

trans-unit.source: If the run() method raises an exception, threading.excepthook() is called to handle it. By default, threading.excepthook() ignores silently SystemExit.
trans-unit.target: 如果 run() 方法引发异常，则将调用 threading.excepthook() 进行处理。默认情况下， threading.excepthook() 会默默忽略 SystemExit 。

trans-unit.source: If the setUp() method raises an exception while the test is running, the framework will consider the test to have suffered an error, and the test method will not be executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行测试时 setUp() 方法引发异常，则框架将认为该测试已发生错误，并且该测试方法将不会执行。

trans-unit.source: If the origin_server attribute is set, this attribute’s value is used to set the default SERVER_SOFTWARE WSGI environment variable, and also to set a default Server: header in HTTP responses. It is ignored for handlers (such as BaseCGIHandler and CGIHandler) that are not HTTP origin servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 origin_server 属性，那么此属性的值将用于设置默认的 SERVER_SOFTWARE WSGI环境变量，以及在HTTP响应中设置默认的 Server: 标头。对于不是HTTP源服务器的处理程序（例如 BaseCGIHandler 和 CGIHandler ），将忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If the policy option cte_type is 8bit (the default), copy any headers in the original parsed message that have not been modified to the output with any bytes with the high bit set reproduced as in the original, and preserve the non-ASCII Content-Transfer-Encoding of any body parts that have them. If cte_type is 7bit, convert the bytes with the high bit set as needed using an ASCII-compatible Content-Transfer-Encoding. That is, transform parts with non-ASCII Content-Transfer-Encoding (Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit) to an ASCII compatible Content-Transfer-Encoding, and encode RFC-invalid non-ASCII bytes in headers using the MIME unknown-8bit character set, thus rendering them RFC-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果 policy 选项 cte_type 是 8bit （默认值），复制没有被修改，以输出与高位组复制为在原有的任何字节的原始解析的消息在任何头，并保留非ASCII 内容-具有身体的任何身体部位的传输编码。如果 cte_type 为 7bit ，请使用与ASCII兼容的Content-Transfer-Encoding根据需要转换设置了高位的字节。也就是说，将具有非ASCII 内容传输编码（Content-Transfer-Encoding：8bit）的部分转换为与ASCII兼容的内容传输编码，并使用MIME unknown-8bit 字符集在标头中对RFC无效的非ASCII字节进行编码，从而使其与RFC兼容。

trans-unit.source: If the policy option cte_type is 8bit, generate the message as if the option were set to 7bit. (This is required because strings cannot represent non-ASCII bytes.) Convert any bytes with the high bit set as needed using an ASCII-compatible Content-Transfer-Encoding. That is, transform parts with non-ASCII Content-Transfer-Encoding (Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit) to an ASCII compatible Content-Transfer-Encoding, and encode RFC-invalid non-ASCII bytes in headers using the MIME unknown-8bit character set, thus rendering them RFC-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果 policy 选项 cte_type 为 8bit ，则生成消息，就像该选项设置为 7bit 一样。 （这是必需的，因为字符串不能表示非ASCII字节。）使用与ASCII兼容的Content-Transfer-Encoding根据需要转换设置了高位的任何字节。也就是说，将具有非ASCII 内容传输编码（Content-Transfer-Encoding：8bit）的部分转换为与ASCII兼容的Content-Transfer-Encoding，并使用MIME unknown-8bit 在标头中对RFC无效的非ASCII字节进行编码字符集，从而使其符合RFC。

trans-unit.source: If the __getitem__() of the class’ metaclass is present, it will take precedence over the __class_getitem__() defined in the class (see PEP 560 for more details).
If the readline module is loaded, input will automatically inherit bash-like history-list editing (e.g.

trans-unit.source: If the readline module was loaded, then input() will use it to provide elaborate line editing and history features.
trans-unit.target: 如果 readline 模块已加载，那么 input() 将使用它提供详细的行编辑和历史记录功能。

trans-unit.source: If the .mo file’s magic number is invalid, the major version number is unexpected, or if other problems occur while reading the file, instantiating a GNUTranslations class can raise OSError.
trans-unit.target: 如果 .mo 文件的幻数无效，则主版本号意外，或者在读取文件时发生其他问题，实例化 GNUTranslations 类会引发 OSError 。

trans-unit.source: If the INSERT or REPLACE statement failed to insert the previous successful rowid is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 INSERT 或 REPLACE 语句插入失败，则返回前一个成功的rowid。

trans-unit.source: If the __cleanenv keyword is set, env_vars is used as a fresh environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 __cleanenv 关键字，则将env_vars用作全新环境。

trans-unit.source: If the binary_form parameter is False, and a certificate was received from the peer, this method returns a dict instance. If the certificate was not validated, the dict is empty. If the certificate was validated, it returns a dict with several keys, amongst them subject (the principal for which the certificate was issued) and issuer (the principal issuing the certificate). If a certificate contains an instance of the Subject Alternative Name extension (see RFC 3280), there will also be a subjectAltName key in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 如果 binary_form 参数为 False ，并且从对等方接收到证书，则此方法返回 dict 实例。如果证书未通过验证，则字典为空。如果证书通过了验证，它将返回包含几个密钥的字典，其中包括 subject （颁发证书的主体）和 issuer （颁发证书的主体）。如果证书包含主题备用名称扩展名的实例（请参阅RFC 3280），则词典中还将有 subjectAltName 键。

trans-unit.source: If the binary_form parameter is True, and a certificate was provided, this method returns the DER-encoded form of the entire certificate as a sequence of bytes, or None if the peer did not provide a certificate. Whether the peer provides a certificate depends on the SSL socket’s role:
trans-unit.target: 如果 binary_form 参数为 True ，并且提供了证书，则此方法以字节序列的形式返回整个证书的DER编码形式，如果对等方未提供证书，则返回 None 。对等方是否提供证书取决于SSL套接字的角色：

trans-unit.source: If the default value is a string, the parser parses the value as if it were a command-line argument. In particular, the parser applies any type conversion argument, if provided, before setting the attribute on the Namespace return value. Otherwise, the parser uses the value as is:
